2b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la kak+sha tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'ja
2b2(rgyud): ba mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 
2b3(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la snyoms par zhugs
2b4(rgyud): nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las sngags kyi rgyal po 'di phyung ngo // oM AHhU~M/ 
2b5(rgyud): de gsungs ma thag tu tshangs pa dang / khyab 'dug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 
3a1(rgyud): byin dang / gnon du dang / b+h+ring gi ri Ti dang / chogs gyi bdag po dang / rnyings te dang / dga' byed dbang phyug
3a2(rgyud): / nag po chen po dang / zin mtshan sreg byed pa dang / ma dang / zla ba dang / mi da' nga / chag pa dang / phu chu / 
3a3(rgyud): spen pa dang / pa ba sangs dang / skrag can dang / rgyu ska nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / chu lha dang / gshin rje
3a4(rgyud): dang / me lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dga' bo dang / nye dka' bo dang / 'jog po dang / mtha' yas dang / dung skyongan
3a5(rgyud): gas pa nadang / ba / snyen po dang / na pa sa khyen sa/ skyes ma gas pa da
3a6(rgyud): 'og pa thams cad skad cig de nyid la dpal 'byung ba'i mchod rten gyi spo dol la
3b1(rgyud): 'de bas ni ba dang med par mad du gsos nas pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad lam mchog tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba te dzin pa rtobs pa shugs das gsang sngags nyid du dang / 
3b2(rgyud): padang yangs//  dug 'dod pa tu nyid kyi na du rubartsen pamagayo la su dog sa meng dag kya dag ga nabado drag nga nyapa 'dug ngas
3b3(rgyud): phyag stong phrag skang du gdug pa'i mtshon mar ma gri dang / ram gyi kyog po dang / bu kri dang / bri 'ug dang / snga bre dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / rtse gsum dang / rtse dgu pa dang / mdung dang / 'phen bdu dang / 
3b4(rgyud): dun/ da/  sa dang / da /  gsapadang/ ga pa dang /  ca dang / sa
3b5(rgyud): sas+ho dang / sa dang / ban ma dang / bzhug pa dang / thob dang / gtun shi dang / mkho ba dang / thub dang / mgos dang / bi nyis la dang / gzung nga/ gzus ted da/ 
4a1(rgyud): dred dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang // khab dang / gsil byed dang / nam mang lding dang / sku la nags sa chags mchod mdum gzung nas phyag lhags rnams
4a2(rgyud): nang la greb byar nas g.yon pa sdigs ma bu phyang bar mdzad do// zham stong phrag stong la 'dum pa dang / band pa dang / ha ha ne mi blags pa dang / mche ba gtsigs pa dang / sa 'dang 'a dang / 
4a3(rgyud): bad/ khrag bsngag pa dang / dam pa dang / zhi bar yang mdzad de zhal gyi kha dog kyang tha dad do// dbu sra yang dag pa dang / mer pa dang / dmar po la sogs pa tha dad do// su spyod la glang po che'i gas
4a4(rgyud): sru smad kyang stag gi pags pas dkris shing phyag dang zhal dang zhabs kyi bye brag gis rgyan yang tha da de/ rin po ma dum dang / dus pa'i phreng ba dang / skul gyi mun pa dang / mis ge'i phreng ba
4a5(rgyud): bags pa dang / seng ge'i phags pa dang / ma he'i thags pal mgos pa sa dad// nas ma lang spyad pasus dmus dang / gnyis gnyis dang / ro ro'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
4a6(rgyud): mig yo bdel 'di skad du bka' bzla'o// oM kyi mi g.yo ba/ gro bo drag po// 'jigs byed chen po// gtum po chen po// dpa' 'tshan po// bdud kyi tshogs thams cagasod cig/ ching
4a7(rgyud): btogs shig/ rgya cheg/ bram cig/ gtubs shig/ dril cig/ phul cig/ non ce// gcing cig/ zug ceg/ chos shig/ bregs shika/ phyes gyis shig/ med par gyis shig
4a8(rgyud): rnams she// 'a // sregs she// dudu dru na# dang / rga mad
4b1(rgyud): ster bya nas lha'i gdon thams cad dam par byas te/ tshogs kyi bdag pagadan du ma so/ gnon tshum kyad du bya na bus mogasas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas lha'i bdud pham par byas so// g.yon pas
4b2(rgyud): btsugs nas pi na pa ga med par byas so// de nas yang dag pa shad kyab// khyim sogs parnams sa zhing// gros nas gdun rnams jigs byed// sku tshogs 'bas skyong ma dad pa'o// chas rnams
4b3(rgyud): shes ci ma nga mthong // lus dang sems dang ga rnams dag/ kun rdzob stong pa nam dag nas// mi gnas sna tshogs bung 'jug pad// 'phags pa min mo pa rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mas sprul pa rnam pa sa
4b4(rgyud): le ste da pa ma// / de nas ya dag bshad byag// bde bar gshegs rnams 'dul su// rna tshogs lus can 'digs pa'i gzugs// rnams pa' ga batshamasam gtan bya// skad ceg
4b5(rgyud): ta mngon rdzogs shig/ da cig mig rnam dgod kyi// nad cig zhin dod// 'dig gzugs na cig sprul pa byed// cha gcod kyis kyis gnon ma byung // skad cig
4b6(rgyud): nag po 'bang // mkha' la gzigs pas lha rnams smag/ sal gzigs pas klu rnams skrag/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams dpa// bla ma la yang phyag 'tshal zhing // rtag tu mchod de dga' chen bskyed/ 
4b7(rgyud): lung ga sa kyi ga bralagag/ dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don gnyer// sangs rgyas bzhugs nang cos gsungs ba'o// smon lam danapa 'tho ba byen bya// byang chu sems kyang saskyed byan/ 
5a1(rgyud): dag sa ngosags pa// na na du na // dka' 'a kyis dmigs// nam mkha sa ngas rnam na/ 
5a2(rgyud): snyoms chen po bsgom par bya// de ltar dang ldan brtson 'grus can// ga mo skyo bral nang lAm bkur// snying rje le la med pa yi// srid pa'i sred nga spong byed pa// dga' ba'i tshal lam na 'ug tsang dang / 
5a3(rgyud): kaim lha yang stong pa'am// shing drung nags dgon spongs rnams sa// bde po 'i yid kyis gnas par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen ma yongs rdzogs pa thams cad pa skyed pa zhes bya te
5a4(rgyud): ma stobs par zhugs nas rig pa 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs de mas byung ngo // nam ma pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// hUM shi li ge las skyes pa// mig sa mgon po rgyab 'jur// na
5a5(rgyud): khyod dag pa'i lus bskor bya// rgal gcig phyag gnyis parji pa'i sku// skadang man pa du tshogs rnams// shin tu skrag par mdzad pa'i phyir// g.yas kyis ma grim 'alas byar// ga
5a6(rgyud): bsdigs mdzul nags pa 'jed// pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan sa ni// tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng gnas pa// g.yon brkyang gar bzhugs stag sham can// phu grogs klu chen brgyad kyis brgyad/ 
5a7(rgyud): khyed sgra spyan gya dmar// spyan sum khro tshul mche ba gtsigs// tshangs pa lha dbang bya 'jug dang // dbang phyug me sogs lha rnams dang // lha ma yin rnams skrag par byed// bskal pa'i ma 'orol
5a8(rgyud): // dra du ma chags sacas// btan gas gsam mas// dag stsal yigs byas nas// de dus pam dzu sems// dun ca pags na
5b1(rgyud): da nyi pangs kyis bska ma//  na na da nas man// ra kro seMn da // snod na 'byo ba de gyur/ 
5b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'ad thung ba chen pos mi babad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bcugs nas rig la chin nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// haM ki li
5b3(rgyud): skyes par// phran chen khro ze rgyal po ni// sngon ga zhas gsus phyagadrug 'i sgom// ras dri bri ni// galas kyi phyag nangs bzhin 'dzin// sngags mdzub 'khor go yA ni// g.yon 'i phyag na rim pa'in
5b4(rgyud): 'dod// spyan gsum broganyer byen du 'aspyod// dbu smra hA byen pa phre ra// rol ba klu'i rkyed kyis 'argyad// bod pa'i phreng ba sta ga sha ma can// klung chen lpags pas stod ga/ legs byas// ngus pa'i rkyen gyis
5b5(rgyud): rangar brgyan cing // pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan dbus na// g.yon brgya g.yas bskum tshul du bgyid// he bo nam mkha'i phyogs sgrogs pa// bskal pa'i sa sta ga ri marjid che// 'di ltar skad cig dran pa 'am// ma
5b6(rgyud): tsam kyis 'dod pa sgrug/ de na la bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
5b7(rgyud): nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// maM las skyes pa'i mi g.yog/ 'jigs byed chen po bsam par bya// yi dgas drod kyi steng na bkying // zhal bzhi phyag bani pas kyang ba ni// g.yas pa ras kri rdo rje 'dzin/ 
5b8(rgyud): rod pa sdigs ma thu yod khrag go// nabs la ni bdud lazhi'i steng na 'azed// sna tshogs ngus pa'i rgyad ldan zhing // stag gi shas babs rnam par 'argyan// stod su pa'i pags pas brgyan// dmar mer chen sgra 'di
6a1(rgyud): m+pu gsan mags sus gyu// namamamal kyis kyigs 'das/  sa / tshig phyogs// ban kun khye mas // ga ga
6a2(rgyud): su// bdadag nyi ma'i ste dkyilan// bram mos la btsugs nas bzhugs// phyag galasa'am gri 'dzin pa ste// g.yon pa sdigs sa du nags pa 'dzin// spyan gnyis dam pa smram pa ste// gnon du'o
6a3(rgyud): byad can// rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par sa rgyan// sbrul dag salas do gas byas// b+hag gi dgas pa tshigamathams can// rdza tshogs brobo rnam pa pa tho// sa pa'i me yo dbus ni gnas// gang
6a4(rgyud): / du mas byed/ da sa lad so//  pams da kyang /  mchong// bad
6a5(rgyud): bzhog/ byub tu gsas cad// dan / na shAn+d+he byagags / rjod / dun mas pad+mag papa ma da/ 
6b1(rgyud): mtsha tog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal mas su byung ba'i le ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag pashad byag// dge byed ngas mim pakra shis kyis
7a1(rgyud): 'a na da pas/ mas sa ldas so// mas canas sa pa med/  sa/ 
7a2(rgyud): bsdams pa/ g.yon gsu pa da sdigs mdzub dang / mkhor lo dpa paT+wAMg 'dzi pa dang zlas brgyan cing 'odapa da shes can/ stag gi sham papas dang / glas chab stod ga tshogs dang / bdob lnga de ba rnyan cam
7a3(rgyud): sekhas btsun cing bad+ma nim steng na gtsun pabargyang ni galas bsgra tshum gyis bgying ba/ bskal pa'i me'i gci ma dngas kyinang nas grob lu bram thar// lha min rgyal po mig sa 'den pa lan
7a4(rgyud): sbyin gsum gsu dang ldan zhing / phyag 'ani g.yas gnyis na ma gr-i dang dodza/ g.yon gnyi ma da bsdigs mdzub dang med khrag can/ snod la pa'i bags pa gyon zhing stag gi sham thabs can/ rngas pa dang
7a5(rgyud): yin pag brgyad pa/ bskal pa'i mi'a'ar ni gro 'a mchags kyi sri du 'phrob/ badralda na'a' 'a nas bdud pa sanan cing sbas rab byin du 'arjes padri'o// bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sreg ye ba ni gtum
7a6(rgyud): 'al gcig phyag gnyis ral krid pa nags pas 'brel ba/ rdza dga' tshamasams can du dzes pa/ rin ma chemachod pan dang / do shas dang / ya la ga thams cad brgyan cing stag gi nam thabs can/ 
7a7(rgyud): ser ma 'ang thogs pa/ bskam pa'i tshogs kyi me ri 'bar yi nang dakhru bo dum 'khrug cing / pad+ma dang nyi ma la bus mo g.yas paba' ba sbyangs kyi tshul du bzhugs pa 'am/ yang na g.yod pa gshed po tshul
7a8(rgyud): lanam mapa 'phre rtegs grog// gang ba ma da nan nga bres nas/ dang bdun du nyid kyi 'a ga mi sngags kyi zhems/ 'chos nas ga pa legs pas skyed
7b1(rgyud): mdzes pal g.yon du phul te/ bkra shes brjod nas/ rang gi gnas kyi dben pa'i phyogs su bzhugs pa mngon sum du mi g.yo ba sasgrubs te/ me tog la sogs pas legs pa mchod nas/ ye shes kyi
7b2(rgyud): gang yang dngos grub 'dod pa ma spos dang / me tog dang / sgron ma dang / zhal zas dang / gos la sogs pas rgyun du mchod na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'gru pa la
7b3(rgyud): dod pa 'a'o// 'der myi'o 'ga'adi dman pa te/ srung babadebs na shin tu yang ltung 'ab tung ba phyir srud dben pa'i 'phyogs su sla bar bya'o// ni rgyas dbang dang gas bam// ngas srel sogs brgyad rnams dang/ 
7b4(rgyud): mchog gi sangs rgyas thams cad de// rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan las rnyed gyur// 'phags pa mi ga yo ze'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las bris sku'i le'u ste gsum pa mo// / de nas yang dag bshad kyang // 
7b5(rgyud): ba rnam par dag byed cing // dngos grub sbyar phyi das sngags rnams// rim pa dbye ba ngo mtshar nyon// bcu bzhi'i dbyangs las yum gyis brgyan/ 
7b6(rgyud): kyil di gas rjeb rgya pag/ dbya kyi gnyis pas mdzes pa khyag/ me dang byas bcu gsum par 'bres// drod gnyis pa dang drag mtha' 'brel// sub cu gsum dang byangs drug 'dres/ 
7b7(rgyud): lnga bas brtan no// nyi shu gnyis dang bcu gcig 'brel// des nyi bras rnam pastan pa'o// gang sngags rgyal tshal gi 'dra// nga brib chub mam bye ba 'bru// sa la bzlas kyang skam thong gyur// zhing TIg/ 
7b8(rgyud): // rtsog rgyam sa rgyas na dgapa 'a byed //  nas ma byed ca // gang ga da byed// 'dig rten dis
8a1(rgyud): sa la khyog na gros// oMs pA la bu d+hA r+b+ha sarbA brtson te/ gcung bdag pa 'i shes kyi grags so// so sa rdzun 'dzas nA rbAn te/ 
8a2(rgyud): pos padag she ma /  sbyin pa kyi gas s+ho//  sa kyi snar / 6 ga
8a3(rgyud): godang 'os 'bras chen dang // sA bud ga dang til dkang dang // grodang nas dang pra 'odod // shing tegal sogs rtag par mchod// oM tsat+ya ma hA do Na hUM maN+Da la ma d+h+ye A gats+tsha la/ sa ma la / 
8a4(rgyud): yo has khA ga N+Dam sa sha rjes chus s+ya shong rjes la hU~M Ta/ kyes sta la/ rjid sdem sa Ta/ bad kI la AH/ zung bus gdapa' mi gsas// nam sa me mas kyi

8a6(rgyud): /  gad /  ma/ nyid/ gro ma// a / ci ma sa// sas/ natas/

8b2(rgyud): 8/ ma hU~M/  \u0f7f/  kyi daM Sh+Tats+tsha/ tshig thams cad kyis gro gas so// na laHdzAH/ la mo g+ha te sa pra N+Di ta tam ni mtshalal te /

9a1(rgyud): rdul zhe ste// rnal da da tog rgyas/ 5 'ams nas rgya na// na da pa la la da / gas
9a2(rgyud): desos par byed do// yang dkong du bstan pa'i yungs kar dang gu phul gyis 'dug cing sngags drag tu brjod na klu 'bros so// slar yang mi ldog go/ 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin pa la sungs kar bskyed pa
9a3(rgyud): mang du 'dras nas gtor na dbyer ro// byis pa gsar du btsas pa bsrung ba ni kham pho la rdo chus kyis bris pa bcang ngo // spra tshil gyi gzugs sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas pa'i snying gang bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas
9a4(rgyud): sngags bcug pal la tshe ma btsugs na bsdus rgya sel ma tshoms btsugs par 'gyur tshon lam tshugs na rengs sa snying sa btsugs na dran pa stor bar byed do// mi'i rjed kyi rus pa'i phur yu'am/ lcags sum
9a5(rgyud): lag gang dang gang la btab pa de niba'am rengs par byed do du bakhrod kyi thal 'as yang du bsngags nas 'gram lan zag tu btab na 'byer ro g.yul du zhugs nas ral khrel bsngags te gzung na rgyal mo// gangal yang ka
9a6(rgyud): bye brag gis 'grub nges so// du bgrod du byin te snad pod dpal pa sngal dkar po sdong bu dang / tshil ched dkyi yar me byas pa tshol brgyad dam 'acu bzhil sbar ba'i dub migs thugs na gzhan gyi mthong na dga' ba
9a7(rgyud): gas te nyi ma ma sla ba gapas gsung ba mi migs sa gon pab sgrilam sa byas nam matog shes mig 'am/ da rnal bam chod cing sngags mtshan thog cag pazlas pas ches pang grub bo// yang ru
9b1(rgyud): ma lngas byugs te/ mtshan togacag sa smos na srid pa gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro// yang nyi ma dang bram dmas gam bzhis byas nas gras zhi ram gri bzugs pa/  ga ce
9b2(rgyud): dgal bas lhags te ma can cigaca pargyas na srid pa gsub gsal par 'gyur ro// gal te gtem ba bye bar 'dod pas mi g.yos gni pa'i sku lam pa las byas pa/ sman drug la sagos pa sa po mas
9b3(rgyud): khyod kyis dmugag su te /  thabs papa 'dod/ klam pa'i gnas pa ka'i kyim 'a'ad byas te/ sa lam pag pan pa dag po sogs pa ci gzugs byas
9b4(rgyud): da par byas nas sa ta med zhugs te/ da mtshig pa skyed nas dbus kyi gsom gon po sa kyis pa la ye shes kyi lha cuganas/ kar dang / bu ma dang / sbrang dang / 'ol la sogs pas mchod ce
10a1(rgyud): bakhrul bad nyid dganod nams sel// khams gsum rgyal po por nyon cig/ smrab su'i rim pa sems sbyar las// ji srid 'dod pa'i dus par du// rang sems gnas nas
10a2(rgyud): brtan par gyur // dngos med dngomasags ma lus pa'i// nab tog rab ris kun bsal ngas// nyod mongs dad nams ma lus pa// bag chags dang bcas gtan bcom nas// 'phral du yang ni/ 
10a3(rgyud): bred dag pa skye// spro yang mi dmigs bsdu mi dmigs// skye med 'gag med ting nge 'dzin// 'byung med 'gro med bsam gtan la// gnas na ye shes myur du thob// bla med ye shes yon tan dang / 
10a4(rgyud): mthu rnams che bar 'gyur ba ni// bla ma mnyis las rnyed pa gyur 'gro// de nyid bdud kyi brgyad kyim len// gus pas rtag par nyin mtshan du// rgyun chad me dper gosos byas na// myur du phyag tu na pa
10a5(rgyud): dngos grub sdod du ba kur ba yin// 'bad rtsol byang chub yan lag ste// mam gnyed dang g.yeng baspang // sngags gsal dmigs pa brtan gyur cing // bsam gtan thon dam 'khrul 'khor ba cang/ 
10a6(rgyud): skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par ma// grog 'am lang na shing shun la// gur gum 'gi wang tsad dan gyis// rdo rje rgya gram mu khyud bcas// dbus su ming dang sngags spel bri// mu khyud la ni rtsa sngags bri// ra
10a7(rgyud): budas ni hU~M meng // spel te galas nas caskangs bri// dkyil la khor dgang po cid dbus pa ni// me tog dag ba'i steng gzhag nas// lha mi srung ni bskyed byas te// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na/ 
10a8(rgyud): ga 'dod pa'i dpung pa 'am// lus la bcangs na bsrung bar byed// kham por sar pa la do rgyas kyis bris te/ sgor bcangs na gsar du btsas pa'i byis pa bsrung ngo // dur khrod kyi nas sngags
10b1(rgyud): ming dang cas pasate/  ma gtus nas dung srid kyi lus par bcug nas/ kham rgya gram gyis pab dang sras namang sa skabs par byed do// phya nas rnams bkrus rnamasas// gas tegs dpar // 
10b2(rgyud): la 'od krugs nan pa byas pa byu bu sa las kyi ming man pamanan na tug byu nas/ gapa la gtas da thaMd de/ degasam du gsod chagag yodan kyul/ 
10b3(rgyud): dkyis brgyan ma bzhugs so// de nas drim drug dang pag pad las bslab pa'i gzugs song brgyad byas nas/ do rgya bram gyi 'khor logs dpa'i shem bu dang bcas pa snying gar bcug ste/ de'i sku'i rnabs
10b4(rgyud): gzhag nas rang nyid lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas zung la nir mi rum sa ma seng ldeng ngam/ lcags las byas pa'i phur ru sor ba zhi pa gzhag pa la/ thun mtshams thams cad du btab pas shes pa brgyal bar bsam mo// 
10b5(rgyud): de'i 'od kyis mdun gyi phra ba mi gso bang brnams pa'i thugs bskus nas/ de bas khro ba lpags kyu dang nags pa thogs pa grangs med pa smos pas/ bsgrub bya rlung gi lakho ma la bzhag na la mongs pas skad cig tsam
10b6(rgyud): phung po gtor nas/ shes pali gal bstim par bya'o// de ltar nag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byas pas tes lung du bsreg pa 'am/ pad dpa byas nadabang phyug chen po yang gsod par ban gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos/ 
10b7(rgyud): tu sa/ segagaganyis ma mo/  sna /  kyi ga sum na shA rdzun mi na ma la / de nags pas panas
10b8(rgyud): sa ni rab tu sngags kyi nang pa brgyad pa bri'o// mu kug pa ming dang bcas pa'i snying pa phra'o/ de'i rgyab kyi su rgyud la las thams cad sa bri'o// mu khyA gdu bab la do drung sa gri spel na waM bya
11a1(rgyud): dadas pa dag spyang kyi nang du bcug nas ni sbas bcings te/ bcu bya dga' ba'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas rbab / tu bris pas khrag 'dren pa'i skabs bltas na nag nyi su
11a2(rgyud): gis ga la byas pa/ de khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi'o// du bakhrod du byas na mtshon gyi bskam pa babs nas 'dichi'o// shing gcig gi cing sras nadangs so// rgya mdor rdzas na 'byer ro// pamang rgyag ma du
11a3(rgyud): dbye'o// lha rten zhabs su sbas nan par 'gyur ro// klu med pa'i sar sras na mdzes yirnapal mo chom med do// rang nyid kyi nyal ba'i nabs su sbas na 'dod pa'i bu so zhugs so// ci ste rgya la mtshan gyi tsam
11a4(rgyud): la btags na dmag kyang rengs so// de dag thams cad la l+r-inga'abar bdud pa'i bdog dang ldan pa phyag bzhin 'as bzhi spya gsum dang ldan par blta'o// du grod kyi ras la dmag dpon gyi ming dang spel 'am
11a5(rgyud): sngags rdo rje h+ya bram kyi lte bar bris la mtha' yi ge la brgyad kyis banan te/ de'i phyi rol du dbang ched kyid dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rje gram bris la/ de sgra tshil las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag pa'i snying gar bcug nas gang
11a6(rgyud): bdab pa'i mtshams su gzhag na dmag rengs so// gzhan yang gza' skar la bltas te dbyang ro// bskrad par 'dod na srog ram sa la bya ga dang ldan pa le khrag gis gong du gsungs pa'i 'bar ma bris te/ 
11a7(rgyud): u tsA mra la spel bar bya'o// char che ba'am se ba gcad par 'dod/ grogs gur gum ma ma 'gi lang gis 'khor ma rgyabs bzhi pa byas la 'du mud gsum pa kyas te/ rgyabab bzhi la snying po'i sngags ldan/ 
11a8(rgyud): slong sa bres pa/ dngos kyi zhel thab zlas te/ de la ba'i sngags gapa na ldang du brisanas/ su gyu dang po la las thams dpa 'o// gnyis pa laram tha'i phreng sa/ gtsang pa la / 
11b1(rgyud):  rkyen ga pa grangs bye graganas/ sa sa da pa na gan lags sa ga ga na
11b2(rgyud): das/ rdo thams phru bya ming nas nyid du mdanan/ zhag na ces de sngags // bang na nA ni ba gaslong pa'i 'bram // nidu chur ci bags pa la
11b3(rgyud): spyo ba dang bcas pa'am/ bras sa kyis ni nga/  de na nas tshigs bsgrus dadagral mi mamacho// yang bral ba gapas bzlas dga' len pa de dbang thu
11b4(rgyud): nas [ред] da sas sa// de dag ni/ 6/ na / 51[рд╜]3\u0f7f/ gas
12a1(rgyud): dAb+ham da d+haH/ gang dar/ b+haM steng / dze dz+hadzaH/ tshor ta/ de nyid te/ drA ba sa tA ba le/ dz+nyA ba tsam+b+ha \u0f7f/ sid+d+hi me pra lidz+dza/ sems pa/ sim mA pa e chu sringam bu rdzab cad AH/ 
12a2(rgyud): gur/ Tu su r+tha/ mu drabu/ oM gtag ga ga ga ga / yon men ma Ad+ha/ bzlam pa'i sngags/ oM par ta ka swAt+ma/ zhes bya'o// gzhan ya chags kyi bdag
12a3(rgyud): sbyor sa las rlung bcing bar 'dod na gur shum dang / 'gi wang dang / yud ba ser pos rgyal po'i ras la dbang chen gyi dkyil la
12a4(rgyud): gdon sa do'i dbus du tshogs kyi bdag po bye ba lazhon pa// kha dog gser bcom lta granal bani pa/ g.yas dang pon pa grang breg/ g.yon dang por rtse gsum 'onam gnyis kyis thod pa bdud kyis bkang ba 'dzin
12a5(rgyud): rnadamam pa' la byar nas blta ba bris te/ de'i snying gang sman ma lda cu'i steng du/ ma ma bris la rnal 'byor ba dbang chen yongs su rgyas pa bsam gtan dang ldan pas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rung bcing
12a6(rgyud): do// ma tshogags ga ma migs/  dado// de tshogs kyi na so// sngags ma di gas// phyog // 
12b1(rgyud): bya na cigasas dang// te sra shA da// sa gzhanan du nga mams da na/ rgya zu gis zugs gros nas ni// sngon pa'i na chen can kyis brgyad// 
12b2(rgyud): dupa drug dang // 'om zho dang sgang dkar dang // mar dang chan dang sran ma sha/ btsas pa'i sha dang shing tog rnams// dus dang dus su mchod byas na// gter rnams 'di yis ster bar byed// yang na bdag nyid mig sa// 
12b3(rgyud): gnas gsum phyag drug kros pa'i sku// ral grim dpa dang do rjeg las// nags pa gzhu dang bdu byu gsan// khams gsum gang ba'i hU~Mlas bskyed// sna tshogs mdog can khro bo ni// dum mtshon chan ma gzung
12b4(rgyud): !rab las sgo zhing bsdu byed pa'i// mdun du tshogs kyi bdag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+mal// bzhengs te mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ bskyed nas bcos pa'i shas mchod nas// bsnyen pa stong byas las// 
12b5(rgyud): dmas 'akrung // sus kyi tshod ngam gsum la// tshogs bdag de'i gzugs byas nas// gnod pa'i ying dang ldan bcug da// mnyas mings phyugs ngas sagos// gang gi mtshan nas gzung bde/ 
12b6(rgyud): las 'gru sa byed// 'phags pa legs pa'i tog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las 'askul lakhod kyi la ba sku drug sa de nas yang dag bshad kyab// las rnams rtsub pa'i yan lag tu// gces par thur gyi
12b7(rgyud): na no/ di gnyis du rdzus po dang // yid nga'i khyim du tsAg// mdams kyi byabs shes// spyod dang rnam pas pa bcas sa// rgyal so cad nyi shu ba ni// de zengs ma chong bcu gnyis
12b8(rgyud): / la sa /  sa kyi nab rgyam gas/ gi #// yu ni da byed pa ni// rab mdzong ga/ de ga#
13a1(rgyud): bskos bya// don drin na gyi'o// bangan thug na thu gsug/ rimagasus ma gnyis sor med do// na ru rgyagras ze// gas pa bsngags pa'o/ 
13a2(rgyud): dang 'bras dang 'om dang // zho dang mar dang spa rtsi dang // 'a ya sha dang 'i shing sogs// me tog dkar po yod pa ste// dkar gsu mdar gyis bsres pa rnams// zhi ba'i las pa shin tu shrI/ sA phudang
13a3(rgyud): thod de// rgyani che dang dgul// sarba gu phul gur gum bcas// tsam pano dang he'u shing // me tog gser mdog las gos rnams// rgyas pa'i las la shin tu shis// can dan dam dang krur
13a4(rgyud): / pra bo ti le dang rgya sran dang // khre dang cung rtsa spel ba dang // ba ser mo ya bdud rtsi lnga// nag khro dang tsan dan dmar// me tog dmar po dbangs shis// bsad ma khrag dang dug yungs kar// chag
13a5(rgyud): ling gang bcas pa'o// gos dkar rgyan yang dkar po ste// yo byad kun yang dkar byas dang // bsam pa 'azang pos shar bltas pa
13a6(rgyud): / rgyas pa'i yid byas byang du bltas// dga' ba dkyil lalor bsgor byas na// 'dis ni rgyas ma'i las 'grub byed// rgyan dang gos dang yo byad kun// khadog dmar ni sngam gyur nas// myos pa'i ming
13a7(rgyud): bus bltas na// dbang galas rnams 'akrub bar byed// rgyan gos gnag cib pa pyod gnag/ nub pa'i mid pa ltas khros pa'i skad// 'byen cing lham phyogs su bltas// drag po la las rnams
13a8(rgyud): mas bya la mam mas/ na du na pa ngas da mas chaganyis las las 'a
13b1(rgyud): la//  dubag kya da/  / gnanamams sas bag pa khrod yo sa dris kyi ma myin zugs sa
13b2(rgyud): bris pa'i snying gar bcug la/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro/  Na a mug s+ya sta~M b+ha la/ kI la la hU~M phaT ces gdapa 'o// bsgrub bya'i shes pa rlung gi steng du gzhag pa dbugs dang bcas pa drang ngo // gal te gsob ca da na phur bu dang / 
13b3(rgyud): ming ton te ma thug cing / i rgyas ro cheg sa shArnyog dul bsngo ba/ zhes 'dod na nas 'dud dngasos par 'gyu'o// sabanam dang cems byab 'don/ mas byas pa'i mig ma 'i ma nas
13b4(rgyud): bya ba shin tu dmar pa'i mig gcig yod pa/ ral gri dpa nags pa can khadog ldang nag rtsu bcing 'khrug pa/ ri ma che'i brag phug du gnas pa la dus rtag par rgyun du mchod nas gru gsum thams cad kyi dbus sbubs pa ste shadang/ 
13b5(rgyud): khrag dang dug dang gzugs brnyan rnams zhal du bsregs na kur du 'chi'o// rengs par 'dod pas dranga'i rus pa la dze ta la dze ta la shes stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg go// lkugs par 'dod na nga'i sha la b+ha tir b+ha ta zhes khri chog sum
13b6(rgyud): skyob 'dod na kyi na dang cang dang dun sna tshogs pa la da na mdzad pa / ske slong rngub rgyad bsreg go// dgra mam mig song bar 'dod pas skye bache she po bu'i drug pa la ma tag pa zhes stong rtsa brgyad du bsre/ 
13b7(rgyud): shalnga bad ci la dang / da mi chub mnyin pa stong pa pargyad 'bregs zangs pa byed do// sras dang dad dpa dbadang zhes pamam brgyad 'asregs na lams bcad do// thal pa ji dang kyi ni mdzis
13b8(rgyud): yadas/ sa thegasan do// sa dang / zag dang /  khrigs dpa marnams so// ma ma// dul la sa
14a1(rgyud): mangs// rgya skyegs bsregs na lams nad dang // bzhugs dpa jigs dang 'byung ba ldo// nod kul ta dang spad// brgod dkru la ba yi tshul// 'di nams bsregs na spyod/ 
14a2(rgyud): dang // srang dang bu ma tho pa sem// rtsa gzhan pang sngags kyi rtsa la 'dig/ sna tshogs las rnams 'phrul gyi coM// brtan pachen por ye shes ra// 'ga' las myang rdzob byed cingag// go
14a3(rgyud): 'dod sred la bram smra// tshigs sems nid don mchis// bag med ga yang dang mir sna dang // banam chen snying rje med pas ni// bskal pa brgya dang steng phrag tu// bsgrubs kyang nam yang mi bzla
14a4(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang maud kyi sgo// dam pa las ni gzhan du mir// dab bcwa ba nim pa cwa tshogs rnams// rtag par nyi dus gsum du// grogs po kun ma byin pas sa // lan gcig bram mched
14a5(rgyud): brgya la char yang mi phod do// de nas de ma cha lha'i dbang po dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i bu drug khris khro bo chen po 'i g.yob la bstod pa/ kye to brtse ba'i sems papa' 'on kyang 'khrug
14a6(rgyud): zheg// dga' zhing shin tu dag kyang ba'i tshogs smras// lha gi 'ams rnams kun la das kyi sbyin mtsho// phra len tshogs kun brgyal zhing rab tu sprugs bldang // srid pa'i nyon mangs sunas 'jig
14a7(rgyud): rdzogs mthu kyis// bdud rnams bkyil ni sgraganas ga pung ba ga ri thos// mig byed pa maho su tsas lani phyogs skrag/ cheb mni shin du me su khyod ci tha// phyogs padu ma sabyas
14a8(rgyud): mas kyis shin tu bsngags shing bstod// klu kun 'dus ni cha shas lus kyis phyogs par brgyan// lha dbang bu mo rnams kyis rin chen rgyan rab gsal/ 
14b1(rgyud): pa bstod// ba das nan pa yos pa ga bas dbacom ldan 'das pa mngon pa dana'o// gaganas pa mid ma' brtog pa la mas sbyin sreg
14b2(rgyud): dkyim chu bam pa bad de chos kyi dbang drug grags pas 'gyur bamo/ rgyag bskad du/ yAd+ya mtshalas hU~M guHtan+t+ra/ skad du/ 'phags pa rje
14b3(rgyud): ba'irigs rgyud chen to// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnon du gyu pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ska bdag gis pos padus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod chen 'i tshig sbyin gyi gnas na rab tu
14b4(rgyud): gyes shing bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rdo chos dang / phyag na rdo drung / sems bskyed ma thag tu
14b5(rgyud): chos kyi 'a'o bcoM bskong ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rjes tshub la sogs te rab tu dga' ma mtshogs dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis badz+ra k+Sha k+Shi d+he zhes
14b6(rgyud): dong gro 'os phyog mtshams gtams so// bsrungs ni 'dod du ba ladzin zhing / bgegs kyi skyo brgyan par mdzod// b+hU Ta nas bcom ldan 'das kyis te zhes gsung ma te sregs nas so
14b7(rgyud): ma k+Shu/ gapa ma sreg sa sdigasas su/  ga 'an// spyas sa das / 
15a1(rgyud): rtson 'grus gar byed rgyab du gnas// 'gugs byed ma ni shar du ste// rnam par 'ching ma lho ru god// gnyis med ma ni nub tu ste// rnam par 'phel ma byang du dgod/ 
15a2(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam tshig go/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las gleng gzhi'i la'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ba'i tshig rdo rje nas bya ba te
15a3(rgyud): snyoms pa bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs gnas 'oda'i spros te lta thams cad kyi dbul tshad cing tshim par gyur to// tshigs kyi bdag pos dpung rgyan par nyu to// de nas yang dag
15a4(rgyud): dbyab// dkyil la chen po dam pache// mcha ba mtshigs ni rnam par bstam// gzugs dang gra dang dridring ngo // reg bya ma pag med de// mtshad tsho tshogs kyis yang dan mchod/ 
15a5(rgyud): /  rnam par sngags sheg/ skum / gas sa gdon dpag da// rigs byed can ma kun na// srid pagasam da dkyis ba ga ma
15a6(rgyud): dring pa'i sub rnams/ sa sa 'dunamam rnams// sred dru nas tshig sa lags rje minam mnan// rangs drim ni sa man bstod/ 
15b1(rgyud): na pa 'a na so// de sa yang ga pa da byug/ sa byin ga shin dang // rlu ba dag gad sbyi kya bangs sogog// med sri rdzogs// 'thung ya 'i lta mdo/ 
15b2(rgyud): g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dad pashad phyag
15b3(rgyud): mim ni byas pa'i gzugs// pad ma sum rtseg dag tu bya// steng mi gzugs gzhag
16a1(rgyud): 'don na bya ldan pas// klung // des kya ga da// lam rdzog dka // sril du mi chu cheg/ 
16a2(rgyud): btud pa'i mtho ba wa// rgya mtsho 'ongs las sa blangs la// klu mi gzugs ni mngon gyis te// nam mkha' lding gi chubs byugs// ti la mar ma sbyin sred bya// de nas yang dag bshad papa/ 
16a3(rgyud): ma par se nga 'i nang dude// bsgrub bya gzugs gzhug 'ang dzas chos// rirab rtsem brgyad pakri// des ni yang de ga gnas par bya// shin tu rna ma'i lcags dag la// khru do da kyi ras kriH// ma
16a4(rgyud): dkar po mo steng du gzhag/ rla ba drug ni rig pa bzlas// ti la mar gyis ni bsdus byas nas// zla ba gzas rin chen bsgrug/ thogs pa'i mkha' la ldang par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha s+t+ra tra/ 
16a5(rgyud): ma dag la sa skams byas te// lcags gsum dag gis dkris byas te// shar bltas pas ni srung bar gnas// gzas zan tshan khar gzhug bya// mnyam par gzhag ste nyi shu bzlas/ 
16a6(rgyud): nan kyi mdod / ma ldan 'ad / denas pangs / sagazhi da dag/ 
16a7(rgyud): khregaH// da byer// zung sa kyi sbyin // rigs pa 'dzin pa'i ngos nub chog
16a8(rgyud): lha kus sbyin sreg bya// tshe'i rig pa ci pa po la thar// seM rjid gyi// gsang sngags nyi shu gcig bzlas nas// 'ad pa'i sasags sa dbang bar bya// dgyes pas pa
16b1(rgyud): stong par 'gyur// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las dngos grub kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su dgyes nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa dpas pa
16b2(rgyud): dam pa gamigs nas/  hU~M zhes kya ba'i sngags sa tes snang bar byar to// denams cad ga mchags kyi 'dag bdag pa mamed par te/ phyogs panan mngon du phyogs dam da ces
16b3(rgyud): / e ma bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che/ stong pa'i dngam ci skye bzhugs// bdag ni tshangs spyod byams pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa kun nas slong // e ma'i bde 'i chen po'i gru/ 
16b4(rgyud): na gyis ni ma spros pa// bdag ni rjes chags snying rje che// 'gro ba yang dag sgrol bar mdzad// e ma dri med dag pa'i sku/ 
16b5(rgyud): grob 'don rjes chags brjod// e ma 'don du dgu' mdzad ga/ dag sa ye shes dri 'das// bdag gis ga zhun gzung ban phyir// na can khyod ni yang dag pa zhengs// de nas bcom ldan 'das
16b6(rgyud): ba tu gyes te sku longs su rdzogs pa/ rdzogs par mdzad nas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag gsungs so// oM Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya/ sarba bi yAn ban+d+ha la hUM phaT/ gsang sngags/ 
16b7(rgyud): gas cad dpa dra ho// sa gas kyini tsu gas sa chen lags sngags kyi che ni 'o// cig sa mi mig papa 'i kud gsang pachen pangags
17a1(rgyud): D+yan ga du/ yon sa da tu tunA / snod da/ rnam ma po mas cadag gas gas pa'i da ces byag/ rna na phyag 'tsha/ 
17a2(rgyud): de das yang dag bshad kyag/ mas gsum na spang can gtsigs nas// zhes thams cad pad bya'i phyir// bcom ldan thugs de'i rang ba ni car// ne sdang mig la gad par mdad// ngos tad
17a3(rgyud): dge pa'i bdag/ sngags sgra phyag tu ting 'dzin dang // nam dag pas pa gtan brin las rnams// bcom ldan rdo tha chang chen gyis// du bakhrod 'ab ras bzugs pa'i ser// 'did pas 'atud de de sum
17a4(rgyud): kye yang dag khre chen ka tso// ma lus rnam dag la gnas phyir// mgon po mig yo'i gsang rgyud las// sems dpa' chen pom
17a5(rgyud): dpa' bdud khrod gnas pas legs// rus ba'i rkyen des phyag tu drug/ gnas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid de// rku bzhi tshad med pa ni du gnas// ye shes tog pa'i rtog pa'o// rgyun mchad pa ring
17b1(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i le'u snyed ma// // de nas yang dge bshad bya ba// gnyis med 'gyur ba legs pa ni// 'kho ba rtsam pa spyod kho na che// mgrin pa phreng ba'i rin chen 'byung // nam gzugs
17b2(rgyud): / dus payi rkyen don pa rgyag/ rnal ba snga na mdag / migs 'dod lags stog/ na nasu na lags/ snganas sna nam par ra// skyes bgadog da mra/ 
17b3(rgyud): lus la de da ga ti mug go/ yid la chos kyi dbang phyug ste// de kyil 'khor lum nyid nam dag pa// tsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te// ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do// 'dun cinam lnga tshon snga lnga/ 
17b4(rgyud): ste rog ga nyid de// so sen ba sA d+ha ra Na// snying gi dbus kyi lte ba nyid// phung po lnga 'i gcom// khams dang skye mched lha mor grags// 'byung ba cwo bzhi nyid de// 'dom gang gru bzhi rnam pa
18a1(rgyud): snan pan/ rgyas pama'o// tan k+ShaHtra~M/ gangag// ma ta shA dzu // / sngags kyi rnam par dag ma mchog pa'i dum grasas rlab / 
18a2(rgyud): sngags gas pa'i rkye sa sna pas/ 'phags pa meg so ba sngags rnam par dag pa'i ba ste ga rdzam pa'o// de nas la de dag bshad byag// lag zus gnyis med sbyong ba mas/ 
18a3(rgyud): 'tshogs rnams smos nas ni// gtso mo rabs kyi yan lag bkang // lag pa g.yas pas gshin rje'i gshed// g.yon pa gzhan gyis ma thub pa// rta mgrin kham bsam par bya/ 
18a4(rgyud): dpung pa shayas par mi g.yo'o// g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o// pus mo g.yas pa rab ma pa naM// dbyig pa rjod po char 'bra ba// pus mo g.yon par
18a5(rgyud): gtsug tor ma mis sbyar// gnod mangs rgyal po bsam pa ni// rkang pa gnyis pa dgod par bya// yang ni lab sum spong ba las// byang chub sems sprin pa du 'grolas/ 
18b1(rgyud): dug na sa gas// chos ba sas /  bzhin// gis mibak+ta bzhin ni// kun kya zhalags rgyags/ 
18b2(rgyud): nagyis brtan pa sa sgros// dngos grub lalamachog thob par 'gyur// dkyi nan tan bskyed pa / 
18b3(rgyud): pa phrul shad paraH/ rang sngagasas 'od la ba'i// kye+e migs can na da// na 'diganag /  nang/ sa kyis rnam pa rdzogs/ byug
18b4(rgyud): ba snams// phyag g.yas na ni bsdams par 'ad// rmugs mjigs mdu bzhags pa dang // dris bu dgra stag yon padi// dbang ral sogs tshogs bcas dang// ming 'dapagagasan sdug par
18b5(rgyud): kasesadog zhal gsum kya/ drug ga// spyan gsum gsus pa nor // ser dang gnag dang dmar 'dzin la// mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par rgyu// 'ja
19a1(rgyud): da drun // nams kyi phyag na rnams pa yang // snyi ga jigs mdzub nags pa dang // drim bu dgras g.yod par// ga'od rgya
19a2(rgyud): pa kyigs / phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs na // rnams skrag par ba dngas ma// nan gyi phyogs su bzhugs pa gyur// rang sngagams pa sa klula'o// tha
19b1(rgyud): rgyan pa chung bshegs bya chags// mthar byed rab tu bdabadza nas// sems can ngas su btum byas te// zhing rnams sangs rgyas tshogs kyis bkang // 'phags pa migs pa ma rtog pa las byung
19b2(rgyud): de gad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ne/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru nga gsang dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje bdud rtsegasang ba'i pad+mal 'azhugs so// gnas las brtsegs pa'i khang/ 
19b3(rgyud): mA ma kI dang thabs gcig tu// bcom ldan de chen rom te// de nas lha mos de zhus pa// gsang chen zhes bya cher gnas pan// rdo nga bdud ji skad kyi mchog/ sngon dun khyod kyis gsungs pa// 'du
19b4(rgyud): yini nub pa'i thabs// bde 'a che pos bka' stsal la// denas comaldan rdo rjes pa shad// de rje bdud ci dertenapa// bas ma med pa med sa ma ste// don mo snang pa las mdas pa// dam pa zhi
19b5(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje bris// mA ma kI chags dang ldan das// dong dud kyi ting 'dzi gyis// gas chen mngon sum du ni mang du// rgyud rnams kun la gsang
19b6(rgyud): sa de bdud mi mchog/ den bdig gis pa shadapa ste// brtan 'i brgyad ma da dang// dag 'a dzi mapas nyas spyod de// kyangs da kyim snyan gad+han pas sa// dadza du
19b7(rgyud): m+bur du 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi yul zhes gsul te// 'awal gsum nas paskyed / 
20a1(rgyud): chog/ mad bsgrub nas nis shad pa bya// sems nadon du ba do // cung 'od bdud / rnal 'akya shang gis shes grang ra// la
20a2(rgyud): grul 'grol// bstan du med pa natshe// dngos sul 'jig rten gsum bsgrub po// skugasung thugs kyi bsku bde na // sgrub pa rgyalan bde bstod// rdo rjepa du mnyam stong sa/ 
20a3(rgyud): do bdud rtsi byung bar bya// b+ha ga'i 'dam par btab ste// do mA ma kIs 'o btag// darje 'du kyi da che// bcom ldan rdo rje ma dag sangs so// b+haga'i bdam par bta pas// de sadaga'
20a4(rgyud): / rdo rje bdud rtsis las byung ba'i// nyams dga' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhus// cho ga'i rim pa gang gis ni// mchod pa dkyil 'khor ba rnam pa dbya/ 
20a5(rgyud): na kyi la na/ ga' che po da// / phacad kyi // desapa ldan mas// las // ma la / 
20a6(rgyud): shed nas 'di skad bka' stsa te// thug sa thugs kyi bsku 'dod dang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bsgral byed// dga' 'a chen po sbyong ba yis// mAm kIs ni 'dir bris pa// zu sum dkyis
20a7(rgyud): danas s+ho// g.yas pa la de dkar po 'ad// gas na du dam por de gsungs/ 
20b1(rgyud): / dang can/ du ni dkyis la bayang // rga ni 'azhi ba tu brtags// gang du thog nye pa 'anag ste// ston pa'i gus par 'gas byed ka/ rubyu
20b2(rgyud): t+yaM du tshogs kyi 'phre ma mo// mkhas pas padam 'dab brgyad la// rig ma brgyad ni mnyam por bris// mengs pa mo dpa ni pa'i nas// zla la dang dung can me// ri long 'dzin dang
20b3(rgyud): ribang 'dzin dam yid dga'// yid la bde bar byed ma dag/ rigam brgyad dang dge ma 'argyad// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sna tshogs gsun pade yad dag / 
20b4(rgyud): dpas dag di mtshams dgal// rtog pa 'i bri bar bya// mchod pa pi wang dza bzhin// de bzhin spos dang me tog mags// dbyangs dang gang dang mchod pa ni
20b5(rgyud): bde che// gsang ba'i 'khor la bsgrub par bya// ma dang bran mo bum dang // srid mo gnyen ma de bzhin te// rdo rje 'dud rtsi de dag las// blangs nas gsang ba dkyil 'khor mchod// ma las 'du
20b6(rgyud): blangs pas de// rdo bdud rtsi dang mnyam 'gyur// sring monod med nas gnod// rdum la ni 'ad kur sbyar// bram gyi mnadon yod zag// gsang ba'i dkyil lakho la 'dod byas/ 
20b7(rgyud): // sems pa dru gra // dang da kyi da// de nas sna ba co grang // 'du tshul gyis te// 'du ma thams par 'dod paspyod// 'das dang du cas/ 
20b8(rgyud): rabatag zer ni shin tu brkyang // byed pa'i bcing pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa gsum dag ni bsgrub par bya// sha chen dang de khrag chen gyis// de bzhin bshang gci dzu ba dag/ 
21a1(rgyud): nyon dang rten du bskur ba bya// rdo bdud rtsi bad che// gal te dngos grub 'dag 'dod/ do'i mdon rnams ma cad de// sgrub pa pos ni mchog tu bsdub/ 
21a2(rgyud): dbang dang dgug dang 'thab pa dang // gsod dang bslad pa la mags pa// rdo rje bdudu rtsi bde chen pas// bya thams cad lda/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan dongs de gsungasas/ 
21a3(rgyud): gshegs bathapa yad kyi nga/  da gas kyi da rjid kyi dzin pa 'dong da chags maud kyi la med byed pa'i ma tshum bstan pa'i se
21a4(rgyud): de nas mgu ba'i lha mdo// pad ma rgyas pa'i mA ma kI// brtan po 'khyud pa byas nas su// dbang po thams cad la 'o btab// ma mchu so so gzung 'o btab ste/ 
21a5(rgyud): ni 'do pa // rdordo ba sa pas srul men// po can gyi sags kyis te// bad ma darje sngags pa// chags na dga' 'dod bya// yi sla ska pa skrun pas dang // kon me
21a6(rgyud): sogs// lha lo ShA ma kI dang rtse// rdo/ bdud rtsi bde ched pas// dum bzung laganyi byas te// sed mor mos gdapa' bya// de la nas ni 'ad byas te// steng tshig la yang blta bar bya/ 
21a7(rgyud): ba'i 'ad+mar rog tab nas// dga' ba'i tshig kyang 'arjod par bya// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI// lha mtshan mo lags so chags// gtan du 'dod la cha gru pa yis// bdag gis khyod la dka' bar bya/ 
21a8(rgyud): gang nig 'dod pa khyod kyis zhus// khyod la bdag gis mchog tu sbyin// de
21b1(rgyud): dpa / 'phrul mengs/ ma gyis ma 'dzid // stso nam pa gnyis gsusate// phyid na du bcas pa'o//  gzugs kyi srung ba sag// 'thu
21b2(rgyud): kun ngogs ste/ tshogs gzod mi namo 'o// 'ams gsus dang ni ma mam pa// de gcig sa ma thong ste// thams cad nam shem 'do'o// ci ni sems can bdag med rnams// nga
21b3(rgyud): shes thangan ci tan bayin// kun sems stegs ma kyi mi rnams kyis// 'gal nas pa ma yin no// sem sems ma byung sems kyi // ye shes shes byang sa nyid// thams cad nam
22a1(rgyud): /  n-i 'an//  cin gnas//  don nasate//  sem kyi nga dag/  chos men
22a2(rgyud): /  sag du rgyun / sa mas can sbyi na 'di/  ga sa nas par bya
22a3(rgyud): mtho sa pa yang // marnams pa dang ni myanga' yang // reg dang 'de ba'i langs spyod no// las dang me tog phreng ba dang / 
22a4(rgyud): snang ba dang ni gzung ba rnams// rol dang kun tu 'gro ba dang // bdug dang de bzhin nyal ba dang // sad pa dang ni log pa dang // thams cad zil ma mthong bas// ba'adudang de bzhin tshong dang / 
22a5(rgyud): srog ga nga de// dmas da sangasate/ tshigs ga gi phyug/ smon ma sa /  da gas / 
22a6(rgyud): rdo rdza bdud rtsi bde ba ma// de yis de nyid 'grub pa'o// gang de bdud rtsi
22b1(rgyud): de bas de dag par byed na// chags bral zhes gsung kun rig pas// de dag gas chen mchog de// zhal pa 'angam kyi rgyo bar bshad// sna tshogs rnam snang mdzad sogs pa/ 
22b2(rgyud): sa sha pa / nan ga shegs pa da kyi sring dgas nas ci zi rji kyi das chen da du ma chu chen pom na nyi kyi 'i shes bsta pa
22b3(rgyud): / de nas ma thu po das// ga du su kyis pacan te// 'di dag nga na blangs nas sa// sems dpa' chen po dgyes par byed// phyung ma dadu bde chen rdo rdzams/ 
23a1(rgyud): 8//  pa /  na//  dag / ga rgya gnyis can pa spru pa// lci phyag tu yang dag
23a2(rgyud): // de dug gi sngags de ltar lags// sngags rnams gangams skyel lags// kyad pa ni skanams kyang // sta ni bdag sa tshoman// mdor bsdu nas ni bdag la gsungs/ 
23a3(rgyud): de bdud ci 'di chen po// bcom ldan da can 'di gsangs// phyag rgya sngags dga'athung ba ni// bshad nyon cig lAm kI// phyag rgya rnam pa gsul gzungs te// rtswa da da gsung da nga zugs
23a4(rgyud): shA ni phyag rgya mchog 'gyur te// gsung ni phyag rgya sngags kyi las/ 
23a5(rgyud): nyon cig sngags rnams mtshan nyid ni// dang po rnam snang mdzad sbyor to// badz+ra ma br-i ta ma dA lu ga/ sa bon pa ne dang mnyam ldan sa// sa sA yi ge yang
23b1(rgyud): te/  na ni mnyam ldan pa// chog/ bcang dag na 'o byal pa gang //  la tun kyi rnam ra brgyan/ 
23b2(rgyud): dpa da byas // snyam rdzogs kyis sngags kya // sungs da shezugs nas ni// nyon cig skal pa sa te// de'i ma // sa di rgyad de rdzogs dge byas/ 
23b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dang ldan la// sA hA le ge mnyam par ldan// dngos grub sems cad rab sbyin rnams// bzhi de sgo srungs kyi yin te// 'di ni spos dang du be sogs/ 
23b4(rgyud): ni mi gos ga bzhil// sAH rnam par snang mdzad yang // lha mo gsang ba'i mA ma kI// ngas gas sun gyis mchod par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje sa de gsungs so// de bzhin
23b5(rgyud): shegs pa thams cad kyi sku nga gsung dang thugs ci rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtse bde ba chen po rdo rje bdud ce chun chen po las sngags phyung bar bstan pa des bya ba'i le'u gsum pa'o// 
23b6(rgyud): gapas dag gi/ tshig de rim pa bshad pa \u0f7f//  kyi nachis// sugasu gas de bsgrub pa yin// se // de bzhid dang nga mngon spyod nga// mam
23b7(rgyud): shes//  das da// na// deji du kyi ngasadapa' ci dag/  nas ga sa
23b8(rgyud): // khams gsung rnam par rgyal phru das// nang gnyis zhams brgya
24a1(rgyud): mnyam da rnaM ma g.yos// sa myong bar byed ma thag/ sa la rigan rab s+ho'o// deras bshegs rnams bgranganas pa// gzhanas lan gas
24a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// phyinas sa yi lha mo dgug/ oM e h+ye hi sa mchi// sa yi brtan pa 'jig rten lug// ran chen thams cad rab rdzogs pa'o// da kyis ngargyad byed ma// tang du
24a3(rgyud): / rdo mdzad//  da nam //  tshigasas rtsu par lasaH// shag zugs sa // kyi
24a4(rgyud): byid pa rnes bya mi mas ni// gachen gyi ni tham pa bya// de nas rigs 'dug byas// / gdol pa du shA nas// ga sa 'das dang bram pamo// de yon nin rgyal 'dong/ 
24a5(rgyud): rigs mdang rgyang rigs so// dri dang spos kyis mchod byas te// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// lan lag yul yi ge'i// b+ha ga'i dbus su li ke hUM// spyan ma gos dag pas/ 
24a6(rgyud): khru phyed pa la brkos das su// dkar rtsi mon gyis lhag par bri// kun stsal bar 'a tshul lta nga// glo ngu 'anyam por bri ba'o// rgyas pa la ni khru da ste// del bu gangasarko'ang// rdu
24a7(rgyud): 'amanyam du// thugs dang bcag gis bri ba'o// mngor su sa ni rung gsu ma ste// sor nye ni yangs pa'iched// nyi shu phyed ne par byas na/ 
24b1(rgyud): thugs 'bri// de ni sa gsug pag// rnags yang dag hom rung yang dag ston nas su// phyogs kyi ma yang bstan par bya// byang du 'dzi pa pa
24b2(rgyud): gas pas da kye// rna di sha du pa// mngon spya ma stan te// dbang ni dub rgyakhan pashad// da ga dang bskad ma bzhin no// mngon spyod rtag par nag tsaH/ 
24b3(rgyud): sa ni dbang sogs bya// 'bras dang til dang 'o ma dang // mar dang spang kyi lhan cig par// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// zhi ba rgyas pa sbyin sreg bya// bsreg shing rnams kyang thams cad la// dri nam
24b4(rgyud): lo can shing ngo // sna tshogs ras sam gtor ma yang // 'byung po thams cad sbyin par bya// gtor ma gang yang sgrub pa pos// khrag 'thung phyag rgya chen pos sbyin// gang zhig yid kyi 'dod pa'i/ 
24b5(rgyud): ga tu rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// dbyar gyi dus mi ni ba ste// rgyas pa de bzhin dgun gyi dus// dpyid ka mngon spyod pas rnams ni// sgrub pa pos ni thams cad bya// shar dus ni rab tu gsungs/ 
24b6(rgyud): byas pa de bzhin srod la ste// nyin byed la'am na ma byed pa// rtag par mngon su kyir ma// tog khung dbras su me ma lha// mig zugs bskyed nas su// nal nigadangs pa bas ma byas te// mid theg
24b7(rgyud): la dbul pa bya// sbyin sreg sa p+lag zu // mdun du mngon su lon 'gyur// dngas ma ni dug rgya// thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas// 'od ze phreng bakhrugs drag
24b8(rgyud): ngas rgyas byang chub 'gru' ba'o// yongs kyid/ 'dipe ga shogs gdan mi bar byed// me lha mngon sum dngos grub // drag po khams gsum gyims sodapa/ 
25a1(rgyud): 6la pa// 'di dag yon yang bzhes nas su// nabs gapon pa rjes kyang ro chen// oMt+ma hUM phaT paTas hA// dang pas ni yon dbul te// byinas wAb shos
25a2(rgyud): smos me dag pade// mar+tha ma par bya de/ nas nas byin gyis bdu bdug so// hUM smos kyi grags so// me sna tshogs /  drirna ma pa// tshogs gzung rnam brgyan pas// 
25a3(rgyud): yi ga las byung // dri 'di 'thus te bzhes phun sol// d+hu rI'i sngagasas// dang por mchod pa'i tshi ga ni// mtsham med par sel bya// phyenas rang gi yid mi lha'i// bad+ma sngags reg par brjod pa bya/ 
25a4(rgyud): byangs dag du bas rnams kyi// rnam pa dum to// dge ya dang na sgrub pa po'o// tshogs pa mchod pas mnyes par bya// gas te ngos ba dag dodan// zug sung gas // 
25a5(rgyud): pa me ltango 'dzin// mchod par byas nas rdzogs par \u0f7f/ oM maM skalas ni bub par ma dang// sems can thams cad bde dren// sdugasung drugapa dang sa grung don du// lha rnams las ni
25b1(rgyud): sa kyi de rje can po bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i de bdud ci chud chen po la sa sbyin sreg gi tshig bstan pa chen pa'o// / khyod la mig slan bshad par bya// cha chen gyi
25b2(rgyud): ba yi// ban da la ni du pa slang // 'as pa'i mni ci ba sregs nas su// khrog chen dang na bsres par bya// mtshan ma la ni btags nas sa// ning mor bye ba 'onar bya// byi rgod dung bkang nas
25b3(rgyud): mi yi rus pa'i rlung mang gis// mig la bskus nas gzugs kun ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis byed// rdorang bdud rtsi las byung ba'i// mig sman dngos grub sbyor bani/ 
25b4(rgyud): chu bzhil// b+ha ka'i dbus su bsgrub par bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang 'gugs las byad do// sna tshogs drag pa'i gdon rnams dang // zhag bzhi pa yo rims dang dug/ thams
25b5(rgyud): med par byed smra mo// dga' ma khyod la bden par bshad// rgyal po la bab mchen por mchod// dgra bo rnams kyang bang byed de// de bzhin bgegs kyang 'gag par byed// mig sman lda na pa rabasmra bar bya
25b6(rgyud): 'dod pa gzugs can mig yangs ma// bshang gse bgal dag byed ma// 'al gsus phyag drug pa'i so// drag pa'i gsags ma te// rdo / ihU~M swA hA/ 
25b7(rgyud): das de dag // de khon pazhi de gal di dkar// g.yon de dmar por de ga nas// g.yas phyogs ras zil kho lo car// g.yan du zhags pa dang lcags su/ 
26a1(rgyud): dran sa gas// rkyenas ga gag / des yo par byang ga/ 
26a2(rgyud): sa /  na da/ ma pag gis na// bud ma dang ldan gyur// rgyal pa bas na
26a3(rgyud): dgra bo rnams ni 'de pyod// dur du sa ga'i bras drangs te// bdud ci dang ni bsres byas na// zhalags madrug pa ga nasmras dang ne// gshin rje mig shed grab zlas nams// sharten
26a4(rgyud): ldan byas te/  bras la sbyin pa// rta tu myos nas la nas pa// me na rnams nas shi gyur ro// ma~M lo rten nasas nA shal/ snyim
26a5(rgyud): nag bdun gyis ri shi 'gyur ro// bshapag ci brag dang 'asres pa yi// 
27a1(rgyud): gcig ra// bzang po dad na la na'o// rgyad ni rnams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sgrub pa pa yang mdun tho'o// bzang phre de bzhin drang // rje bu'achen pa brib bya/ 
27a2(rgyud): gto ma gtor mamatshad rdzas dang// tshad kyims yod dga' grod mchod// nag cad dang brgyab ni ka/ dkyila'i 'i bas ne rdu che 'das// dbus kru ni rkye 'o// gral te
27a3(rgyud): grub mchog 'dod na// sngags yig gcig pa gtso bo ni// rdo hUM ma da bsgrub par bya// phye nas slob dpon la mchod pa// bdag gam rgyal srid dbang nyid dam// bran mo bu ma de bzhin du/ 
27a4(rgyud): mdang sring mo dbul bar bya// sdug sung thugs kyi bsgrub pa yi// dngos grub zhil te bdag 'dod na// khams gas rnas rgyal las byung ni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgrub par bya// 
27a5(rgyud): dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi las krung ngo // bdud rtse lnga dang mnyam ldan pa// ngan seng thams cad med byed pa// rdo rje seg la mnyam kyis// dpal ldan rdo rje hU~M mdzad 'grub/ 
27a6(rgyud): rab 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'o// byang sems rnam par sprul par gsungs// len grangs du mar rig ma dang // dkyil 'khor du ni rol par bya// b+ha ka'i dbus la myang byis pa// gang dag dpa' bo
27a7(rgyud): laganas// pa mar la yis na byas nas// bdud ci rig thang // lag pa minas ma'o// gnas ni srang mebya// sna bu na rig nag/ ma lags pa 'thas/ 
27a8(rgyud): re mchen mos kyang phyung nas// darjel yang 'ogatab po// de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// khruba'i gzugs can bdud rtsi ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan dri rje de gsus / 
27b1(rgyud): dpanan gshegs pa thams cad rje skud dag sung dang rmugs kyi rdo rje \u0f7fna rje bdud rtsi bdab chen pa 'ad rnga bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen sems de dza d+ha mdzad kyi sgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u drug pa'o// 
27b2(rgyud): denas rnam mA ma ki/ dga' ba'i sa la ras tshugs pa sa// 'i'i ma skye nas rgyan bya na// gyings 'di dan ni ched du 'a/ dam tu skye na pa sra// dpa' gzhan gyis yongs
27b3(rgyud): sko ning // phyag rgya ma tshogs mnyam ldan pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// skyon rkyenam mkha' dang 'dra ba// nga ri bung ba smra nas ltar// bzhal par bzhugs pa skal bzang ba// rdo rje
27b4(rgyud): bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad mdzes// yang dag dbang po lam gyis ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ma lus pa yi khams gsum la// rdo rje bdud rtsi dang
27b5(rgyud): bad pas// nyi shu rtsa ba ni rigs chen mo// shin tu chags pas dag byed pa// na po rdzas dang bcas pa'i sku// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ma lus pa yi khams gsum la// ut+pal sngon
27b6(rgyud): po'i 'dab ma lta bur phyag sngob// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje khyod kyis bdag nang de// shin tu dga' ba'i rjes su chags pas langs spyod cig/ khams gsum la che bsgrub par bya ba'i dod
27b7(rgyud): byer// gyad ni skyon med dam pa'i stong pa las// leg 'brus de rjes gyur ba'i mgon pa kyang // rlu dang mi thugang gis khyod mthong nas// de dag la bor rab du gal 'gro// de ltar dbyang ni blangs ra / 
27b8(rgyud): rnam bya// rked pa den sa dang // da di'i nas gang// nam ma da do// rje kyim pa dang/ da papa'i ches pa/ 
28a1(rgyud): ba yis// dngos pa med par 'gro khyab pa// byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu// dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas// nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin// 'gro ba'i donan
28a2(rgyud): shes pas kyang // ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya// dbyangs kyi thung du nyin mor bai shrad// ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad// dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba yis// de nyer med las sbyar
28a3(rgyud): bya// e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung // de nyid gzhan las de nyid gsal// de las 'jig rten pa yi brda// myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// byang chub
28a4(rgyud): sems 'di thos pa dang na tso bo rnam snang chen po las// khyab bdaka la ni slar gsol pa// sems can thams cad skyed pa po// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// de bas dngos po
28a5(rgyud): med gyur kyang // srid pa dag tu rab tu grags// byang chub sems nimakha' mnyam pa// legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po// skye bo mchog la de bstan
28a6(rgyud): gsol// sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsam zhig/ shes nas chung la rgyab kyis phyogs// 'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes// ma 'ongs pa na smrab pa gyur// bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag/ yin
28a7(rgyud): zhes spar zhing byas pa 'jig/ des ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems// ji bzhin don du mi shes so// de bzhid 'jig rten pa rnams ni// skul med chos kun nam spangs la// rig pa yang
28a8(rgyud): demi mthong bas// de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur// de bas byang chub sems bdud rtse// de ni smra bar rigs pa yin// 'bral ba nyi ma thob pa ni// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'grub
28b1(rgyud): rnam pa gnas phyi //  kyi shes pa // bdag don gi yin // dpyo zhes 'ad sbyin// 'dug pas kya 'dug gsangs // gags
28b2(rgyud): 'dzin du 'gyur// ston du med pa gas pa 'di// nan tan du ni gas par bya// skyon can mi dang ga yo chen men// dam tshig sa ni mi ldang ba// chad par lta ba med pa la// blam la chags 'dul ba can/ 
28b3(rgyud): phrag dag chags pa sring byed pa// dkyil la lo bas ni zhugs pa dang // rdo bstan po'i zlab sa da// des rgyas pa'i bstan pa 'di// de bzhin nyid mchog bshad par bya// srib dpon dag ma dang ldan nas/ 
28b4(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo can de / bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
28b5(rgyud): da chen po mos dbyungs dang gang di dbang bsrung ba dang / de bzhin nyid tshe dmigs pa dag bstan pa zhes bya ba lab bdun pa'o// // de nas lha ma yang yangs nas// bzhed nas 'di dag grub ste/ 
28b6(rgyud): na 'i/ da dag bskyed do// ni dz+rags de na mas/ rbaba'i gnag sa gtsu/ de nam bcom ldad ldan// rdo rje du kyi dichen
28b7(rgyud): me sa byor // rbaci gzugs nernam par byung/  ze khrugs drag // 'jigs byed pa yang 'jigs par byed// nam yin pa \u0f7f/ btsuni// thod pa'i
29a1(rgyud): pharba yig sngags kyi dngocan// 'thung ba yangs chags padang // du khrod la ni rol ma drags// de 'og dbang dang bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa khyab 'dun
29a2(rgyud): dbang phyug che// bab byed do rnga can chen po// de sa ldan khrag 'azu ga zugs ni byung // dang po'i dzinam 'jigs can pa// me sdug gdol pa smai sha can// ser mi rigs can dag mdang/ 
29a3(rgyud): 'jigs par byed ma brgyad du 'dod// sngags 'di dag ni ba zla byas te// gar yang byed nas dbyangs blang ngo // 'jigs byed chen pomatshol gtsigs// zlum phreng gi rgyan spyad brgyan// sha chen da/ 
29a4(rgyud): dgasol byed pa// dpal ldan khrag 'azung bdag phyag la/ sgrub pa rnams pan byed phyir// bzlam pa'i sngags ni bshad par bya// gsum pa ni gsum 'a/ 
29a5(rgyud): byor// bdud pa'i yang gsum pa ste/ sakyi tshig ni gnyis po myor// kun pa de bzhin nyid ldan te// mi ga byid kyis rnam par brgyan// drug pa'i ni byung byas te// bdun pa'i ma
29a6(rgyud): daHpa'is nyid gdon pa'i// sA rnam thar gzhog na // dang rnam par snang ma da sa// bag zung 'a gas yinan// sngags kyi rnam pa 'di nyid
29a7(rgyud): ma nyan cig mA ma kI// lan cig gyis sdigs bklan na// skad TIg 'jig rten gsum gshe/ khams gsungs lus pa rnams kyang // rnam par byed pa'i tshe chom med/ 
29a8(rgyud): dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur ro// rdo rje bdud rtse pad chenag// bamam ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de sa gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
29b1(rgyud): sram sas kyid can dang du chen pa pa na pa zhesacad pa'o// de dang bdud ci kyim / dad
29b2(rgyud): pa// nal gsum pas rgyags/ te// drag pa nag bdud pa 'o// 'dir phrengs zugs pa dang /  myed de dam ra// dbar pa'i srid pa / 
29b3(rgyud): kyag na das kyi snrungs brtson pa/ rten shing de zhugs pa dang /  rdzogasapa // sA rdzogs par byed/ @9mtsha
29b4(rgyud): rigs brgyad mnyamadzad zheg// nalungs dang mang ya da// gas pa'i dmate// 'das gas pa ched ni bzhod// bded cem dang 'a cenas// bdud ci
29b5(rgyud): de dag ma mogar byed nas// tshogs gzugs rnam 'amachog sbyin ma/ ban ma chos pa ras byed do// sngags kyi rgyam po byungs // rnam par sna nasangs mnas/

30a1(rgyud): /  gde'i rgyan gnaganas// rdo rje dad ci ba chen po/ dus tan par de ma sa// de bani
30a2(rgyud): da kyi da / na na 'ju dang 'du pa du kyi chud ce ma la de
30a3(rgyud): de zhin po sang sa sreng 'di// 'dags nas she' marnams ni// mtshan thams cad de kun rdzogs pa// gdol pa mo dang sle sha can// khyim chos mnapa 'a de dgan// mdzes pa pa rang sa mam dang// 
30a4(rgyud): ma bcurtsa gnyis sngagasaste/ ma ni he shUHswa bskyed// bud med pa 'i nags ste//  mas bkrab kyi// sngags dang sman khyor mebal// gzung cad da dag po mas//

30b1(rgyud): rab sngags// grang dadang ni zlang pa dang // na mdzes de bzhin na gnas// drag sa nags lcags bu yin// bajug 'ardegs pas dra sa byed rnams// nal gcig pas phyags pa
30b2(rgyud): tanam da pa ma pa// nam pa tshogs mdza pa'o// de das dpa' bsgrus pa 'is/ sa can byas/ da pa'i grongs
30b3(rgyud): pa// khrag 'thung gzugs ni sgom byed pas// de la cang te'u brdungs nas su// gar byed cing ni lang bar 'jug/ de'i snying khar gnod pa'i sngags/ 
30b4(rgyud): / khrag chen gyis ni gtor bar bya// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags chen de// sgrub pa po sani ba zlas ma thar// khro dang ldan pa'i ag bcer bya// ra sangs kyis na gang sngags byed// de tshe ga
30b5(rgyud): pas mi 'jigs te// khrag 'thung sngags ni dran par bya// langs pa'i ro langs de las kyang // sgrub pa pol 'di skad smra// dpa' chen po kyi las 'a yang / 
30b6(rgyud): sranas 'og dang // mkha' la zla bar 'dad pa dang // sgrub pa pas da gang 'dod pa// las de dag de bsgrib par ba gyi// de nas bsgrub pa pa yiche ne// yid la gang dang gang 'dod paspang // de la ma'
30b7(rgyud): /  chog su /  'o// zug ga do dang // la pa pa de ya // de bdu rtsa pa
31a1(rgyud): drugag byin nas migasonas// mi nga ba// ti zugs la//  te// bcom ldan sa med// sems cadan kun gyi yi la gnas/ 
31a2(rgyud): ltar rnam pa gang gis ni// de bzhin nyid de thob par ba rtse// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bzhad pa mdzad nas gsung 'di de// spyan yang phyinas bka' stsal pa// 
31a3(rgyud): 'od sngon bzhin bshad pa ste// bdud rtsi gzugs ni lub yin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan byas te// rtag par rgyun du myang bar bya// rjes ni ze rimam thu dag ni// bshad pa nyon cig mA la kI/ 
31a4(rgyud): ye shes shes bya sgrub byed pa'i// khub dngas par bza' bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du// brag chen rab tu bsgrub bya ste// gang zhi ga sud mad rnams kyibs// bu ma la ni rtag tu blang / 
31a5(rgyud): za 'o// dod byed // shA da na// chen pa yang tsa ste/  ni tshunas dang 'gags pa'im// gzul dubasadapa gnon/ 
31a6(rgyud): zab cing bstan pa mir byed na// tshe dang dad mdo pa lalar 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod pa'i bde ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub grub pa dang // de sems dpa'abazhin du tshe// 'dod kun 'bras des
31a7(rgyud): / derje bu dang bshang gcin// rangags 'aka' bar rig par bya// phye ma zhib mar byas pa la// khrag chen gyis ni bsre bar bya// snga drod bzhi nyin byed dang / 
31b1(rgyud): gsusanas nas nas 'byung bas// dedas pa de tung // nyen dang nyi dbum pa kau/ rgyum 'am gang sgra ba byed pa// lus la nad ni med 'thar zhing // rnas pa'i nad kyang med par byed// skal ba 'ang
31b2(rgyud): rgyas pa'i mdangs ldan pa// rgyal ban mang rgyal bar 'dred// de de 'dod bkun sbyin pas// mchog bang bye thob pa yin// rnam 'byor dbang su shes te// de rje sems dpa' yan tan rdzas/ 
31b3(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang bas grol nas// brkam pa brag dog rnam spangs nas// de rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// de yis sgrub pa 'grub pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud 'di ni// don mang gsang ba'i rim pa can// 
31b4(rgyud): ma lus rdo rje theg pa 'di// 'di las byung 'gyur lha mo rtse// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kIs// 'dod chags kyis re bde 'gyur bas// gyad pa dam pa'i dngos ston na/ 
31b5(rgyud): 'di ni gsang chen dam pa yin// yid dag kun gyi bdag la gnas// byang chub sems dpa' ma shes te// gzugs med stong pa mi 'gyur bas// de de nyid rin chen po// deng skyi gtsug nor bar 'dod/ 
31b6(rgyud): shi tugs padas gams // pa dang // nas ti ma thub mchog 'dod na// dun dug bstan pa dang // blam gas shAl zhugs pan// de sasbyin nas de nga
31b7(rgyud): bstan// rdo ji dud rtsi rnyed 'don// 'di lung shin tu mob dka'ag/ 5 rdzogs pas smral pang zhe// ma 'dus pa byed// de je bdud kyi chung chen // ba pa mig
31b8(rgyud): sa bya mas mas kyis// des su rgyas kyabyed de// rgyas de na// 
32a1(rgyud): 'khor ba las 'dren gco nas gsungs// rdo bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// rdo rje bdud ci rgyud chen po// ston pa dga' mal bstan nas/ 
32a2(rgyud): thabs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// / shu rdzam skus rba kad+ha/ rgya gar skad du/ gul lo ka mA r+dz+nyA ma sha
32a3(rgyud): nam/ bod skad du/ rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon pa lnga bcu ba zhes bya ba dpal ldan rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon pol phyag 'tshal/ 
32a4(rgyud): nanyes med sngags mi ra bshad bya// dam tshig sbyar ba nges par grol// bya ba dus tshod rnam par spangs// de nyid gsum ldan yang dag
32a5(rgyud): // 'jig rted mgon po 'gro ba'i bdag/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa'i lha// mthong dang ma mthong 'bras rab ster// de 'dir sngags ni mtshungs med pa// bla ma 'anal la rnam par gnas// 
32a6(rgyud): drag chen 'jigs byed lus la ni// lnga pa'i thig le dang bcas shing // rnam gcod dang po yang dag ldan// chen po lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lce gnyis yan lag med gnyis gnas// lus gsus
32a7(rgyud): sngags mchog sa// yi shen pas kyi bsdu ba las// mtshan nyid tshig bzhin du bzlas// 'di ma rjes dran sngags pa yis// gtsang ngam yang namig ma
32b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ldan dang yang dag ldan// dus chod rags las ram de
32b2(rgyud): krol// ce gcig sems ni gzo ma byed// sgrib pa dang bral mtshungs pa ye// mchog gi bsam gtan yang dag sbyar// rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las sngags kyi de khon nyid
32b3(rgyud): le'u ste dang pog// snying ga lam sa nang song ba'o// de nyid gzha dang gzhan du 'gro// dbye ba nyis 'gyur de las ne// ye shes nyid ni kun greH// mi 'brur dga' ba'i yul rig pa// sems
32b4(rgyud): rjes su rtogs pa can// bya ba de'i bde 'dod phyir// rtogs pakun nas 'jug par 'gyur// de me ba rtogs nyid 'jug/ de sems dga' ba'i spyod yul la// bya ba dang ni las rnams kun// tshig dang
32b5(rgyud): bcas pas tsham med// thamam gtan rnal 'byor yang dag ldan// brgyan par dgod kya ldan gyis// 'gro kun dag yi rang bzhin gyi// sa steng sa 'on mdza'i me snyab// sde ba'i pad+mar pad // rna
32b6(rgyud): gsung nam mkha'i mangs ba// pad ma mi phyag tu yang dag ldan// nam mkha' phyag rgya'i bdag nyid bzhin// srag 'bab pa yi med dkyis ni// gnas gnyis po yis gam pa gyi// de bzhin rab tu
33a1(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi le'u sde gnyis pa'o// // rang bzhin bsam gtan dang bcas shing // rA ti mtshal kyi 'od zer ba zhin// se 'bru leb rgan me tog bzhin// mi kred par/ 
33a2(rgyud): da chungs gas/ sa kyi m+bu'i so// skas gcig phyag ni bzhi // mkha pa pa'i gad na/ gas// rgyam bdaganags byab sdums/ ga sbyi phyag zhes pa
33a3(rgyud): dag ros// ma ga no rjes rnam par brgyad// pad+ma'i phyag dang spyad gsul po// gci 'dzi dab tshogs sku// dpa' bo dbang lhag 'gro ba'i migado// rnal 'byor ba'i zugs dgyes pa/ 
33a4(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// sngags rnams kun sa bsam gtan bya// gang dag gang gis bsgom pa yis// rnal 'byor sems par gyur pa'i phyir// de ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// med
33a5(rgyud): dir rdong mchog bzhin no// snyun dag masan// de bzhi dag de sa sang byed// dang de dkrugapa 'i nyis// sgra mdog dpa dzurnam par bas ma// dub dam ba'i 'ad mdo/ 
33a6(rgyud): rlung gi bris pas// dgra bo rnams ni nyer sbed pa// 'dir de 'i mam med par byed// dub skya 'od med pa 'o// rnam par ne sdang des stongag// gas ba la ni bdog gnag/ 
33a7(rgyud): rengs pa la ni ser po shim// lug gi steng du gnas pa la// rkan gyis bar du rnapa phug na// srid pa gsum du kang gang gnas// thams cad rab tu rmongs par byed// gzhan dag rmongs pas senag/ 
33a8(rgyud): // don mang tshig ni sa 'dus pa// 'dzig rten gsum rgyalas rnams so// man tan brgyad dang ldan pa sa// rgyu gzhan rnam pa la nye grung ba// gsusus da sa khrims shar ba re/ 
33b1(rgyud): don bsam gtan sbyar ba yis// bya ba 'di la the tsham med// gang ni na lha ni nam mkha'i mtshungs// mdon dbye bamam ma ste// 'jig rten gsum na gar spyod pa'i// las rnams thams cad bya ba'o// 
33b2(rgyud): skal pabar byed pa'i srogs rnams de// de shi'i chu skye 'bum songag// rnye skyes bya // dang po sogs pa yang dag bsgrung// migags pa da // rnyed du 'grob gsum
33b3(rgyud): na pas// ye rnams las ni rtag pasgrams pa// rnal 'byor ma rnam nams gan so// rnam pa gsum kyi 'jug par byed// pad+ma ga zigs ldan myur pas mdzod// ta ke ts+tsha rgyun du rnal 'byos/

34b1(rgyud): sa// gzhan du byis pa mongs pa yis// drab 'dzin par 'dod pa bzhin// gang da ga rang bad sbyor bral bas// lus rnams bsgrub pa mchod min// gang gis gsum gsum gnas skabs
34b2(rgyud): kazab// 'di// rten mgon pa nyid nges nas// su 'dzin thas pa'i dam yab bzhed// 'jig ted dam na pa'i ga la// zhes pa ni dpal pad+ma bar ba'i na chen pams snang ba

35b1(rgyud): deltar bcom ldan pa ga rten mgon pos gsungs// de tshe 'jig rten dbang phyug las rnams rab tu gsungs// ku ruklu 'i ri mo'i lugs// ka shig bris pa tsam gyis ni// bsgrul pa
35b2(rgyud): bral rdzob pa// drinam yang dag pasha paraH// me mkhan ni ga na gags// chos grangs gang dung dus gangs// stsol ma 'byung pa bzhin// de ni bdag gis / 
35b3(rgyud): bakhan ni gang zhig gis// gang gi mig nid mar 'gyur zhing // lag pa de bzhin rkang pa dmar// bya yi mig can a n+ya'i rkang// des ni sgrol ma bri bar bya// dpyid kyi phra ba dang po yi// me nang me
35b4(rgyud): brgyad nyid// thun ni byed dang gnyis pa la// sprul ma'i mig ni bri bar bya// mang ragasum bapal ning nya la sogs// sha dang chang yang spang bar bya// dmar po gos kyang rtag tu bag/ dmapa
35b5(rgyud): dri yis rtag tu byug/ byams pa'i sems ni bskyed byas la// tho rangs khrus byas bsangs nas sa// lan gsum gos ni brjes nas su// dbang du byed ma yang dag bri// zhal gcig yig ni
