35b7(rgyud): sa kaca na dang rol paza' bar bya ning / de nas pad+ma re ga na la stod gsogs dmar pa'i gas dang bcas pas rin pa che'i rnam dang / rin pa cha cod pan dang / gams pas mi ba rigs pa sbe pa dang / 
35b8(rgyud): gnyis pas mda' snga rtser 'gengs pa/ g.yan pas gsu 'dzin pa dang / ut+pa sa dpar pa gnyis pan bsdams pa dang / 'od dpag meng rtsod par gas pa'i'i khrag dgar pas de'o/ 
36a1(rgyud): ku sros pa ga tuni lha gcan 'dzin do// de'i steng du 'dod pa'i dbang phyug chung ma dang bcas pa'o// 'dod pa'i lha'i steng du zlab 'i dkyil 'khor ro// des pad+ma dpar po
36a2(rgyud): deng gnas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i ma can gyi bcom ldan 'das ma bris la/ ras ris rab tu gnas pa bya'o// de'i mdun du brjod pa rnam pa bco brgyad byas la/ yar kye re'i tshes brgyad drab1
36a3(rgyud): du'adras pa bya// rnam ma'i ste pab ni yidzin te/ oM ma de sbyin nA zhes kyi sngags pa// de nas smin du bsnyen pa'i thub cam byas la/ yang ston tha btungs ma/ dbyed
36a4(rgyud): dbyar zla 'bring po'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i dus tshogs kyi nyen par tho rangs kyi khrus byas pa gas skyong banub nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchod
36a5(rgyud): nags so/ de nas theg pa chen pogasang sngags pa'i tshogs sa mchod sbyin byas nas yon phul la/ bus ma g.yas pa'i lhang rdzal btsugs nas/ bla gas phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas ci ltar
36a6(rgyud): da pa'i dngos su brang bar bya'o// nyan thos kyi dge 'dud gang du bcugs pa dang / theg pa chen pa la dag ba'i tshogs rnams la phyag byas nas mamad pa na te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das
36a7(rgyud): sa ris pakram pa'i phyogs der nye bar song ba/ dngos grub gang 'dod pa'i don du rig pa 'dzin pas bsam gtan dang ldan par gnas la yi ge grangs kyi 'bum bzlas pa bya'o// chag cig gis rje
36a8(rgyud): ye// cha gnyis kyis ni dbang du byed/ gang dag cha ni gsub pa yis// mes ni dug kyang 'gugs par dgyur// byos shing 'gyeng ba'i bud med rnams dang de// 'jin rten rnams cad kyi
36b1(rgyud): ro'i 'od kyis dpal ldan dog kyang nya bzhin 'gyur// bzlas brjod ldan pa 'i de ga gi dbang phyug phyed 'phrul las// rid pas bkyis pa'i spobs dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa'ang lan med byed// rig pa
36b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa grang ba ta yi rgyab tu non pa dang // rig ma mangs pas legs par khrud cing mthus nas 'dus pams// sngags nges pa leg cim 'ad ni skabs kyis rgyal par 'gyur// mthar gyur ba
36b3(rgyud): ye rgyal sred longs spyod dag la yid kyis spyod// 'dod pa'i lha las dga' ba'i tshul sogs pa khrod la// sred me dbulas dpam ma mi phyed pa las bde sogs dang // tshogs bdag las ni dri med dbyangs
36b4(rgyud): kaser dang dus dang chedag/ gos mi sogs pa'i dong rnams sun gyi dadug ba sems pa/ sems kyi mams dpasus can nam sangs spya byen/ rgyal las rgyal sred dashing sa kyinas
36b5(rgyud): shingalas 'bras pa dang // klud cu zung rgya ngon pa rkurnams 'azhugs// drag dang ldan pas wa zhes kyis dag pa byed// skye ba sngags med par ni langs spyod gyu pa med// 
36b6(rgyud): sa pa na shes da sa pa dang/  sa// mes pa sa du
37a1(rgyud): yang ngo mtshar med par byas pa yi ni mig dag gis// lte bar gal te gsang sngags grub pa de las mthong bar 'gyur// gal te snying rje'i lta bas 'jig rten 'di ltar sdug
37a2(rgyud): bsngal bas// rgud par gyur pa'i mi mnyam pa la bsngags pa des// yid bzhed nang bu bzhin du 'jig rten la phan smon ma yid// 'jig rten ma sus med byed cing na byed// bdud
37a3(rgyud): rnams bcom da 'dob kyi char rgyun 'bebs par byed// dpag pas pa shidang du gyur nas 'gro rnams ci 'dod sbyid par byed// nor gyi dbang phyug ma lus pa 'i nor rnams kun pakug nas// 
37a4(rgyud): na kun la phan pa'i phyir du sbyin par byed// de bzhin 'phongs pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ched du gos dag dang // stan dang khyim dang bla re dag tu sgrol mas mdzad pa dang // rgya mtsho'i glid du mong pa'i klu
37a5(rgyud): skur pa'i 'ongs pa la// gzings dang grul sogs par sgrol mas mdzad par 'gyur// rgol ma bskams rnal 'byor pa// dang po sdug bsngal lhan cig gyur// de spangs nas ni cung zhig na/ 
37a6(rgyud): sa ni sred pa rnyed par 'gyur// gnyis pa gos ni rnyed par 'gyur// de bzhin btsun ma dang yang 'phrad// de nasas kyi langs sud 'gyur// mablangs par yang ci 'dod skad// 
37a7(rgyud): ngas spyod yin na yang // lha mchog bskyed pa'i bub spyod// sems can gsod la dga' ba yis// bstan pa 'di la 'grub me 'gyur// dge ba brtul dga' 'gyur ning // theg pa
37a8(rgyud): pas ga sheg pas// rdorje rgyam kyi bka' bzhid// dam thal ches dedes byang chub/ 'di ni ngas mal 'dug pa'i na bsnod pag/ 
37b1(rgyud): ba yas// gang gi mas nyid brnyes gyur de// chos kyi dbyings sur gyur pa// de nas yang dgra bshad par bya// de'i rjes la dpag pasal shi gi sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brag gi mig
37b2(rgyud): los byung nga // dpag pasam shing ni rnam par bsgom// ut+pal yongs su gyur pa las// shing de ga yad du bsgom par bya// sna tshogs dor gyi char pa dag/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab pa
37b3(rgyud): yis// 'dod pa'i bsam pa rdzogs byed pa// de ltar bskams na nor bdag 'gyur// gling ban pa yi sems can rnams// sems kyi 'daper gyis bkug nas// rtag tu re chen bdun rab bzhed// 
37b4(rgyud): de dag la ni rab sbyin bya// yongs kyi gtso bo rin chen dang // de bzhin rin chen rgya mtsho skyes// bud med rin chen te rin chen// de bzhin ral gri rin chen dang // glang po rin chen migs rin chen/ 
37b5(rgyud): sangs rgya mas la yid men sa// drang med can kyis brgyan byas la// sna chags gzugs can gying rnams// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod nams kyis// sangs rgyas rnams la ta tu
37b6(rgyud): des ni langs rgyas thams cad dang // rin pa 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// rin po che de yongs rgyas pa'o// sangs kyi naH pan dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// sangs kyis
37b7(rgyud): sa//  gnan 9/  sa sa smra / nas /  da ga byung/ 'ad
37b8(rgyud): kha pa'i rlabs so// sems nyid sangs rgyas thams cad do// sems nyid kyis ni rnam par krol/ 
38a1(rgyud): gags par da med narnams// kuzhan dag zhan /  nyid sa par // kyi lun chags gzhan pa mthod// 
38a2(rgyud): yang snod dang sems cad rnabs// 'thung dang 'byung las gyur pa dag/ zag med lhag par mthong ba yis// sems tsam yin zhes rab tu basmra pa// de lam 'a'adapa thams cad kyis/ 
38a3(rgyud): sems kyi me long phyis byas na// rang bzhin thas spyod// rjems kyis ra bdapar 'gyur// dbyangs yig da pa byung ba/ rmi rdzogs pa b+hab ste// sems nyid rnam
38a4(rgyud): byas na// de yi steng dus bor dgod// dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa ra// me yi mdog gi steng na gnas//  9/ i dang yang dag ldan// nam ma kha gnyis kyi ma rnam par brgyan// de la sna tshog
38a5(rgyud): 'od rnams kyis// 'gro ba'i drim med byas nas// stong gsum 'di sogs mtha' dbyings te// ku rug l+le'i ring zhugs pas// de yis sgrol la bskur nas ni// 'gug nas mdun du gnas
38a6(rgyud): par byed// de nas mkhas pas sa bon la// mchod pa chen po'i sprin rnams sgo// me tog sras dang mar ma dang // de bzhin dri dang lta ba nam sogs// phyag rgya srang 'de bzhin du// gang da ba cu
38a7(rgyud): mchon ma ma / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// sdig pa thams cad mos rab shags// 'gro sa di la rjes mi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub 'i dkyis bzung // sngags 'di sa
38a8(rgyud): ma 'dzi nas ni// de nas gshegs thanas pa // sems ni byams pas / sa pa 'i ni gnas ni bskye / 
38b1(rgyud): thams cad bskyed pa // rgyun thathams cad par snyoms la// sems ma na marnam par bzhag/ tham la rnam par spangs pa'i phyid// ma cang sra bar stong bar bya// yang srid par pa
38b2(rgyud): phung po 'o// stong pa nyid kyi mchis 'breg/ oM sh+tsa tra dAn bajam thA / nga tsam stong pa'i nas 'byor nyid/ nas sems rengs sos pa// don gyi ma ba
38b3(rgyud): sa bon tsam zhig yang dran bya// gcig pu mya ngan 'das pa yis// sems can bslus par 'gyur ba'i phyir// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' med las// bdag zhes de dag ci ltar bsgral// 'a
38b4(rgyud): thams nas pa da/  nga ba 'ang/  byas mi ltung bya/  mas
38b5(rgyud): zhes byar 'gyur// ut+pal dkyil du zla ba'i gzugs// yi ge a las byung ba'o// slar yang dra ba der mtshan// dab pa 'o pong 'phros gyur pa// de lis ma lus 'jig rten khams// na
38b6(rgyud): dmyangs par bskam par bya// de las sbyangs shing gsal byas nas// 'od zer kun gyis sangs rgyas tshogs// At+pal la thugs pa rnam par bya// de las smom ma thung bam gyur/ 
38b7(rgyud): ma ma ca shAd ra// ca sa nga na na sa/ ga ni sangags
38b8(rgyud): ye shes 'khor lo mdun gnas pa// dam tshig phyag rgya'i sbyong ba yis// kha yem ma nas gzhug par bya// lag thal mo sbyar byas nas// mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgom par bya// ku
39a1(rgyud): gnyis ni rtse mor sbyar// rtse mo'i nang du ming med gzhug/ mdzub mo gnyis ni dbu par sbyar// mthe bong gnyis ni reg tu bkur// dam tshig phyag rgya 'de bcings nas/ 
39a2(rgyud): 'khor lo bkug nas gzhug par bya// sangs rgyas rnams la tshig bcad dis// dbang baspa bar ni gsol pa gdab// byangab chub derjes sangs rgyas la// srung mtshod min gsol mdza / 
39a3(rgyud): bdag kyang bskyeb pa 'don gyi phyir// nam mkha'i di/ dring bdag stsol// rgyal ba'i dbang bsku zhes bya bas// spyan la sogs pa lnga ba'o// rgyam po'i me tog dbang bsku zhing // chen po gyur
39a4(rgyud): debul mdzod// rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba// khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // sangs rgyas kun gyis skyid par bya// sangs rgyas sgrol ma dbang
39a5(rgyud): bskur bas// chos ni gtsug gi nor bur 'gyur// 'od zer dam pa sna chags kyis// 'gro ba gsum po snang bar byed// dbang bskur rin chen thong 'gyur na// dngos rgyab thams cad ra spang/ 
39a6(rgyud): byed// dkur slong ba snyen tshig yis// la pyad brtan parab rtsams nas ni// gtor ma dus gsung gtang bar bya// sngags 'di yis ni kha ba 'am// khur ba la sogs chog yis// rmil
39a7(rgyud): brten mthab par 'gyur// ra gres lag ngos chub dang // mi snang ba dang bcud 'an dang // ma mthong ba dang mtsha' dung nyid// de bzhi de nga brug mig sman da// semam mdzan pa kor gyur
39a8(rgyud): ngos grub rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te des dang kAr na// grub pa phram la mas grub// la mam sa slar nas rgyam srid dang // dbang pom ngas spyod thams cad byed// thob dang
39b1(rgyud): du yangar ba zung byed// rnadrug pa ma'i bla gcig / te// upral phyag yas nas ni// ga nas phyag
39b2(rgyud): 'di mas mthu le 'o// btsun mo dang bcas tshangs pa dang // dab ba nyi pang drag pa sags// 'akug nas dang gyur bar byed// de nas bcabs nas dngas thub tur/ 
39b3(rgyud): bapas grol 'gyur// chu dang 'dam gyi skyon dag gis// pad+ma gos par mi dgur ltar// dngul du red nas du ma 'chur// bsdus nas slar yang gcig tu 'akur// thams cad pa byed pa nyid
39b4(rgyud): sa klu' thob pa'i sems de bzhin// grub pa'i dngul rgyas reg tshur nas// rangs ma gser du 'gyur ba bzhin// grub pa'i gsang sngags kyis reg ngas// sngags pa sangs rgyas srung yang gyur/ 
39b5(rgyud): yi dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhing // khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug 'asu ra// sangs rgyaba'i gas su thung nas ni// 'al la bskor bar yang bkur ro// bkra la dang rab tu 'byung mdzad pa// dka' ba
39b6(rgyud): pa'i da mdzad cing // byang chub da pa'ang spyad mdzad// sangs rgyas nyid kyang dra par ma dang // skalas babs dang skal bdag// chos kyi khar ma bsko ba dang // byang ra
39b7(rgyud): gshegs pade bzhinan// 'jig rten gsum du lus spangs nas// rgyal ba langs sud rdzogs su yis// gnas gcad mar de skad gshegs nas// sAs pabyung 'i su
39b8(rgyud): ma pa yis// chos kyi sku yang 'jug par mdzad// gang gis demi grub pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis de nyid gsungs// dedas cos ldad das de bzhin
40a1(rgyud): da kyis nyi nga zugs pa rnam par brtags nas chen po gad do// 'di skad ces 'a to//  da da yaHrgyas bcom ldan
40a2(rgyud): 'das kyis rdo rje'i sku ches kyi dbyings kyi sku sa'i phyogs gang du dus byed par 'byung ba yin// de nas lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'adi dag pa 'di skad ces gsol to// gang
40a3(rgyud): yang bya chub sems dpa'adag gis 'di da du/  sangs rgyas bcig lda 'a kyi mi phyogs na /  phyid pa yur pa med na / 
40a4(rgyud): des 'di skad nyod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bye ba de ni bde ba can du 'groba'o// de nas bya chub sems dpa' rabs kyis smras pa/ ci lagan dri nga sangs
40a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams chos spu spangs nas bde ba can du 'gro ba'am/ rigs kyi bu 'on te sprul pa'i sku spangs nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus 'de ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi sku
40a6(rgyud): spangs nas 'gro ba 'khrur zhes bya ba de lta bu yin/ l-igan rdo rjes smras pa/ ci ltar sgyum khan gyi skyes bu ga pa zhig gis dgos pa'i don bsgrub phyi sgyu ma sprul nas dgos pa srub pang byed do// de
40a7(rgyud): bzhin du gdod nas sgrub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// 'khor los bsku rab 'das gyur nas// skye ba yongs su 'dzin par mdzad// ga tshe sangs rgyas 'das
40a8(rgyud): de tshal mamagyis bsrung ba 'thung // de gnyis med papa jig 'ding // rnam yang 'byung ba ma yin no// gsus rgya 'jig rtem la badren nas// rkang gnyis pachog gis brgyal nas // 
40b1(rgyud): rgyan mjun yo da// sang chu rgyam po gnas pa ga shegs// sas kyis sngar blangs nas 'i//  po zang rten du// ras na 'ad 'chen pal// kun du dga' dang / 
40b2(rgyud): gsas kyis badzugs// byed tsug pa gcig dus bzhugs// len sa ma rjod na pa' sa// de yin nes/ de rnamam pa do// bdag dzin pas 'phrul pa/ 
40b3(rgyud): / rnams// rtag tu rtag pa'i don 'dod pa// mi rtag nyid la 'jug bya'i phyir// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gtong mdzad// dngos po kun gyi dngos bdag nyid// thugs kyis thams cad mkhyen te dag/ 'di dag
40b4(rgyud): 'di gnas pa yi shes// byas kyis pa da ma yin// kun rdzob bden pa la brtan sa// snying gsum sogs gdus byal// sa rnams kyis chos bstan pa/ nam mala' mnyam
40b5(rgyud): rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba de nyid min// sangs rgyas 'gag pa' de bzhin te// thams cad rog cig gyur ba ye// 'byung dang 'jig pa ci nga bzhin no// de na chos dbyings gzugs gcig
40b6(rgyud): / sgrib pa lnga po spangs pa'o// bab cing rgyan che ba'i gzugs// de nye dang por de nyid bzhugs// gnyis g.yod pa ma yin phyir// gdod nam yod ba ma yin no// de ni gdod nas ma skyes pas// skye ba ma yin
40b7(rgyud): 'gag ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ lag dardo rje sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam ma gsu rje la ston pa mdzad pa/ skyeb med pa 'gag pa med pa ci lwa bu men/ smras pa/ 
40b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rda bas de snyam du sems/ gang sangs rgyas de rnyed pa de dag zhig yod pa yin na pa/ don te med pa nag yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rlabs kyis smras pa/ lAk+Sha / 
41a1(rgyud): dngapangs rgyas rnab 'de yod pa yang ma yi med pa yang yin no// lanan rdo rjes smras pa/ ma skyes pa ni skye ba yin// skyes pa byed yang skye mi 'gyung // dor dra pa nyid du
41a2(rgyud): gdod nas ma s+t+rai 9// de bzhin kyi 'gyur// de che ba med pa'i che ba med// me gnas pas gnam pa med// gnas pa de la gnas mi dgos// gal rjem skyes nya
41a3(rgyud): mi skyes pa nyid skye 'gyur ro// ribong go ni nyid kyang // skye ba dang de 'gag par 'gyur// gang tse yong ba skye gyur na// skyes pa spang yang skye ba gyur// gas te med pa sbyin yang / 
41a4(rgyud): ma thu la skye bar 'gyur// de phyi thams cad ma rig pa// 'du byed gsum gyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po lnga ldan lal rnam so// snang ba tsam du rnam par shes// re shi ka rigs pa
41a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ thams cad snyed pa med pa'i phyir// 
41a6(rgyud): nam pa sa// dam de ni ster zug/ rdo rjes brel pa gzung // ngos yos mi byung ltar// 
41a7(rgyud): phyag rgya sogs brten nas// dngos grub rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos grub rnams ni kun rdzob pa// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa yang // sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// phun rdzob nyid du
41a8(rgyud): kur// rtog pa gnyis pa'o// / sngags bzlas pa 'i chog 'a jim// de nas yang dag bshad byag// gang zhig shes sa ni// ma pos ba 'gyur byas so/ 
41b1(rgyud): byed// thos kar na byu na na pa shA sada' pa'i dbapa lta bu'i thab lung byas / 
41b2(rgyud): nga dmed pa'i shing sa les nas// chog bzhin susu dus dmang pob rgya brtan sbyin 'asreg byas te/ gong ma pan gyi byom nas sa blang sa la yang drag chub kyis bslus nas/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang bya ba yin
41b3(rgyud): nas khrus la bor bya ba min te/ zlamatshan gyis gas pa'i ras sa dkyil 'khor gu gsum bres nas/ dkyil mtshar du bsgrub b+ha dang / sgrubapa pa'i med dang bcas pa'i bsku pa'i tshig dang bcas pakrin te/ 
41b4(rgyud): ma bdag gi dbang du gyur ceg byas nas/ de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis srel nas/ rgya skyegs kyi yub dang / lag pa gsan pa'i srin lag gi khrag dang / gzur dang / gur kum dang / kla ce rnams kyi tshon
41b5(rgyud): rgyas bribar bya// shes rab 'phem par 'dod namapa lda de nyid du a rka'as/ kar rne shings bram ze'i sbyi srin ni ma blangs las te/ a ka ru ka'i sham tho'o ma ma/ shu dga'i rkyen sreg kyi
41b6(rgyud): // dugan myed dpas lung de nyid du tsan dan gyi shengs ma snas/ ben taka medaga'i sbyin sreg b+h+yoH// de ga thams ca ne bar zhugs par 'gyur ro// ma tshogs kyi byag pan rnapas

42a1(rgyud): rnam bkur bamyed zhes bya ba// shes rab med par thob mi 'gyur// dbyer de thob 'dod pa gang // nas rab non po bsgrub par bya// bzlas dang sbyin sreg sbyor ba yis/

42a6(rgyud): dag gzhan don rab bsgrub pa la// theg pa chen por thabs gzhan med// reg pa lan gcig sgrub pa yis// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin// hrIH yig myos pa'i snod bsapas nas// 
42a7(rgyud): pas ni 'dzag par 'gyur// sde dang steng gi dkyil du rje rje de nyid// bsams dablo rnams skye bar byed// mche bas bzung ba las bsgoms pa// chos kyi le ge mdzes pa mes// yi ge dag de dag kyi
42a8(rgyud): la pa'i snying po khams gsum las// rgyal ba yin par brtse ba can gyis rnab shes bya// ngag gi skyon rnams zad pas dug sel sems kyi spyan spangs pas// shes rab 'phel ur lus
42b1(rgyud): da 'ad pasad/ dpar/ dad kyi gru po gyur// dpya sras kyis pa kyang sdig rnams spangs byar bkye// phyag ngakya
42b2(rgyud): mus skyon rnams zad 'gyur// sngags kyis lce yi tshogs 'i skyon rnams gang yin pa yi sems kyi spyod// bsam gtan dga' ba'i sems kyis dga' bar 'gyur bar dang 'dri med kyis// lus kyi
42b3(rgyud): dpal gas pa med pa de tshe sangs rgyas byin gyis rlog/ sreg me mig gis sdig lnga sI rje ldan pa 'jog rten gsum gyi rgyal par 'gyur// skyen pas pasodonams spongs phrag ke bangs stengs ga
42b4(rgyud): sbyin bdag brtson ldan pa 'gyur// le lo spangs pas mkhas pas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal cung zad kyang mi byong // de phyir sangs rgyas sras kyi snying rje'i nor dang brtson 'gram spyod pa dgal brted// dam ma
42b5(rgyud): dkyil du rangs rgyas rnams balngas bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas rnams la sems// rmi lam da yang rtag tu bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsko ba mchong // mkhas pa tshor rab
42b6(rgyud): gsheg pa dang // non pa sna tshogs nod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis mthong 'gyur zhing // sreg pa byas pas dkyil ba'i grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur// de na sa pad
42b7(rgyud): / groyang der de gnas par 'thar// de'i phyir ni ci nas kyang // gos dag dag gi bcur por 'dod// dang du de ni byed pas// mthon kyis ni ko yang kA8
43a1(rgyud): / dbang ba phyogs nas pa rnams nas ni// oM la sogs pa lakhas pas bri// mtshabs drug tu zhes bon drug/ mas kyis ban dkyil du// yig su yinapa
43a2(rgyud): sa pa// dad na // sprul baspang pa'i rgyud do// de nas med gas padang ldan par bya ba'i byeng/ stong ba gzhan dag pashad par byaste// 'dal du gyi sa byangs/ 
43a3(rgyud): li ge bdun sbyar bar bya'o// de'i lte ba la hU~M gnyis kyis brten pa'i bskur bya'i ming dbang du bya ba'i tshig bzhin du grog 'am/ yang na me tog dang bcas pa'i ras la bris la rig pa'i risu bu byas nas dpung pa la
43a4(rgyud): gdags par bya'o// bdag po bud med bran du 'gyur// rgyal po'ang nam 'bring nyid du 'gyur// shin tu dag cing gtsang ma yis// sngags 'di btu bar bya ba yin// dbang du bya ba'i chog go// / bsrung ba'i don/ 
43a5(rgyud): khru 'khor byung bar 'gyur te// ut+pal 'dab pa'i byas nas ni// de la dbus su zla ba bre// shar du mda' ni bri bar bya// lho nyid du ni gcu bri'o// mi 'jigs lag pa rab tu'o// byang du lu t+pal gri// 
43a6(rgyud): bar bya// dbus kyi zla bar bsrung bya ste// sa ben bdun gyis bskor ba'o// 'khol la phyi yi rim pa la// ut+pal phreng bas brgyan pa ni// 'di krog la bris la// mang shi dpung la gdags par bya/ 
43a7(rgyud): zhan yang byis pa rgan po dar la bab// 'khrul 'khor gyis ni rang srung 'grub// gal te dbang phyug thob par bya 'dod na// sa bon gyi grong khyer bres la de'i dkyil du ga'u bri bar bya'o// gsung dkyil du rin
43a8(rgyud): rnab pa lnga bu'i a t+pal gyi mgu bri bar bya'o// at+pal snying pa'i dbus su mdzul le ge bdun kyis tham // sa le sbrum kyi byang dul mngan par khrims khyim ze sred du nges par sa'ag par
43b1(rgyud): rnas lu sra pa'i phreng bas mdza par bsko ba rdza nas seMs bcu gnyis sa pa brgyad med kyi ma ldan pa za pa zhi bas rab sa lus byas nas yod bzlas pa brgyartsa brgyad byas na/ 
43b2(rgyud): sen 'je dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i reg pa'i 'u yang dag par gdags par bya'o// de nas sbyong ba gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mig dmar la bab par mgron bu kan rgyal du gnas pa rnyed/ 
43b3(rgyud): yang rmem du bzhag nas gas bam phragagacig bcwa ya na pa debs pa mjos pa las khyim pa la gyur ro// mthod 'de blangs pa bu bcwo'i sngags partsartsa brgyad bzlas nas/ chos bcu
43b4(rgyud): nyis sam/ brgyad la khrus byas nas ma che sa dang kyinang dunatums nas dpung ba la btags na/ dis nor byed dbang tsun chen par 'gyur ro// mgron cid snod du bcug pa'i nang dus par byas da nyid
43b5(rgyud): shA ka 'i byed pa bskye // des sasgyu nga/ na da/ @/ gas dzA/ ga gas pa
43b6(rgyud): // sa su myo par byed/  mtsha mal bad// de nas med dag bshad byab//  zhe na ban pa// rlababs pa ni gyis nye bar brgyan// de yod dkyil du
43b7(rgyud): 'dod// b+ha ga'i rnam pa kha dog legs// mad ni sha 'bri bya ba// gzu ma phyogs pa'o// me 'dzegs lag brlabacu ste// byang du de bzhin udra ma'o// mtshams kyi ca ni rnams cad dur/ 
43b8(rgyud): gos dmar po mi snod gatshogs dgas// de dmar pos gdong bkab pa yi// slob ma der dgazhug par bya'o// 'dis sems ma rdo rje pa'i phyag rgyab cings la las
44a1(rgyud): ra bton jam par bya g+sa/ rba rgya brtan nam rgya// namigs pa dkyis la dkyil 'khor ba byud par bya'o// dkyil du ba ban ni mchog go// mda' la baban ri nga
44a2(rgyud): du byas pa'i las la dbang bar 'gyur ro// me 'jigs pa sbyin pa la ba ba na ni dug 'gugs pa la bslab par bya'o// ut+pal la babs na shes rab 'phel ba la bslab par bya'o// gzul bab
44a3(rgyud): dani thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa bslab par bya'o// 'dug pa'i dus su 'di ska su ba bya'o// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog tu gsang ba 'did kyil 'khor dum
44a4(rgyud): rdugs pa gang gi yang mdun du brjod par bya ba ma yin no// dmachog nyams par 'gyur ta re/ yang ma spangs pa' che ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ta re/ zhes pa brjod nas/ 
44a5(rgyud): rjes la dam cheg sbyin pa sh+ya ste/ dkon mchog gsus namangs mi sdus// zhes byab sa sogs pa rgyas brgyan las sgrub pa med do// man baM skrag pa ya bya ste/ chos kyis rgyal ba dam
44a6(rgyud): tshig ce// dmas blangs nas namanyams na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ad// gsang sngags spyong mchog spyod pa rnams// thag chen dang de sted chen kyang // de sa sbyang sa na
44a7(rgyud): byed// sa kyis bstan pa rgyams byed pa// das khyod kyis brgyas \u0f7f// rgyun tug sa mar gyin gyi zhe// 'phre ba dpa sa brjir bar bya// mtshas kyi tsham TIg sa/ 
44a8(rgyud): dper po'i dris kyang phyug bya zhing// rin chen dam tha mams kyis brgyan// chags pa 'isems kyim sgos bya zhing // sngags kyang chags pa'i sems kyis bzla// btsag gam men d+ha da / 
44b1(rgyud): kr-i dag da bri bar bya// mtshal gyi khyim dag gam ni// kub kum dang na can dang dmar//  gyi khyel dag kya rung // ka ga ta byems bris// skyen theg pa na pa //  na/ 
44b2(rgyud): de bzhin te// kun kyang dbang ba'i rang bzhin byar// sangs rgyas drang sgeg mtshan byed yin// the gachags gas dpa ye bye zhi // bden pa min pa yang ma kri// mabyin pa yang brang me \u0f7f// 
44b3(rgyud): chung ma bsten mi bya// lus kyis las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gis rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gang gsum po'i// me dge ba dag spang bgyis// chos dang de bzhin bang ring dang / 
44b4(rgyud): byams dang mi 'jigs zhes bya ba ni// byin pa khyad kyis rtag tu byin// med na bsam gtan las bgyis so// bsdu ba'i dngos po ban dag kyang // khyod kyis rtag tu bstan par bya// pha rol
44b5(rgyud): byin pa'i sku dag dang // stobs rnams dong ni dbang drag dang // bud med 'gro ba brnyas mi bya// slo ma'i ming can khyad par du// gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyib pas kyang // bud me dang ni blangs mi bya/

45a1(rgyud): bum pa de bzhin gnas pa'i chus// slob ma sngags chus dag par byas// slob dpon gyis ni rim pa bzhid// mda' ga'u sogs kyis phyag rgyas bkrus// dang po mad
45a2(rgyud): can bum las te// gnyis pa gzhu dang ldan pas so// gzub pa mi 'jigs pa las te// yut+pal gyis ni bzhi pa'o// de ltar sangs rgyas shA n+da les// seng ge'i sras bcas rdo rje 'dzin/ 
45a3(rgyud): rgyal srid chen por dbang bsrung ltar// de bzhin bdag gis khyod dbang bskur// khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams can nyid// de nyid dkyil 'khor 'di ru rnyed// rdul chen 'di gzigs sangs rgyas
45a4(rgyud): rnams// rab tu dgyes par gyur pa yin// 'di ni 'chi med nad med kyang // mya ngan byed cing baphongs pa med// theg pa chen po gcad ma 'dis// khyod kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub bathob// mad
45a5(rgyud): sogs gzhu yis dbang bskur bas// dam chos snod du byas nas ni// slob ma la ni bsang ba dag/ cho ga bzhin du sbyin par bya// de la re shig dang po klul brdegs pa la bslab par bya'o//

46a2(rgyud): thugs la bdur zhing dge slong la gsol ba shAsan/ mo gcig gi par dgas kyi chog pa 'byung bar 'i 'thar ro// del med ge'i las rjes tshugs par me 'gyur ro// gal te sprul gyis
46a3(rgyud): Al de nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ lan bdun mngon par sngags pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// ya'i mdze nad sos par 'dod na/ sngags 'di nyid drug med par byas nas/ 
46a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis tshul sngags la sbrum gyis bzung ba'i rtsal bkus na dug med par 'gyur ro// yang su mthong bar 'dod na/ ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma sa// yi ge'i grangs kyis 'ang
46a5(rgyud): klas nas// klu'i gnas shing byin gyis brlabs pa dkon mchog sa gsol ba btab na/ de'i rjes la klu'i chung ma ldang bar 'gyur ro// bsrub pa po las kyis bcom ldan 'das ci zhig kyis na
46a6(rgyud): ka' la lung no/ par byed do// sngags pas kyang 'dod pa de blangs par bya'o// rtog pa bzhina'o// / de nas gzhon nu zla gcan 'dzin bzang po yang gi tshe bsod snyomal rgyal po'i khyab tu

46a8(rgyud): gcan 'dzin pamang pos rig pa chad pa zlas so// bzlas pa tsam gyis skur 'ga' zhig dadage khyes nas srung bzhin du/ sdugs 'dzin pa pang po sa bye na
46b1(rgyud): song ngo // nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// yab lags khyed kyis bdag la gsang sngags gang stsal ba'i mthu de dag gis mthong ba lags so// bcom

46b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe de'i dus su sngags 'di dang / rtog pa 'di lag na de rdza la bsrung nas nyen thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyed dang

48a3(rgyud): tshangs pa mdun na 'don mnyam pa'i// tshe dang ldan grwar the tshom med// de bzhin shing chen 'bras bu yi// chu shing 'bras bu 'dra rnyed nas// gang dang gang na gnas pa der// gal te gso sbyong la gnas pa// 'o ma nga

48a7(rgyud): shesabyab nas bton nam// rtsa bablangs nas lan bdun mngon sngags te// mgo bo kra ni bcings par byas na ni// mo gcig rims ni med par byed pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni gser shing rtsa ba dag/ blang
48a8(rgyud): des gang gi mgal bcings byas na// de mi nyin bzhi pa yi gdod pa dag/ rims kyis rim pa rims ni med par 'gyur// mo pha gdul chad dang rtsub mdong // ra gnyis pa'i rgyal ba'i khub bcas// bangs man / 
48b1(rgyud): du bud med 'om dang mnyos nas// mig la bslus dmig gi na nams so// shing thog yun ta gi rnabazlas nas ni// sngags 'dib tu byed par du bzlas nas sa// ci rjodod pa mdang 'thungs na/ 
48b2(rgyud): dpanga' me pa srid mtshan la dra ngas// dgas la nas byang rab grags pa// de la lo ma dag dang ldan gyis nges// ma sa stobs bskyed cu 'phel ba skyed// sngags 'di ba byed pa ba zlas drul// dag
48b3(rgyud): deso ma skyes pa'i lce// mi dbang cab rgya skar babang po la// de le dbra la bar thig mi byas nas ni// rig le dang thong 'jig rten gsul dbar byed// she ba'i dri ma mag dang snyed dang ste// dpral ba dang ni de bzhin

48b7(rgyud): ni bcas gags / na rgyas pasags pa na zhe cagan na // 'gyu sa chags sngam dzin/ 
48b8(rgyud): 'gro ba pa gyur // la bkod cha nya'i tsher ma dag/ bsdus nas chang che khyem sbas na// chang rnams rlag ste phyung na ni// bzang po nyid du 'gyur ba yin// rnga ma la dpa bsregs pa'i me// thogs shes bcas
49a1(rgyud): na'i shing 'dzugs na// de pe 'bar bar me kru he// chang zhugs smrar yang 'ab rab gyur// zong sa gong bstan sngagral zlas nas// sngon sngags tshong pa rnams bstan na// rnal
49a2(rgyud): ba yi sa chong 'grub ste// tshongs rnam sa las pa che da// chang gis 'od byed pa la// s+m+R+YuM kyi me gtsang bcug gyur na// chang rjod bcas parlag par 'gyur// bsulas bkrus spyad du rlung // ba gul las chus
49a3(rgyud): bkrus na// byis pa ma las blangs nas ni// 'byung po sgo yis bdus byas na// dur smrig bkon pas som par 'gyur// byis pa mun 'azungs skyugs na//  skyo ba sregs bral po yis// ma phul pa bcings pa
49a4(rgyud): byas na de// sbyong ba mchog gis spang mos 'gyur// ya dag pag ni tsog dang / ldan pa yin bya nus byas nas/ rnam ned du bcuganas 'dug no// 'tshed dang mtshon na mi byams pa las thar/

49a7(rgyud): 'dis ni 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// gang gis sngags kyi rgyam pa thos nas de// rig pa byas nas dpung pal ba tags // da ci brug no skyed dang mnyam 'brur// gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs nor ces ga

50b1(rgyud): po mas thugs kar rnam pa brgyan ma// ma lus phyogs kyis 'khor las brgyar pa'i// rang gi re gyi tshogs rnabs bkrugs// phyag 'tshal rab tu 'arab brji pa'i// da rgyar 'od kyi phreng ba skal pa// ban pa rang

80a6(rgyud): tshul byed pa'o// mtshan sa gcig pa'am/ dung khrod dam chu 'gram rnams su ma med pa mi gad pa'ir na steng du bsdad nas sngags brgya phrag brgyad bzlas na sngags pa rjes sa su reg tu 'ong ste/ dab cad das
80a7(rgyud): 'gayas pas pa'ang na ral khri'i dngos grub 'grub bo// de nas gzhan yang brjod par bya ste/ rgya blangs lar la bsdum gser drug nam brgyad nying byed do// 'am bas la rang gi

97b3(rgyud): bo las rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa ba ni pa'o// / 'dir rnal 'byor pa gza' rnams kyi gtso bo bsgrubs nas yang dag pa'i bde ba shin tu khyab par byed pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ bdag nyid la gur
97b4(rgyud): gum dang / sran ta / rab thab dang dus rga rnams lus pa byuglanas pas kyid dgra 'dzem par 'gyur ro// 'di na nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las las dbyung 'joms pa'i la'us bzhi 'bru rtsa lnga pa'o// 
97b5(rgyud): gzhan yang lha mos gsol ba/ kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang dang gang la sngags dang sman kye nus pa 'grub par 'gyur gsungs shag nyan par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma thams
97b6(rgyud): rad 'ang po yin te/ 'on kyang du mchod la ltos par rigs pa 'di'i phyir dus tshad 'arjod par bya'o// nyam ni lnga pa 'a'o// rlab ni gnyis pa la'o// gara' rnams sreg cing ni bdun pa la'o// sngags pa ni bani 'tsha/ 
97b7(rgyud): kara' lhag pa ni gsum pa la'o// mig dmar ni drug pa la'o// smon pa ni gcigs la ste/ rang rang gi dus tshad nges par 'gyur ba// 'di ni nag
97b8(rgyud): // gnanas ngag da ston can kyilathalam brtags pa sems ca nams kyi yongs pa thas pa ma ma nal ba byas byed ga nga/ ga ma dang / 
98a1(rgyud): rim brjod par bya ste/ nag po'i phyogs kyi 'chu bzhi'am/ btud dang/ bcu 'am/ sa gcig rnams kyis de dang / mu skrod dang/ mang ni dang / skag dang / mchu dang / nag pa dang
98a2(rgyud): dang / pra nye dang / sbyin drug rnams dang rab tu ldan par bya'o// 'di ni nag sa chen po'i rgyad kyi rgyal po las skar ma'i le'u ste ba ni bcu rtsa 'dun pa / 
98a3(rgyud): khas pas rgyu'i'i rtsa gnyis mnan par bya zhing / shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa la nye bar gnas nas shes bya thams cad lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du mnan na 'gro rnams kyi bde 'the tshom med par thob pa ni yul
98a4(rgyud): rnams ye nas kyi mes bsregs nas sgyum snang ba'o// ma dzes dus na' 'gro ba rnams kyis shin tu yongs su dag 'drims dpa bsam du med pa'i zhing bar por skye bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor 'dis 'om 'grus/ 
98a5(rgyud): da ba ltar dri ma med par 'gyur ro// rlung phyir 'don cing dag par byas na dge ba bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las dge ba 'asam pa'i le'u ste ba ni bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
98a6(rgyud): mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la ma gyi cho ga'i rim pa bshad du gsal/ gang gis gang sngar la sbyin sreg bya/ snying rje dang ldan pas sems can thams cad bde ba la ji ltar dgod/ dang por dngos grab
98a7(rgyud): da pa'i sngags bzlas 'a byas nas sbyin sreg bya'o// myur ba ni rtag pa bstan na bde ba'i rang bzhin yo shes gos/ skad cig de la lus can rnams kyis ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ni nag po chen
98a8(rgyud): da kyi rgyam tho las las khye ma'i sa pa'i se skye ba ni ba nga chung / gzhan yangs pa man pa sngags kyi la 'a bag par bya'o// mi sangs ti zung bya nyan
98b1(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po'ang sogs gcig bklags pa cam rgyas sgrub pa rnams kyi sdug pa thams cad chags medabang zad par 'gyur ro// 'dod dpal nag pa cha pa' rgyud kyi rgyal po las a tha na pad+ma rdza
98b2(rgyud): 9'u ste lnga bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// // ldang 'phrul gyi gtsug lag khang chen po sar mo cher ba rgyal khams pas zhus pa'i don du/ ba ni ta chen po sa man+ta shrI dang / chu chen gyi mahA bar dge slong chos
98b3(rgyud): kyis bskur cing zhus te gtan la 'ba'a'o// ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha wA ha tun+te ShAn ta thA ga to d+ya ba data teShAny+tsa yo na ra d+ha e baM bdI ma hA shra ma NaH/ mang+ga la b+ha btu/ shu b+ha ma stu sarba dAg taM/ shu Sh+kaM/ 
98b4(rgyud): rgya gar sbed du/ yat+pal b+ha khas ma tan nAm/ bod ska du/ je bzhin 'arnyes pa na ma mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i drungad// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gang nig sangs rgyas lA yi
98b5(rgyud): cod par can// sa gsum kun gyi snying pa dang ldan pa// dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngobo mdzad// de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par spyod pa'o// gal te de 'dra'i ngob
98b6(rgyud): yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang bzhin mthong min te// sangs rgyas dang ni rdo rje 'dzid pa dang // rin chen tog dang bad ldan 'jug pa ste// lhad rnams kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin// dang po'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' bzhin
98b7(rgyud): ro// dang po'i chos la de rnams 'gyur ba ste// mkha' dang lhan cig sems can khams rnams kyang // gzhug rnams su ni bstan bcos med par byas// gdod nas dag pa'i go 'bang mkha' mnyam mtshungs/ 
98b8(rgyud): lnga le cod pan dang yang ldan// gang zhig chos de nyid kyi rang bzhin can// sa gsum po yi chos na byung 'gyur ba// de rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal ma// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni phyag 'tshal ba'i// 'asod
99a1(rgyud): nub na ja ba zung thu zhig/ rdo rje sems dpa' des phyag tshal bas// chos kyi bdag nyid chenapas mamang par 'gyur/ ma sa ca
99a2(rgyud): gzhan du byas// 'di ni su dang gsung dang thugs dag ni// chos 'di lan dang po 'byung ba ste// rnal 'byor gnas ni lha mo bskul byed pa// deng ni dang por chos rnams 'byung gyur ba // dab ldag rnams
99a3(rgyud): gcig dngom bsgom// chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dang sa dmigs sa ma// ram pa'i thar tshugs kyis kyang rab brgyan cing // sku mdog kyang ni sngon po dra bzhin can// rdo khrims dpa'i ting 'dzin dge ste/ 
99a4(rgyud): gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni bsgom par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus gnas par// yi ge bskyed pa nyid du bsam par bya// yi go'i gzugs ni yongs su gyur ba las// rdo rje rang bzhin nyid
99a5(rgyud): d+ha yi mtha' di sngags 'am basmras bya ba// rang shing na nyid kyis rang bzhin te// gnyis su med pa'i sku yo rang bzhin cad// rdo rje mams dpa' dmigs par bya ba'o// mdin sems nyid yongs su lung ba ste// rdorje
99a6(rgyud): rjed pa yis ni gsungs pa yin// gang zhig bsgom pa 'di lis bsgom byed pa// sems kyi rang 'azhin nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni lha mo bzhi rnams ro gcig pa'o// ngob blo ni mkha' dang mnyam pa
99a7(rgyud): / de lnga'i chos byas sems kyi rang bzhin te// lha mthar pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bsgom/ rdo rje sems dpa' des mthong ba// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can/ rnal 'byor gnas dang rol pa'o/ 
99b1(rgyud): thams cad mnyam par bcud par bcas// bkod pa dag ngabaldan pa gan gyu ga du da ba// gzu ba sangs kyim 'ardzu'o// ban yangs
99b2(rgyud): dbung du nges par gnas pa ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis// sa gsum la ni khyab pa'o// lha yi dang ni kha bzhing gi// lha tshogs rdo rje nyid yin no// de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// rnam 'phrul thams cad 'di
99b3(rgyud): gA ci ltar sems can rnams// skye bar 'gyur ba lan nyid de// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rna 'phrug ni// sna tshogs rdo rje yin par 'gyur// de las gang blang lha kun kyang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrus yin// sem
99b4(rgyud): rnam pa dachos myong ba // seg sum thams cadag cig ma nga ba nyid// ngos pas dumasus kyis kyis gzigs shing // dems rnam pabyung dbang thugs ldan mchod// rgya yi tshig gis 'dre pa'o// 
99b5(rgyud): rtag tu mchog ldan khyod can// dmachog sa ma thams cad kyi// mchog tu gyur pa'i lha mo// dumachis bdag cag sub 'tshal// de chu ba zhi gsungs paste// steng dang byar med byas pa'i chos mnyam rang snang sa// 
99b6(rgyud): zhel marab pa dang mchog tu mnyam byed pa// gang phyir sgyu ma'i mngad bas sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam// mkha' mnyam thams cad rol pa zhi ba med pa'o// rulu rul byo ru d+ha/ mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams
99b7(rgyud): kun tu rol pa ste// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang ni sgra brnyan chos mnyam snang // lhan cig gnas min cha ste rang nyid pa wang mtshungs// byas pa'i snang ba dang ni mnyam par gyur pa'o// gang zhig chos rnabs snang ba rnam
99b8(rgyud): gala' dang mnyam pa// da zhong rje ba dad pag granas can lta buste// rdo rje theg pa deng dag zugs sogs lan par gyi// bdeb mi bad su thigs dang mnyam sum mdzad pa'o// rnal 'byor gnas ni du mi
100a1(rgyud): tshul 'di ni// du ma'i gzugs 'dzin der ni rdo rje dang mnyam ning // nyid dang dra pa'il sems dpa' rnams ni spro mdzad pa'i// rdo rje dbyings dang lhan cig mchog stsol mdzad// rang bdag
100a2(rgyud): shing // chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa mchog dang bsgom pa/ dkyil 'khor dbus gnas chos ni hUM ni dbye ba can/ gzugs rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i ngor
100a3(rgyud): nges par btag/ thugs kying ba gcig gas pa de rje theg pa'o// sems ni mkha' mnyams pas kyi theg pa rang bzhin med// gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yang ni lul can ma yin te// de ne yun med pa yi/ 
100a4(rgyud): sems pa gyud ni cag pa'i rang bzhinate// migarten pas rnam nga bzhin nyid // ses ma su la zhin du sa dbang ba// rgyalags sems sa rgya nin can
100a5(rgyud): lha mo bzhis kyus ni kun tu spangs paste// nang du gnas pa rje ngom par ldan pa dang // gas bye ba nyid kyis de na rab tu gnas// thugs kyi gsang pa'i chos narnam par byung ba'o// nam ma 'a
100a6(rgyud): zhen cad bye dang rgya zhig/ smos par rje slar yang bsu byas te// sems kyi rang bzhin du gcig byeng // sems ni 'gag par gyur ban// kun kyang mnyam ning mablangs par mthong // yas
100b1(rgyud): gas bsdus pas// gcig pa'i rnam par bya ba'o// thugs kyi dkyil la ra \u0f7fle du me gnyis pa'o// / zab po dang na gnala' gcig pa'i rang bzhin du/ chas rnams kya
100b2(rgyud): sa gsung pa pa'o// gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas pa'i dngas po ste// de la de rje can gyis mnyam pa 'ong bor ga ngas/ bram nan kyis bdag gcig yi dngas yin nang// rus pa'i rgyad rnams kya
100b3(rgyud): rang bzhin te// rdo rje ga'aphang de la len pa'i rang bzhin no// rnal 'byor dal panyam pa'i ngo bo ngas mthong sa// de dang mnyam pa'i rang lanin sems can rnama'al sbas// de yi rnal 'byor dang bzhin lha pos
100b4(rgyud): dungs y-i// lha mo thams cad dang ni gcig pa'i sa zhin te// gtsa dang byas mdzes pa gcig su byung zu // mnyam 'dri nid do ni sngags pag cig tsa ste// rdo rdo rnam par med pa byed pa
100b5(rgyud): cig pu nyid// der ni zhe sdang rang bzhin dag ni zhig pa ste// yan lag phyed pa'i chos ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// rnar ni rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin// gang tsher rjes ni dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i tshe// 
100b6(rgyud): ye g.yon gyi byed dang gcig tu nung pa sa //  nyid tshang mar byas nas dong nge sems ba skus bya// gsung shi kyi la la gsus pa// / glang po dang ni tang med kyid //

101b3(rgyud): zhag dang khrag sogs mchog tu mdzes par rab bzhugs dngos pa'i lus ni bsgyur bar bya// bza' ba dang bca' ba dang ma la stan la sogs de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin/

103a1(rgyud): na 'ad ba rtul 'du shangs ma chus sa [ред]
103a2(rgyud): kyabyang chub ma ma da' sems da' chen po dang dang / byang chub masadapa' sems da 'a chen par med dang / byang chub thams dpa' sems dpa na ba chas kyi dbyes pa dang / dedag sa tshogs pa'i byang chub mams dpa' thams
103a3(rgyud): na mo brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mams pa'i khams dang mnyam pa la yang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rjo mi bskyod pa dang / de bdi
103a4(rgyud): sheg yang / rnam par snang ya da / da bzhin gshegs pa /  na ta da / de zhin gshegs dor da pag med dang / de 'azhin da shegs padang do yod pa dang dag pa sags panapapapa'i khams ma cad du/

103b1(rgyud): rnam par yang dag par gnas par gyur to// la la gzugs kyang ba'i rnam pa sa sa la 'ja' rnam pag la madri 'ang ba'i rnamapas/ lal 'a ba rnam 'as/ lal ngag bya'i ngo ba rnab pas yang dag par gnas par thu
103b2(rgyud): denas de bzhin gshegs pa mi ba spyod de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tsun po'i b+hagal su bzhi rdus med pa dam tshin chen pa'i dkyi 'khor byin gyis brlabs 'di/ gas papa dbang ba nyid/  tshogs gzugs ces su
103b3(rgyud): rgyas// sangs rgyas sprin ni kun tu bklag/ me lhag 'phro ba mang po 'brug/ gsang ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bye

103b5(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mam par snang mdzad rnams de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyis /  thugs la tshug so// de nas bcom ldan
103b6(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi mas rnaM sa da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces kyis gnon pa rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyams par thugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sto

104a1(rgyud): da ma cho gzung ba'i da nas kya ti 'dzin pa snyoms par thugs mas 'gri pacan pakyis gzugs de bzhin gshegs sems kyi byargyan kyis gas kyis byin gyi
104a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnamapa shAng me can pa lags panas mdzad pa sung can du yo pa/  tasangs rgyas thams dge// chub semasanas chug pa// de bzhin gshegs pa
104a3(rgyud): na gyis pas cad phyag 'tsha langs nin ma // ma pa sa sa//  zhe na shegs dun chegs/  rgyas pa 'o// de tsham sa /

104a6(rgyud): di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das 'di bu'i yon tan kyang bar dran pa
104b1(rgyud): / dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyil ba du bzhin gshegs pa thams dang spyad ragasung dang thugs rgyagasang bstong par mi slob dade/ com ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sa byin gyis
104b2(rgyud): brlab pa mang dra nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cwo dam chog 'byung ba'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid pade ba slong ba gyi 'anas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyiye shwe
104b3(rgyud): mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstar dugs mede nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sug pung thugs rdo rje rje bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshag ce
104b4(rgyud): thams cad ces gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/ ye shes spo ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzin pa skams par shugs// de snang garigs kyi sngags mchog gi snang pa 'di snying pa nyid kyi sreg su thugs dedo rdzams byung ngo // badz+radz+ra// 
104b5(rgyud): de nas 'i srung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'asade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug su thugs ci ga pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya che bskapa mchog gi gnas kyis nag bod gang pod mer po'i rnam pas/ de bzhin gshegs
104b6(rgyud): dbyes gsungagags derje'i sku gsung zugs do rjes bzhugs sa// de nas bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad cid mcheg 'byung ba rje zhes byaba'i ti ba mngon pa sgoms par thugs te gte mug gi rigs kyi sngags mamyo/ 
104b7(rgyud): ske 'i snyid pa na ci thugs cags de rjelas rdzas//  // des ma pag sa das de bzhidag shegs pa thams cakrug sa sags kyi pa'i kyis nam par sna mas
104b8(rgyud): gnas kyis dkar senas padom bu'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tha gsung thugs rdo rje'i sma sngar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'thung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes
105a1(rgyud): k+Sha2ma'an pa nyams par zhugs nas/ yid bzhin nong gas mtshugs snang ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyis gsung thugs do rdulas phyung ngo // 
105a2(rgyud): ka/ de nas 'di phung mu thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i sras bu de nyid rim chen tog go phyag rgya chen po sbyong ba rnam
105a3(rgyud): ko nas kyis ser po nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i g.yas phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe
105a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
105a5(rgyud): sa phyung ngo // A ra li ka/ de nas 'di phyeng ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rigs pa

105a7(rgyud): ra ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod mchog gdam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig dgug pa'i rig mchog
105a8(rgyud): pa'i de nyid kyis/ gsung zugs dngalas blang ngo // dra // de nas 'di byung ma thig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su ga su
105b1(rgyud): nayod pa maphyog chad pa snang da nanas kyis lngag kunag po dkar po'i rnam po sa bzhin kaushegs pa thams cad kyis gsung thugs 'byung phyogs su badzugs
105b2(rgyud): de bzhin 'dod chags/ yod bzhin nor bu dam chog ste// rigs ni lnga po 'di rnams nyid// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
105b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa rjes su chags pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun pa'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rnga rje las srung ngo // de Sha
105b4(rgyud): de nas 'di srung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi la pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs sa/

105b6(rgyud): nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi
105b7(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin par gyur te shar gyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa/ rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
105b8(rgyud): la snyoms par lugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa'i btsun ma'amachog 'di nyid kyi srug sung thugs rdzalas byung ngo // dgar ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma tha tu cos na/

106a2(rgyud): 'dus du na gshegs pa pan kyi gas gas smra ba gis bya ba dzin la rnams pa sa na ba na pashegs pa thams cid kyi shes la rjes suchags kyi
106a3(rgyud): kyisku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // badz+rarate/ de nas 'di byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug sung thugs kyi rigs pa'i skyes bu de nyid bung med
106a4(rgyud): kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te byung gi grwang bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun ma'i mchog phud sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
106a5(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // la kAn ta kr-ita/

106b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bud nyid rdo// dram tshig bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos

107b8(rgyud): sa gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa pag tu med pas ma shes 'a ba sbyi pa tho bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa rnams par thugs te/ bya chub kyise pas 'di gsungs sa/

110a8(rgyud): shes pa can gyi ma byen 'dang sa// nab sa byas sa rgyas gnas// rnam pa pa'i mying ni brgyan// ba gangag mi nu ba grags sogs// rna pa pa ma ni bul ba bya// de sa byas nas
110b1(rgyud): bya chub ses dpa 'grags kyi rnamanas// da bzhin ga/ shags pa thams cad kyi sgru gAng du dang thums kyigs canags pa 'dus pa sa/ ra bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug
110b2(rgyud): da dka' ma to// dam pa martag las zung // 'didi dgas ni sa ga mug la khrugs// theg pa'i mchog na blan med//  ma tshi/ dngos grub sgrub pa byud // gangal pa sbyin pas
110b3(rgyud): na bas pa rnams/ se pa blan med pa pa// ga ga 'di 'grub par 'gyug ma ma la sa gsag/ ni chen po byed pa yang/

110b5(rgyud): tshig gi chos sun// dngos grub rgya na des 'job // sa gagaca ba'i gas dgal// mnyes par byas kyi mi gos te// den blo can rnam me tog/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// den
110b6(rgyud): mas cad rnam par sel ba lasags pa bya lu ba sems dpa' sams dpa chen sa dubyung bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
111a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mams cad kyil po khyim du 'de la su ca gang napa gzu zhing ga 'ong go// de nas bzhin ga shegs sa thams cad kyis sring pa thams cad rnam pa
111a2(rgyud): lang la sogs pa'i bya ba zhi sa pa' sems dpa ldan 'o sa sa na byung chub sa bdas dag pa 'di kyis paka smras to// denas kyi blarnams mad skad ma sa
111a3(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing ri rab la gos pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing skag la rgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa
111a4(rgyud): de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chubo sems dpa'
111a5(rgyud): dpa' tshan po 'di dag smad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgo gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang sa rnam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes
111a6(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs so snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos 'od kyis reg btsam gyis denas byang chub ba srad pa' sems dpa' chen pa de dag
111a7(rgyud): rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams can ngom tsher du gur rmed du byung / dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings 'di skad ces gsungs so// 
111b1(rgyud): mas sa mchos// semachis kyi don 'thung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med pa// rdo rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag/ nam mkha' dab ni mnyas nyid gnas/ 
111b2(rgyud): par mi thung snang ba mang// de sul phyag 'tshal dang // thugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i ga// dus gsu gal ma du 'byung // rnamam pa' chen po khams srung ba// nams sel lam sna
111b3(rgyud): 'dud// ning ma kha' stsal sa yang dag byung // nam mkha'i la bal gnas pa'o// nam mkha' thugs te chos rgyam / spyod pa'i gnas kyid phyag 'tshal lo// de mdo gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur
111b4(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi gas chen gsung ba 'dus pa las kun tu spyod pa'i mchog gi le'u spelnga pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gdu
111b5(rgyud): rtsigasang 'di zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsat+te/ badz+re swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das deb
111b6(rgyud): gshegs pa dzi rnam par snang mad dkyis rdul dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i gnas zhes bya ba'i dzem pa snyoms pa gags te rkyen gyis drub pa'i sngags 'ad gsungs sa// oMs na twa thA ga ta kA la
111b7(rgyud): ba.At+ma kor te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i de ji zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la soms par zhugs te gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i
111b8(rgyud): de gsungs na/ ses sdig tu ldag pa'i sa shA ma jug sa/ dang la de shen ga shegs pa gas // ga nga gan sa rnam par bskam pa 'o// de dag zad batshog sa kyis
112a1(rgyud): mtshan nyid tsun du bsgrub pa nyid duH// denas bcom ldan du na tu shegs pa dong ni chen nanags gas rgyu na pa snyams pa
112a2(rgyud): thugs te sngags 'di ga sungs so// mam ka mdzus b+hA bi k+ke te/ denas bcom lda zhi gshegs pa dzin 'di chubabs pa dzin yod ba zhes sde ba'i ting
112a3(rgyud): rin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa rnam pa lnga
112a4(rgyud): shegs pa thams can kyi mug thugs kyi bdag po dang chen po sa da bzhin gshegs pa da lags kyigs can 'dag zungs so// ga migs pa kyi mas kyis / 
112a5(rgyud): yidal bcwas byas pas// bai bya chag sa byu da // yid ni ba ga ga' sa ga/ ma phyi segs pa padag sa dag/ da sus kying na par bsgos// rnams gsus
112a6(rgyud): 'anam mkha' dang // mnyam kod gnas ni grub par bya// lus dang gdang sems dmigs pa'i// rnga na med ni dmigs su meng // sngags kyi phu la sbyor ba yis// byang chub med cing sgom pa'ang
112a7(rgyud): gas /  // de las rkye phru / na pa gyu /  ga gas kyi// de pa 'di man// 
112b1(rgyud): rgyas gzugs na rab srong nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam// sna'i rtse mor lungs dkar bas pa// yungs dkar
112b2(rgyud): bsgom// rnam ma pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnos par// ti dkyil 'khor bskam par bya// sa sa r+b+ba s+thA pi gnas pasgom te// na mi skye du gnas dag // hUMrnam ma'i'i dbyings kyi dbus gnasas
112b3(rgyud): gas pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgo pa gyi// sUr kyi tshul kyi stong bas// de nas pad madrong thog/ namamapa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pang / sbyin tshe dkyil 'khor bsgom pa bya// dang po'i sbyor banan tan gyis// 
112b4(rgyud): de yi steng du yongs su bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro// 'khor dag khyad par dag tu spro// ut+pa la mthing ga'i mdog
112b5(rgyud): rtse mo lnga pa gyid pa dadu// nas kyi 'tshad nan nyon gyis// sna 'i rtse mo rnam par bsam// than ka la bru tsha kyi// 'dabam brgyad pa ges bcas// sA la rtse mdo 'de shes te// byang chub gzhol bas
112b6(rgyud): par bya// 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du// bsgom pa der ni brtags par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas/ 
113a1(rgyud): dam pa bka' stsal te// gzugs dang sgra dang ro ldan pa/ shes rab cad kyis bla drug bsgom// gsang ba 'di nyid mdzod pe ni// legs ma ched nas kyang bsgom par bya// zas su bshad
113a2(rgyud): gci bya ba'i phyir// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pas bya// bla med de nyid 'grub pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa'o// sha yang bza' bar bya ba'i phyir// sha chen po ni rab tu brtag/ gsang ba'i sku dang
113a3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/ de bzhin dang po khyi ye sha/ zas kyi phyir ni bza' bar bya// gzhan zas bza' bar yang mi bya// sangs rgyas rnas
113a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' blo can yang // 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// myung du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod khams dbang phyug 'di brtan du// go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur// 
113a5(rgyud): bas ldan gtso bo gzo brjod can// mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong ba tsam gyis bskul me dpar// 'jig tan 'di dag dbang byed 'gyur// 'di ni thams cad sangs rgyas rtse// gsang ba byang chub
113a6(rgyud): / dam pa ste// yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// lus ngag sems las 'da' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sku dang gsung deng
113a7(rgyud): gas byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag pas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa mchog
113a8(rgyud): rabyang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa// bsten pas ji ltar 'dod pa las// 'di lta bus sbyor ba yis// nges par sangs rgyas myang thob 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad
113b1(rgyud): / ngi sa 'dod pa bsnyen bya zhing // 'dugs ma snang ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mazod par bya// dgra'athubangs pa mab da pas// bsten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod
113b2(rgyud): bas// bsten na myur du grub par 'gyur// slongs po bzhid mi bzlas te// bslangs 'daka' ba yang mi bya// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi lan lag dbyer med bzlas// lus dang ga dang sems rnams
113b3(rgyud): / bder gnas thob na byang chub 'thob// gzhan du dus na 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par skrag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni// sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod pas// chos dnga'i 'gyur
113b4(rgyud): chog brnyes rnams// 'dod pa thams cad bstan pas so// chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis// 'dod yon lnga rnams rtag tu brtan// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags par bya/ 
113b5(rgyud): gzugs la rnams gsum shes byas nas// mdzad pa'i bdag nyid car mchod bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// skal nas gsum shes byas nas// ska rnams la ni
113b6(rgyud): // de 'a bcom ldan snga tshogs pa// sangs rgya rim chen 'byung gnas gaH// dri la namagasum shes byas nas// sa sa rgyams shes ya rnam // da 'i bcom ldan sna chags pa// 'dod gas
113b7(rgyud): chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// rol rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas don yang rdo rje 'dzin// reg bya rnam gsum shes byas nas// rang gi
113b8(rgyud): rishes la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan na ldan// mi bskyod pa'i tshul brnyes rnams// gzugs sa dril sa gas pa la// rtag tu sems de sbyar 'bya// 'dides sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba nyid
114a1(rgyud): /  sa / kharnams da rgyu smra / kha / rkye sa ngas su/ 'as sa su / 
114a2(rgyud): mas san / ma na napa/  sa / tha ldan rnams/ da cheg ba na stod las/ ma
114a3(rgyud): tu 'thob par 'gyur// bud med gzugs ldan mdas bzung ba// mo grang sa bcu drug yon rnyed nas// byin gyis spre pa'i dan lags sa kyis// dben par mchod par rabatu btsam// de bzhin gshegs
114a4(rgyud): 'i btsun mo che// spyan la sogs pa sgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM da
114a5(rgyud): be lnga lngas khyab pa yi// rdorje padamo bskom bar bya// de ni 'ab bcas pa 'de bzhin// le du 'ongs pa som 'a na// sa margyam dzes ni sgom las gas// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya/ 
114a6(rgyud): la / rgyas rjesasu dun 'dis gzhas nan// b+ha ga me ga gaganas mag+ha/ 'ang pa bya// ba drugaci ba nas// mal pas pa sa rgyam nyid rnams / 
114a7(rgyud): chos sas dran pa bzlapa 'a// zlag seM sa ma ka/  zho /  d+ha nAs//  sa kyi sbyi nams s+ho// de ya rje sa
114a8(rgyud): ji ltar bsgom zhe na// b+ha gar leng garab bzhag nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// pa spu'i bug rtse bar nas// rdorje sprin nams spro bar bya// de la
114b1(rgyud): pas nga ge zhu 'dug/ rnal 'byer pa nin pos dbyung // dkyil 'khod kyil 'kho tshul du \u0f7f// de la blangs su dran pa de lta bsgom na na/ sangs sus kun gyi ga/ 
114b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas su long bo yis// bdag kyang dang 'dra krung sa ldan pa sa zhen/ derjes kyi gsungag nig// 
114b3(rgyud): dzin da dra / sa //  m+WA ra shig g.yang pa'i ba lanapa// bdag gisems byer// 
114b4(rgyud): dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgos na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// su dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra zhing // raba' dang brtur
114b5(rgyud): 'bo rnams// de la sngags kyi gzugs dang sra dang gsu dang thugs thams cad dus su dran pa ji ltar bsgo shin/ sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yed// gas 'i du sa bsgom pa// bdag
115a1(rgyud): 'dra ba'i sku// rtag tu sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dam tshig tu cwa cho ga bzhin// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs
115a2(rgyud): pa'i tshogs kas kyi// dngos grubar bu mchog thob par 'gyur// des shes rab sa kyi byin pa dmacheg rdzas su dran par sbyar bsgom zhen/ thams cad rang zhin 'ad gsal pa// skye ba med cing
115a3(rgyud): pa med cing mngon rtogs med// khams kyang med cing 'byung ba med// de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom nad// rang sani ni 'odogs pa denas ni// nam mkha' mtshar med mi
115a4(rgyud): 'gyur des// gnyis med gnyis su med min ni// shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin// de la zhe sdang gi rigs kyi mchod pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// lo blangs
115a5(rgyud): bcu gnyis lon rnyed nas// rigs kyi sbyor ba'i rab bye bas// rang gi khubs mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dag dang // chos 'dzin mchog gi gsu
115a6(rgyud): dkan+te// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// su dang gsung thugs pang dag grug// dpan myos gang gzhan pa shad pa rnams// rdo mo phyed gsum pa rnam la la// bzlas pa sa la 'grub par 'gyur/ 
115a7(rgyud): shugs pa rnams dkyi drug sngags kyigs can zhes / 'dus pa las sngags kyi da pa le ste bdun 'o// denapa brgya ldan sa de na gshegs
115a8(rgyud): na chen tog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pod papa'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsal ba btab bo// de rgyal ba theg pa me// nam
115b1(rgyud): ka' sad pas rnams ston pa// kung du 'byung po'i / 'dod chags nisang gti mug sa// rdo rje theg par bston pa// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i
115b2(rgyud): // rgyal gzhi patshad pa bshad du gsol// bor ba'i saman rab ston pa// theg pa gsum kyil ma 'jug mdzad// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdaka/ me mchog mchid babashad du gsol// 
115b3(rgyud): byachub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan// chos kyi 'khor lor bskor ba// sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ rdo rje theg pa khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' pa 'gyur // 
115b4(rgyud): mas cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin// 
115b5(rgyud): grang 'bashad// ni chung yangs pa'i tshig can no// gzugs dang lang chos brgyan na nas/ lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon gzug/ khyom mong mas kya rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'im/ 
115b6(rgyud): la ba nyid skyes zhi ba ni pa'i gnas// bshad ma tshul sogs pas byug pa yang // rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag pa rab tu bya// nu ma'i dbus gar skyi gtsug mtha' dngos su// cho ga shes pas twang ba'i/ 
115b7(rgyud): 'a du ya //  bar snad gsang brgyal sa// rigs na mes stong parabatu bya// dmas pa'i dbyings khyong bsuMganas // oM hrI mtshabarnas par bya// bdag nyid na'i dbus
115b8(rgyud): gnas ba nos// sakhamapas she dang 'dzin// mang ga ga shig 'dod // bkru 'i dag kyang ba bya/  na na cin zhi'i rang bzhin// 'ad ba phreng bas rnam brgyan / 
116a1(rgyud): 3/ \u0f7f/ ma dus gzus kyi// gnas su gyur ba rnam par 'asam// rang gi la spu'i bu gnas mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams s+ho// mkhas pas chud pa la dag dang // bad+marnam pa lnga shes bya
116a2(rgyud): nga tin ma gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams lan 'bul bar bya// me tog gar ni ga dang // ma wi ga dpa mig/ me tog ga bir yang // khamams nam mchod par btu btag/ dpag cad
116a3(rgyud): / 'khor la 'dakyil 'khor ba stes bya zhid // rnam par gakhas pas d+hag par ni// rigs rnams pa tu med par bya// de bzhin pad+ma rdo rje dang // ram kri yang pa la mkhas pas bsgom// dpas
116a4(rgyud): bye ba'i khyon tsam la// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi// mchod rten rin chen ba'i'i rang bzhin// gas pa zhing rang bzhin dri' yod// rigs rnams gnas ni mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis bsgom
116a5(rgyud): bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// de la mched pargya mche ba rtsam// rin chen na bza' la sogs pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis// rtag tu ldan
116a6(rgyud): nyes par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas na tung mchog/ den chen sna tshogs pa sogs brgyan// bsgrub cing ba tu bsgrus pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbus par bya// rin chen bdun gyis yongs bkang
116a7(rgyud): zhing 'di rnam pa ga khas pa y-i ye shes 'did pas dngos grub 'di // rten shes rab can ma la// bdag po'i phyag rgya mam gzhag la// sas rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus pacwaH// 'dod chag
116a8(rgyud): can sangs rgyas la// reg bya'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// nam sa pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil lakhar bkod pa bsgom par bya// rang lus de bzhin gshegs rang bzhen// bshadas
116b1(rgyud): sa rjod// bzhin bzang med du 'ong ba ye// na chung bral ba'i mchog ldan pa// byin gyi brlabs kyi gnas mas ma te// de nyid mchod pa rab tu btag/ meg yangs khu ba blangs nas ni// btad pa'i blo dang ldan pa
116b2(rgyud): dang thugs kyi gseng chen gsang ba 'dus pa las bshad gtso'i dam tshig gi le'u sa brgyad pa'o// de nas rgyal ba dor 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur ro// thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ 
116b3(rgyud): kun den dbang phyug dam pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod pa// dorje mi byed gsu dkyil la 'o// sangs rgyas theg pa can la gsapa// nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
116b4(rgyud): / dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgos par bya// me bskyed rdo rje rab bsgobs nas// lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'od 'phro mang po'abar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum
116b5(rgyud): srung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// bsgoms nas rdo rdzas phye ma 'drag/ sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// rdo rjes byer ba drags med gyur pa// bsam gtan mchog de bsgom na ni// thugs kyi dngos grub tho/ 
116b6(rgyud): par gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad pas ngan no// me bskyed sangs rgyas med du ni// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las zhes sdang gi rigs kyi
116b7(rgyud): chog gi de khon pa shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal po dang 'dzed// me shes thang por bsgrub pa// ngo bo nyid dag gos 'amed// khyed chub spyod pa ston pas// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa'i// yang pas
117a1(rgyud): dam chog bka' byul to// nam mkhara' dbyings kyi dbul gnas par// 'khor lo dkyil la 'ong bsgom par bya// rnam par snang ba de rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par
117a2(rgyud): bsgos// rin chen kun gyi myong ba yis// rdo rje'i gzugs ni btu btag/ nor rnams thams cad phyogs nas su// dong gsum gyisarnam pi bsgob// yid bzhin no bu 'dra ba yis// nod gyi rgya mchos
117a3(rgyud): rab gang gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang // thub pa'i skyes bu rnams su 'gyur// 'di ni rigs rgya mtsha thams cad las gti mug gi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam chog tu shes par bya'o// da nas rgya
117a4(rgyud): / rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags thar pa rab bsgrub pa// gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas// dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
117a5(rgyud): bar bya// 'od dpag med ni rab bsgoms to// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad ni// dgang zhing de du thams cad ni// btsun mo'i rnam pa'i sbyor bar bsgom// dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// 'di ni
117a6(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// mi phyed sku gsum sgrub pa'o// 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i
117a7(rgyud): dmachog ste/ sngags pas bsgom par bya ba nyid do// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa// ye shes las kyang bdag med pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsas to// nam gakha'i
117a8(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje de na lan rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// brdzun gyi dag ni rdo rje'i gnas// thams cad
117b1(rgyud): da// ni khya dus pa smra'o//  'dzin// de rjeg mos nyid rgya
117b2(rgyud): lcags kyi dngos grub byed bang bshad// 'dod de mchog 'gugs pa'i rigs rjed
117b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
117b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu rmad du gyu
118a1(rgyud): seMs la dugs bu pan 'di 'du shes dang// smad pa'i 'dug ba 'das tham skad cig/  phyir dang/ rigs kyi bkang 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i slad pa
118a2(rgyud): mchog spyod pa'o// gang 'di sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpar na nam mkha' na thams cad la rjes su song bas/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha
118a3(rgyud): su gtogs pa'o// de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas// gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi la mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu chos
118a4(rgyud): thams cad ni de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o// 'di la bu'i don gyi dbang mkhyen nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad do rigs kyi bu de lta bu nyid
118a5(rgyud): nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gtsub shing dang gtsub sman dang mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen kyi
118a6(rgyud): du rab tu 'byung zhing me/ 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi// me de yang gtsub shing lam gnas/ gtsub sbyin la mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bstod pa la yang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin
118a7(rgyud): shegs pa thams cad rdo rje dam chog rjes su rig par bya ste/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pas zhes pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur pas dram
118a8(rgyud): tshig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so// mad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang // rnam par mi tog dag pa la// kun rdzob yang ni bshad pa mtshar// de bzhin
118b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de khon nyid kyi don bye dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
118b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po rdo rje kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces
118b3(rgyud): gsol to// de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa// sku dang gsung thugs gsang bar skyugs// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ 
118b4(rgyud): nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mchog tse// 'bar ba gtum po spyan langs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// rnam par mi
118b5(rgyud): dmigs pa// mnyam nyid gar yang mi gnas pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
118b6(rgyud): nugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
118b7(rgyud): rag pa du ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i gar gyi rol pa ston par mdzad de// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas par 'dod pa'i yon tan
118b8(rgyud): rnams kyis rol pa gyes pa yongs su spyod pa yod kyang de dag sngags spyod pa mamangon par brtson pa rnams la spyan ras kyis ma 'gyis/ de cugang 'i phyir zhe na/ kye sa 'didi na da zhin ga shegs pa
119a1(rgyud): thams cad sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos thos pas so// de'i phyir skyes bu dma' chen po de rnams kyi spyan rab kyis btsa' ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung
119a2(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang sngags thams cad kyi thugs kun tu sprul par byed pa zhes bya ba 'i rab tu gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/ de rje
119a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lamanges par brjod pas sngag
119a4(rgyud): bsdus pa 'di gsungs so// oM hUM AHswA hA/ de ras 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang b.ras// rab tu 'ang ba ning rgyal bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// 
119a5(rgyud): phyagan rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungasas// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bskum par bya// de yi dbus gnas sde
119a6(rgyud): / rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtaka/ rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba// rnam par 'phrob bsam par byo// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sdug sung thugs// dras par de yis rnam par bsgom// dam thug nyid de
119a7(rgyud): gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// kun gyi gtso bo dbang
119a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi// snying po rdo rje bsdus pa'o// rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas na// gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul// zhal gsum rnam pa'i sbyong ba yis// khadag gsum kyis rab tu
119b1(rgyud): bac+doMd pan dang ska das tshig gis de skad nas bka' stsal to// de la 'di mchog rdo rje'i gsang ba'o// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi thugs pa yi// dbus chung phra mo rnam bsgom bya// de yi dbus bu chud
119b2(rgyud): / pagam chog gi tshig pa las so// klong brda byed pa ni// rtse mo lnga pa rtag tu bsgom// rdo rje lugs kyu'i sbyor ba yis// do rje gsum nabyas pa skam byengad bya// de yis thugs ni kabi ba / 
119b3(rgyud): lha yang rab tu bskul bar bya// 'dod rdo rje thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje lugs kyu rnams bsgom pa// rdo rje pad mo'i rigs la sogs// thugs ni bskul ba rab bshad pa// 
119b4(rgyud): 'dad rol po'i byung ba ste// rdo rje yon sul bachog 'di// zhag bad bar du byas na no// gsang tshan sru dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes rdo rje can grub 'gyur// 'jigs shi shing nas spang/ khu
119b5(rgyud): mchog stsol ba ni rnam par gzigs// yid ni mgu bas dga' ba yi// dngos grub rgya cher steng bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog 'dzin rnams// 
119b6(rgyud): gal te mangs padag nyid 'das na// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje gsum mchog ston pa po// 'jig rten gsuM mchog rdo rje gcas// gsung ni 'di skad bkra' stsal / 
119b7(rgyud): sngags kyi skyes bu je snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dmi tshigs
119b8(rgyud): pa'o// rig pa'i dbang phyug zugs pa la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab bskom zhing // chags shing chags pa'i ltabs blta// 'don dam chag dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal po darda 'dzin// de bzhin
120a1(rgyud): gshegs kun bdag nyid skyes// thams cad da'ang bskur langs rgyas gtses// gzung na 'di sa bka' stsal to// 'jig rten khams na thams cad na// ji snyed bud medapa
120a2(rgyud): ba kun// phyag rgya chen po'i sngon sbyor bas// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// bye ba grangs med rdo rje can// sangs rgyas gnas na dor spro bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kying mchog gis 'dis
120a3(rgyud): bka' stsal to// byang chub 'di yis 'thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa' cha des 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa tha
120a4(rgyud): cad kyis dang gsung dang thugs kyi gas chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u sa bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das su
120a5(rgyud): zugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug
120a6(rgyud): rigs pa skyes bu mchog gi le'u 'di gsungs so// de jigasum yig sngags kyi mchog/ phyog rgya che po rnams bsgos pa// byang chub thams cad 'thob pa na// dwe shas rdo rje drug gis
120a7(rgyud): oM yig ye shes snying po ste// rdo rje sun 'thob byed pa'o// AHyig byang chub sprul pa'i bdag/ de rje gsung na 'thob byeng pa'o// hU~M lig sA gsung thugs yin te// rdo rje gsung ni mi phyed

120b1(rgyud): bsam// de ru ga ga bsam te// dang sbyin ni 'phro skyed pa'o// des 'di ni ye shes do 'i skyeng can/ thA/ rdorje pa dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ngagang+gA de rab tu sgoso// gsalang dkyil 'tha
120b2(rgyud): bas pas// min min napa par sas/  kyi la ba dbus gnas par/  zhog/ ga ts+tsha gaganas kyi sgomapa te// nga ka rlung byung bsam par bya// bcom pan
120b3(rgyud): ma tshig gsum gyi gas pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying po dus gsumasangs rgyas kyi// rgyu gsung thugs ni zhes byed pa// maM l-ig sangs rgyas sku'i mchog/ aM/ AHl-ig sangs rgyas ka
120b4(rgyud): las// ts+tsha d+ha 'i ga ga / sa/ 2 sa man gyi// sa sa rgyas bya ba sgrub pa// mi gas ngas srul pa // sangs rgyas rgyud
120b5(rgyud): 'bras bu 'byung // 'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu nyid// sngags dang rig pa zhes bsgrags pa// bskyed pa la sogs dam tshig dag/ rdo rje gsum mi phyed pasnyoms pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
120b6(rgyud): glas dam chog de kho na nyid ye shes rdo rje byin gyis drob pa'i chu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par dben zhing nyam sa dga' bar// sbyor ba 'di ni kun tu brtsam// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs 'grubs phyogs

121a1(rgyud): tshugs sa kyi ni 'gru pa grus na sa dzig la gyu to// de pa shegs pa ma khyod pa da zhed bya ba'i/ 
121a2(rgyud): 'dzin to// rnam sa pa do dbus gan pa pa'i// cho mchog khong la ma pa sa / rang gi sngags kyi snam bu 'askyed/  ga ga galam la dgo// mdog snga pa dziH// 'jog rten dbang gyur
121a3(rgyud): dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te// tshig gid mtshig lnga yi mchog/ chos kyi chog gi lam gnas pa// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// de ji gsum gyi ga pA ni// ye shes lnga
121a4(rgyud): ldan bsten cing gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas// de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//
