121a6(rgyud): // rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// sngon pa da rje thugs las byung // ye shes yon tan rgya mchi 'gyur// rdo rje gsum gyi ma di// ye shes lnga ldan pa sten gnas
121a7(rgyud): shing // bcom ldang 'das rje thug sa gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdug sung rdugs dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ye shes dkyi 'khor
121a8(rgyud): dbus pu ni// rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya// lus rnams kun la yig khaM// rdo rje ye shes mkha' nyams 'gyur// le/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // kal pa
121b1(rgyud): gsum ni mchog gnas// sang sa rgyas kyis kyang gzigs pa 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dpa mkha rdo bad pa chag gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// thug su thugs don mi snangab 'byung ba bkod pa phyed ba ca
121b2(rgyud): sa bya ba'i ting ngange 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus las ni// rang sngags skyes bu ba bsgoms pa// snying gar 'ardzananapa pa// bshag ste 'od par rnam par bsgom// haM/ 'jam dpal dam tshig rdzogs longs
121b3(rgyud): sngag phung thugs kyi rdo rje can// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid du// sa bcu dag la gan ba dera'agyur// byang chub sems dpa'aye shes dam tshig bla ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyi
121b4(rgyud): byad bus gnas papa// 'od zer dba' bar yi ge th+liM// mchon sa chog da rje'i lus pa ni// 'asgom pan rdo rje'i sku mnya 'gyur/ l-I/ dam mkhar rdo rdo ngas chen ge bzhod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
121b5(rgyud): mngon shes lnga dad mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/ 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// sang se rgyas mngon shes bachog sgrub pa'o// nam sna 'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// 
121b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsas// rdo rje bems dpa' dab bsgoms pa// the shes oM yig bsgom par bya// ka~M/ rdo ji dam tshig gsum pa sgoms pas// me ba skyod rdo rje gsum 'dub gyur// bcom
121b7(rgyud): pi bskyod pa'i sgra 'dra dang // gsung dang thugs mchog tag tu 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod rdo rjes mched par 'gyur/ 
121b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dam tshig mngon par 'gyung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnam par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// nam mkha' dang
122a1(rgyud): rab bsgoms la// rin chen po yig bsgob par bya/ oM/ do dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// de rje gsum kyi tog 'drar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje na chen tog gis de skad
122a2(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// sku dang gsung thugs rje yis// rin chen tog gi 'od dang 'dra// de ni bdag med byang chub dang // ye shes gsang ba mnyam gnas 'gyur// rin pon dpa tshig longs spyod rdo rjerjes
122a3(rgyud): kyedabus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// chos kyi oM yig bsgom par bya// oM// 
122a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'a dpag med pas de skad ces bka' stsam to// yon tan dpag tu byed pa'i 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam pakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ 
122a5(rgyud): sas rgyam dkyi ladzu ma pa bsdum//  pal sa bsgosas nas// dam tshan kyi legs rgya bzhes// de ma tshog gsus pa pa pas// de don medag nga 'dra ba lku / 
122a6(rgyud): dan ma pa'i de bcig 'byung ba 'od zer la shes kyi mchog 'byung ba nas bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnam ma kha'i byings kyid dbus gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas dkyi 'khor 'dab bang bas so// 
122b1(rgyud): madrang rab bsgom pa la// sgra gsum mo yig rab tu bsgom// oM// do dum chag gsum pa skams pas// rnam par snang mdzad mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang ga yod rdo rje yis// rnam par lnga ya
122b2(rgyud): / de ni ye shes rdzogs byung tug/ sku gsum ma phyed srub byed 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dang rnam par spang ma ring kyi de mid ces bka' sus to// sus dang ga dang yid dmags pa rdegs par bye chub pa
122b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// de bo rnam par dben pa dang // chu klung 'bab pa rnams dang ni// dur khrod la sogs rnams su yang // bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bya// mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje sogs// dan
122b4(rgyud): kha' dkyil gnas pasam// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// gnas susangs rgyas mchig rnams bsgom// bcom ldan 'ad mdza chen po de ma tshig rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka stsal te/ 
122b5(rgyud): rje rjer bcwa lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gnas lnga rab tu sbyor ba yis// de rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// me stegam po 'khrug pa yi// rang sngags 'kho la bskam par bya// rdo rje lnga ni spying
122b6(rgyud): mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// rnam sa tha' do rje dkyil gnas par// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra// bsgoms nas sangs rgyas 'jug pa yis// sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas

122b8(rgyud): smol// snying kar yi zhe bsgoms nam// sems de zhig le
123a1(rgyud): / bzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// che bag med par rab tu bsgob// steng gapa bgegs bas pas te// rdo thig par gtogs pa bzhag/ 'di dam tshig mchog gi mchog/ 
123a2(rgyud): rjegasum ni pi phyed bsgom// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'thob 'gyur ba'i// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par// bsgom bya gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// lus ngag sems la ye
123a3(rgyud): sr-i/ khasams ni de ni bskal par gnas// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par// bsgom bya chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni// lus ngag sems la yi ge AH// nga sams na de ni bskal bar gnas// nam mkha' rdo rje
123a4(rgyud): dbyings gnas par// bsgom bya rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni// lus ngag sems la li ge hUM// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// 
123a5(rgyud): dang gsung thugs de nga ye/ rnal 'byor 'de ga nas bzung ste// klog gas yadzin sems kyang rung // de yang rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dang gsung dang thugs kyi gas
123a6(rgyud): nagasang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bston pa rdo rje 'dzin// smras pa ye shes maco// 
123a7(rgyud): ba pas// dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid// rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal pa// mkha' dang mtshungs pa mnyam gyur pa// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la// rol mo 'ang dag rab tu bsgom// 
123a8(rgyud): brgyan// ri bo skye bom dben pa du// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa bsrub// me// lus dang ngag sems rdo rdza la// 'jam pa'i rdo rje rab tu
123b1(rgyud): 'drur// s+ya dang gsams la slob// 'pha kha'ido 'dra bar 'gyur// dpagasad brgyar na rgyam ga/ dardza bang ba' 'das na// snang bgyung dag pa' bdag nyid de// rgyan rnams kun gyis bstan pa ni// tsha
123b2(rgyud): pa drag po la sogs lhas// nam yang mthong bar mi nus so// 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog gi dam tshig mi snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung // bshang gce mchog lnga rnams ni/ 
123b3(rgyud): lcags gsum dang ni ldan byas nas// khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi mi phyed pa'i// thugs ni de du rab tu bsgom// de ni de ma thag nyid du// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'od 'dra gagyur/ dang
123b4(rgyud): las 'khor lo na// 'od 'phro dngas mchog can bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// bsgoms na sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur// ring ba sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yad pa
123b5(rgyud): ye// de yi ngas sgra 'brang bar 'gyur// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra// 'di ni 'khor lo das tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chen po dang sngags kyis// dkyila'o kho dbus su rab bsgoms la/ 
123b6(rgyud): kun gyi gnas men pa // bsams nang 'dra ba gyi // ri sa ma cu drug // rgyu rnams sring pa'o//  kyi ni thad me rnams// yon tan ca ma gyu/ 
123b7(rgyud): gis phyag byas pa// khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rjes bsam nas su/ mo rnams kun gyi

131b2(rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang // 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis// gzi brjid de la dbab par bya// de ni de mthag nyid du// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byod/ 'jam dpal dang ni mnyam zha
131b3(rgyud): klas la// gan su las byed par 'gyur ro// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can dbang bsrung // dga' byon chen po sem par mdzad// mthong ba nyid kyis byung ba yi// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rin po che'i dam
131b4(rgyud): tshig gi sprin pa kod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rjer srin po ni// drag ceng krol rab gtum dang // wa dang sna tshogs bya rog dang // bya rgod kyi yis gang bar bsgom// me yid kyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ 
131b5(rgyud): dgra bo dmas ni rtag par bsgom// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa// bsams nas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya// rgyu ma rus bcud khrag la sogs// kun gyis grangs pa rnam par bsgom// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs
131b6(rgyud): pas mnan/ kha sgoms na dgran mas 'chi bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas do rje 'dzin pas kyang // gal te 'di ltar ri'i bsgoms ma// zla byed dad du rdzogs pa la// 'tshochi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mo pa// rdo rje ljin dam
131b7(rgyud): tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par snang mdzad nal gsum pa// ston pa'i chu skrong mdog 'drabs ma/ dkar po nag po rab tu dmar// thong tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan/ 
131b8(rgyud): / dag pa ga dmang po napa// ba yang tshugs du na la// legan pa'i chu khyod 'o// 'ad cigs pa ma ma sa/ bang dag pa dgang po / 
132a1(rgyud): sna tshogs bsnams par bsgom// sems can kun la phan bzhed ma// sman ma zhal gsum dag tu bsam// dkar pon ga po dmar pa ci// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu bskyem/ 
132a2(rgyud): // dri bzhid nal ga pa// gdag pa sa tshul// ngas pa'i ga gas su ga tu stu/ gsung da na rgyal man// dbadag po'i rnam pa ste// rdos
132a3(rgyud): rgya thal// dog pas pa sa cwo// ga 'dod 'chu brdzums// zhagags rdzogs pa na // se gtsug ga pa'i ma na// bam mas shes thob par 'gyug/ 
132a4(rgyud): ni pog shin drugashad// zhalags drag pa'i 'od b.rang ba// rnon po gas bya'ang 'jigs par byed// khadogonas po rab tu bsgos// gzhan gyi ma thub thobacwa// khrag tu band pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ 
132a5(rgyud): nal gas ma dzad par mang podag// rab tu 'phro ba rnam par bsam// khro ma chen po rtamagrin no// bsgrub pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyis nan// sbyor ba can gyi rtag tu bskos
132a6(rgyud): bdudan ci khro 'an// 'od zer 'gro ba rab tu ladrug/ drag po de rnga' bar ba 'dra// 'jigs pa dag cad 'jigs par byed// 'dod pa'i ye shes khro ba \u0f7f// rgal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed// 
132a7(rgyud): rigs par byed pa'i mchog/  d+mo'i rgyal po rab tu bsgom// stobs pa che ni rdo rjerje// 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel pa// gdug pa thams cad pa joms par byed// zhal gsum pani gas
132b1(rgyud): ral grizha bas pa bsdams// brtul thug ca se gal gsum bsnam// gtsug gtor chen po lag gcig/ 'od mer dag ni kun tu 'gro// zhal gsum 'bar ba'i 'khor la can// pad ma gtan 'ad pa
132b2(rgyud): tsugator rgyas// ga gzhan sngags kyi 'khor la can// dam che longs spyod 'dirnams kyis// sems sor bsgom par bya// sman pa rnams kyin ting nge 'ang na// dpag med pa'i shad pa yin// bri bdag na
132b3(rgyud): de ri lang // nam papa'i steng pas shin tu 'phags// nams pa'i dbyings khyod bus gnas pa// gsal pa'id dkyi 'khor ma la pasam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dab pasgom pa la// rnam par snang ma dadam
132b4(rgyud): pa stu// gas rna pa nas/  me rdzog pa 'i // ma nga thas ga byung / mas da rgyun b+h+ya b+ha// rkyed rnams rnaMms brgyan pa dag/ ma
132b5(rgyud): chub de li myong // bsam gtan da bu ba sgom pa// de yis pa ste rgyasache ba'i bdag / 'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// nam byar srung mang dngas cig 'byung ba
133a1(rgyud): thos lags pa pa'i lus dang 'dra// 'ab ba snga tshugs mnyam pa'i 'od// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na// 
133a2(rgyud): do rjo ny-id ni snang du 'thob/ bsam gtan do rab bstsal pa/ 'dis ni rje'i bdag nyid pa// sems can thams cad bar byed pa/ 'di nyi la thob par 'gyur/ dam chog thams cad 'byungs
133a3(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// namamakha' do rje'i dbus gnas pa// chos nyid kyi lakho dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// chom gyi sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ 
133a4(rgyud): ba'i khrus 'dzin ni ni// rgyan rnams kun gyi rnam par brgyan// 'ad bar sprin ni la khor poH// rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgos// 'di las chos kyi bdag nyid ce// sku gsum mi phyed las byung ba/ 
133a5(rgyud): rgya mtshos rnam brgyan pas// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// chos kyi sems dpa' 'thung ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam ma kha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil
133a6(rgyud): 'khor dam pa bsas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab ba sgoms la// sun pa mchoganarnam par bsgob// nas mdzes sngon ni dab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brtan// mtshan rnams pa
133a7(rgyud): tu dwags//  myed ma'i mtshig canag/ lams ga dag bang nyid pa// 'gas ma dzubam ci byed// la pa'i mi pan na mod// sngag la ba ma rlo pa
133a8(rgyud): chogading ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzi to// nams 'do dadus gnas par// dod kyil lakhor 'o mchog pasas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni ba pa sgom pan/ 
133b1(rgyud): tshog ba bsgom// nang babang snyan na rab tu yangs// ud pa las tha~Mng ga mdog 'dra ba// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdugs// nam mkha' dam chog mchog rab bsgom// phyagan yud pa
133b2(rgyud): dam ts+tshaste// khams gsu ga gi phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ dngos dod can kyigasang// dpapa' ma tsha nga tu da khyim par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya
133b3(rgyud): dbus gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'kha~Mng dbang bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgrim pa la// rdo rje chos pa rab tu bsgom// zhal bzang sbyin ni rab tu langs// pad+ma dag
133b4(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba// snrums 'dzin pa'i mchog las byung // 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// phyag na yud pal dpang
133b5(rgyud): mdzes bsdams// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa// chos kyi ye shes 'byung gi nas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje rngan gyi gsad// chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun tu sto
133b6(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam ma kha' do rdo dbus gnas par// dngos lab dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs da da nga bsgoms pa// sgrol ma mchog ni bsgom par bya// zham ba ra
133b7(rgyud): rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba'i 'od// bud med skams rab tu myos// rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las byung // sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa// ud pal ljang ser
133b8(rgyud): ba'i mdangs// phyag na bsdams pa rab tu bsgom// dam tshig slo ma mchog dang ldan pa zhis bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' da rje'i dbus gnas par// nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ 
134a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par bsgoms// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros// spyan dmar
134a2(rgyud): ba nam par gtsigs// phyagan dal gri bsdams par bsgoms// dbu rgyan snang mdza ba cugs bsgoms na// rdo can ni gyes par 'gyur// 'di ni ye shes do can// thams cad khro
134a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i rdo rje bul gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms
134a4(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub rab tu bsgom// 'bar ba 'od zer mang po can// la gyis brgyan cing skye rags can// zhal ni rnam par gtsigs shing bgrang // kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom// mi bskyod dpa
134a5(rgyud): dbu rgyan pa// bsams na rdo rje can dag dgyes// 'di ni ye shes rdo rje can// thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig go/ gzhan gyis me thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'
134a6(rgyud): dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje d+ha mgrin rab tu bsgom// gre ze'i mod zer mang po dag/ thams cad du ni rnam par 'a
134a7(rgyud): dag pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan// kha dog dmar po rnam par bsam// rdzogs sa ngas bdag med dbu sman pa// bsgoms na rdo rje can dag sa nyes// 'din rdo rje la shes can// thams cad khro
134a8(rgyud): / mgrin paskyed pa 'byung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nam sapa 'a dong dbus gnas pa'i/ gshes dkyil 'khor dpa ba bsam/ sangs rgyas gzug na/ 
134b1(rgyud): / na nas ma /  / ma cig zhes ma dzin //  ma
134b2(rgyud): dzi kyi bre lakhong dmu pabasam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab ba sgoms pa// Ta ti'i rgyal po dab bskom bya// khro ba 'jigs pa'i chalugs gtum// 'jigs bdag kyang 'jigs par byed// can nas
134b3(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs// de 'od babang bsgom par bya// mi bskyed dam tshig dgu rgyan la// bskam sa nas nyis pa btu 'jal// 'di ni thams cad go 'o la// 'da' ba dka' ba'i dmachog
134b4(rgyud): byasam gtan do rje rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes pa ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rjes bus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bas ma// mangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms pa// 
134b5(rgyud): ngo ni rab tu bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'gro// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor// kr-i ning drug po nags pa 'dzin// rdo rje stobs can bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dang tshig dbu brgyan la/ 
134b6(rgyud): da mdzes pa rab tu 'phel// 'di ni thams cad khro ba yi// 'ding bar dag ba'i dam tshig 'o// dngagasum gyi stebs zhes bya ba'i ting ngange 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ 
134b7(rgyud): ma pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sngon po rnam par bsgom// khrol 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// gzugs ni rab tu gnas
135a1(rgyud): danag pa'i rgya mtsha phyed par byed// 'bar 'a'od zer mang po 'phro// do rje byug thogs pa sgos par bya// me baspyod dam theg dbu rgyan pa// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur/ 
135a2(rgyud): pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// mi g.yo ma tshig ni rnam par bsgom// khros shing 'jigs pa'i zung gyis lha// ram gri zhags pa bsnams pa la khrug/ 'bar ba 'od zer mang po 'gro// 
135a3(rgyud): mig so rnga can pasgom bya// mi bskyod dam che ga dab rgyan la// bsgoms na mnyes par rab tu 'phel// 'di na thams cad khri ba yi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dmatshig yin// rdo rje nam mkha' dbyings kyi gnas/ 
135a4(rgyud): gdon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// nal lab rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa // nyi ma kyil 'khor dam pa pasam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms pa// rig pa'i 'khor lor rab tu 'byung / mtshan
135a5(rgyud): rams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// 'khor lo 'bar bas yongs su bskor// gtsug tong 'khor lo dam tshig ni// rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na nyes par
135a6(rgyud): rab tu 'phel// 'di ni thams cad khro bo yi// 'da' bar bka' ba'i dam tshig go// gtsug tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par
135a7(rgyud): kyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// do sum b+ha rab tu bsgom// me ste rnon po 'bar ba'i sku/ 
135b1(rgyud): so krung thob par 'gyur// ma bstod dam chog dbu rgyan la// bskyo spyan tesang rarab tu 'pheb// 'di na thams cad khro ba yi// 'da' bar dga' ba'i dmachog go// rdo rje dang tshig sum bla rab tu 'byung ba/ 
135b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin to// 'gog pa khro bo 'khor lo ni// sangs rgyas 'khor lo bstan pa yis// ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
135b3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi gsang men gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje'i dam tshig bkod pa de kho na nyid kyi don bsgom pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom
135b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos zhi ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun
135b5(rgyud): rini nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // ma~M du ra s+phu ru dA la ti shwa sid+d+ha la tsa ni sang aHsa d+ha ni swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// phun sum tshogs kun yid bzhes pa// mnyes shing
135b6(rgyud): rabatud kyis gyur pas// sangs rgyas dong rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rnams na snyed pa//  mas na slab cig// rdo rje da mcheg srul mdzadas// shi ba sos par byed par gsungs// rdorje 'chang
135b7(rgyud): chen pos de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das su gsum gyi mche ga khro bo rdo rjes dngos po dang dngos po med pa'adam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin tha
135b8(rgyud): nakyi mun pa mchog 'di nyid thugs sa pa dang sus/  sha /  ni ga su du u su skye de// rgyal ta d+ma/ dang da
136a1(rgyud): / ni mi byed pa// rdo can mnyes spyan gdangs nas// rdo rje thugs ni rjes su dran// srung ba'i do skyong bal// rtag tu las ni rab bsgrub// rdorje chen po'achags rten pa// ga tu stob na/ 
136a2(rgyud): pabashad// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ma snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dmachog gi sku'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung
136a3(rgyud): rgyas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun ma'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs do rdo las byung ngo // oMt+ta hud bu swA hA/ de nas 'di na gsungs tsas kyi
136a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bdag tshe skyes mnyes// rdo rje'i su ni rjem su dran// bsam gtan ye shes thob gyur bso// sangs rgyas do rje sde chen dang // sems can khams ni kun na sa su// skad cig gis ni dran
136a5(rgyud): bzhin du// thams cad g.yo meng dbang du byed ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas
136a6(rgyud): dam med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rdeg shin rjeg shed pa can po dang dra da kyi sku gsung thugs de rje las phyung ngo // nams man ta
136b1(rgyud): kats+tshad+d+ha badz+raH/ o la pa d+hA mdzAti/ sab du ta sarba dang ka/ yas ruka ba bar shu b+da sha k+Sha/ natung thul/ tsa hung rlung / shAru tsang \u0f7f A ga taH/ A
136b2(rgyud): gapa las/ sA gang lal/ sarba thA d+had/ mtham pa/ ni ma na / badze Sh+Than/ pra be sha la pra'i shA la/ mthuN+Da lam d+he paM 'aM sa te/ dI bit+ta na ta kAr/  du dumams
136b3(rgyud): ng+yas/ da nyid haM/ patsa baH/ mA~M bo lam balnga pa lam pa/ samalas nu sbyar/ d+hAdz+dza/ phaT phaT/ bi s+phoT ya bri s+phoT la/ swarbAn nA sha la ka ki / bi shAn+d+ha sarba a shA pA ri d+ha / 
136b4(rgyud): te thA ga pan/ kan tsa la saM/ mams pa su Sh+tsa/ drA ya swA hA/ de nas 'din sa sungs tsam rnaMs// sangs rgyas kun na grings chen po/ 'jigs shing kun dugs gyur nas// rdo rje sems ni rdzas su
136b5(rgyud): na// thong pa ma chag chags pa// gzugs mdzes yang 'od rnyed pa la// dang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas// sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya// mAm sde ma sbyin yang rung // do chen po rigs
136b6(rgyud): mthon po// lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni// de ma thag tu ngem par 'gugs// bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes du skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
136b7(rgyud): chog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rdza las phyung ngo // mamaHsa man ta k+Sha la
137a1(rgyud): nyid kyi sre gsung thugs rdo rje las byu / sa can tA kA sa b+ha kaHd+ha bAr+d+han+da/ at+pA de n+da ts+tshe n+doT+Ta phaT parba swA hA/ rim pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid tshe

137a3(rgyud): na du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pacod pag tu med pas dpag tu myeng ba byung ba'i dang zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la sems par zhugs nas// pad pa 'byung ba'i do rje
137a4(rgyud): kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA la bA ka tsaMt+ta
137b1(rgyud): ba/ badz+ra du dang g+ha tan/ tsa la ta ba swad+hA tA lAnA shwA mam+mu drA ta ta DI ta Ni d+ha pa/ TI Sha Na aT+Tad+hA hA sa/ a par me tang la pa rA mA ma/ A d+ya gar+b+hab+hI ta p+pa ta ga k+Sha d+hA Shet+ta/ bu d+ha TaN+ya/ ha thA ba/ 
137b2(rgyud): 2/  na/  ma /  shams sa nan/  khre / dza mas/  latan/ 
137b3(rgyud): ma'amaH/ mar da ma dad/ pA Ta ya/ pA Ta ya/ maT ma Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bu d+ha d+harma sa g+ha a nu d+hA ta ka ma ku ru ha ya kre b+ha la phaT/ badz+ra la phaT/ badz+ra g+ha d+ha ma phaT/ badz+ra na~M d+hA pa
137b4(rgyud): dzu / byangs rgyas su/ 'ju sa ni Sh+TA /  la pa zhes sa/ sa Sh+T+r-iSh+Ti sa t-i snyas so// 'jas lasan d+ha sam+b+ha pa yA/

138b1(rgyud): shing dang mugasuMs ni// des drini mchog ldan rdzu nas// drod sem med pa'i sbyor bayis// rkang pa g.yos pas le ga sanan// do gsum kyi sngags bzlas pas// sngags rnams thams cad

139a6(rgyud): sems dpa' zhabs kyis mnani// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni// do rje lugs kyu zhags pa yis// khacings na bu myo dgug pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ngamachog chen podzo
139a7(rgyud): phyung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje pas phywa

175a3(rgyud): / bgoms// dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can// bla ma la ni slob ma yis// yon rnams rab tu phul nas ni// bla mas de ni byin brlabs te// sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya// rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid

175a5(rgyud): dbang bkrung na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// chags pas 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor// 'dod chags dka' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun
175a6(rgyud): bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid byor// rdo rje dga' ba yang dag ldan// ye shes rgyun gyis dbang skur da// shes rab me nas bdag nyid 'gyur// rig pa'i lha ma nyid ni/ 
175a7(rgyud): dang can gyi tha yos dang // 'gra bar lag pa bzhagan // dmanan gshegs rnams dbang byas pa// thob ma'i mi gsor lag bzhagaH// thas da can tsamapa no// thabs gzhan gyi na
175a8(rgyud): chang mi rgya// de bas rig pa 'a de mchog yin// chas kun gnyis su med dpal// dpa' bo gnyis su btags pa yin// de bas 'khor ba nam bral bar // rtag tu khyod kyis mi bya'o// 'di ni mas rgya
175b1(rgyud): mas cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla ma dpa'o// mongs pa gang zhig 'das gyu na// de mi dngos grub mchag mi 'gyur// thal la chus kyi chos la ni// dris ldan pas snang ba ni// le shes lnga
175b2(rgyud): byed brlaba' bas// bdud ci lnga nas bya bar bshad// sbyar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang // snang bar byed dang gzugs snang ba// sngags kyi ur ba spong bas// bdud rtsi rji'i 'ba' bar bya// rdod+ha

189a6(rgyud): rab tu sgo bar sdang // bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal sbas// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs mi kos// 'khrul dang rnam par 'phrul par 'brel// rtog pa dang bral dri la mad// bdag dang srog dang skyeba'o/ 
189a7(rgyud): bu de bzhin gang bag dang // shed las skyes dang shad bu dang // byed pa po dang tshor babo// shes pa po dang mthong ba'o// sgo 'dogs pa yi rnam par spangs// phung po skye mched rnams la sogs// 
189a8(rgyud): dang ni gzung ba yis// sgrib pa med cing mchog tu phra// nam mkha' ma chog la yang dag gnas// de ltar ma lus stong nyid de// brjod dang brjod bya'i don dang bral// ming tsam gcig pu la ma yang / 
189b1(rgyud): bya chag tu du pal// brjod pa pan kun rab tu// de nang ya yang dgabashad// rang rig shin tu tha ba phyir// dman nyid mabang 'a med// bdag nyid ga ga/ nga / 'a
189b2(rgyud): na// den rang rag par ba shad do// chos kun gnas ni zhi ba'o// nam rtog gis 'khrul rtog ge gang // mi shes pa yi mongs pa rnams// don dam par ni mi shes shing // kun rdeb dag yi mdzod napa
189b3(rgyud): shes mchog ni mi shes shing // rtog ge stong nyid smra bar byed// rnal 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor bas// de ni mchog tu phra par spyod// stong nyid pang dag nam mal// shes dang shes byanasapa
189b4(rgyud): spangs// rtog pa'i rnam pa rnams dang bral// stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lar brjod// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus// 'khor lo drug gi luganang na// rtswa das+t+wa Ta// sbyo nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gan
189b5(rgyud): dben gang ba ma pa dang // ji ltar bag chags chun lazhin// rlung gi la de lo phrag tu bshad/ mtshan byed skad cig pa la 'char// de ltar yang dag 'asgol par// 'don stong nyid po rjos byed pa'o//

190a2(rgyud): sa // rlung zhi nyid reg par// mchog tu byed pa'i byang ba'is// sbyor 'di bang mi shes par// rlung dang sngag sa glen stor gyis// brjod dang rjod kyi'i depems 'das// migags pa 'o//

190b4(rgyud): dbang du byed// de ste tshas kyi 'khor lod// gnas pa'i ni bskul byas nas// de rnams lhan cig cad dag/ zhe sdang gis ni dbang byed // yang dag bskul nas de stong gi/ longs spyod la chog tu

206a2(rgyud): gzhan yang bshadang bya ba// rnal 'byor lus la rim je bzhin// ca rnams cag tu yang dag ni// rgung ba yi rigs kyis rtse// gsal ba du ne ma gsungs pa// dad pa'i bsam pa rnam spangs pa// skye
206a3(rgyud): lapa med don du// gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa// stegs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus// sems can phung du dngos grub don/ 
206a4(rgyud): mul kye bde chen po'i// 'khor lo'i rtsa ni sum cu gnyis// byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab pa'i// rta rnams yang dag rnam pashang bya// de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas// de na mtshan nyid bshad par hA// 
206a5(rgyud): ka tsaT ta pa'i sde tshan// ya ra las/ Sha shas// de dag rim par shes par bya// slar yang de dag bsdus nas de// sde tshan tsham ni gcig tu 'gro// de yang zhi ba'i ye shes mchog/ byang chub sems can
206a6(rgyud): nas 'gro// sun rtog thams cad spangs nas ne// bde ba kun gyi gzhi le mchog/ shes dang shes byirnam par sbyangs// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de las 'khor lo gsum dubye bas// tsani
206a7(rgyud): brgyad kyi dbye ba las// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni// gsum phye bdun cu rtsa gnyis gas pa// de ni stod du rababye ba// so sor 'phros pa'i bdag nyid can// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis// 
206a8(rgyud): mas kyi ni grangs zhes bya// rlung dang mkhris pa bdakan ni// khams gsub rtson dbye ba yis// stong drag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni/ 'khor lo 'khor po'i dbye ba yis// na pa'i bya che 'i
206b1(rgyud): nyis kyi 'dag nyid// gal pa yin la ga/ ma kyigazhamams /  no // da nag shesasung
206b2(rgyud): mas// khro ba 'drenas bya la// de nyid mtshas de yang dag bzhugs// ska pa gro ba rgyal skum pa// nang du sa snang bar de 'gro// rgyas sa
206b3(rgyud): nas 'gro// ga tu da nga 'dzin pa rnams las thob// ba ba / na pa 'i mchog/ de ba 'ams myo rnam lasag pa/  nig gtsam la'am/ yig tsam ni theg cer rim// theg le ba
207a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa las grol ba// byang chub sams dri ba med// rdo rje sems dpa'i de che// gnyis sha'i shes yang byung // dbang bskur shing 'da' dang // bzhi pa'i dga' bgo/ 
207a2(rgyud): 'phang mchog/ de la sogs ming bye brag geg// go 'phang mchog ni gsungs yin// spyod bsdupa'i dbyeg kyis// ring ba rje pa bzhin du// de ltar bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi//  mdon bram
207a3(rgyud): rgyud las shes// zhi ba gnyis me mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtsa bsdus pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// 
207a4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs la sogs skad cig bdag/ yang dag gzhung lugs mtshan nyid ni// de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms
207a5(rgyud): dang mtshan nyid bral// skad cig ma ni bzhi zhes gsungs// rnam par phyenas slar ba shang bya// rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod// de yi skad cig dbye bar bya// ma yeng gan dang / tsum pa nang tsum shan dang
207a6(rgyud): kutsa gra ha dang bu la tra tra han dang da shan dang khang na dang rol dang pu ci tse dang kur bal sogs pa'i kar na dang / rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go// ma yi stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// lus ni bde brgyas bya ra/ 
207a7(rgyud): mgrin pa dag tu gang phye pa// rnam smin zhes bya skad cig go// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni// rdo rje phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can// thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i// rnam pa med pa'i skad cig go// nam
207a8(rgyud): mas byung shu kra 'das// rnam pa dang bral skad cig po// yeng shes bzhi dang stong pa bzhi// skad cig ma ni bzhilas rtogs// rnam 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las skad
207b1(rgyud): cig ma'imatshan nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu ban// de nas gzhan dang ba shang byab// dga' ba ba ni ba mtshan nyid de// thugs 'byung chub dalas bzlog pa yi// dza b+har
207b2(rgyud): ba yi// dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste// mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang // dga' bral zhes pa gsum pa dang // bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par bshad// sprul pa'i 'khor lor dka' nga dang // 
207b3(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// longs spong bral ba'i dga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes dang bde ba che// lugs bzlog rim pa zhes ni gsungs// de rjes lugs 'byung ba shad bya ste// bde me 'khor
207b4(rgyud): de ni dka' bar bshad pa yin// longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang // dpa' bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// nyal ba'i 'khor lor lhan cig skyes// dga' ba nyams su myor bar byed// blta dang
207b5(rgyud): dkug dang de bzhin 'arda/ khal tsum pa byed pa la// dga' ba nyams su myong bar shes// rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma mchog tu// de bzhin sgra la 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje pad mar
207b6(rgyud): barba gnas ni// nyams myongs ni skad cig mchog/ rnam sten zhes bya skad ciganyid// de nyid kyi na rnam par shes// rtsa yi dbus na bags la gnas// gtum mo yang nan matog 'joms// bang 'a chen
207b7(rgyud): ngo'i 'khor lo che// mchog gi tshan zhu bar byed// bral dga' gnas su myong bar// rnam rtog skad cag mtshan nyid do// de la rog cig rang bzhin ni// rtsa ni gcig gi tshun la ten// bde ba chen po go
207b8(rgyud): delhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs// stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de ya te// rnal 'byor pa yis bslab bya ba// nyams chu myong ba
208a1(rgyud): / dga' sa// rnam smin / tsog mtshan nyid do// lang spyod latsha la maud las ni// gleng byed pa'i skad cig pa// nyams kyang bral ba'i dga' // nam 'jams mtshan nyid skad cig go// 'di
208a2(rgyud): po'i 'khor lo che// de nab mtshan nyid skad cigs// lhan cig skyes dpe/  nyams myong ga/ mtshan nyid nga bral skad cig go// rtsa gsum kun gyi nang mkha' che// rnal 'byor mtshogs yang dag gzhug
208a3(rgyud): de las rabasad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid gcig par ro mtshungs pa// rnal 'byor chen pos nyams su myong // slar yang mtshan nyid med par 'gro// rab tu sad pa nyams su myong // stong phrag bcu drug pa
208a4(rgyud): nyid do// bde che go 'phang mi byed pa// gnyis med do/ sems dpa'i gnas// dekur 'di ni dga' dbye ba// gzhan du gsal bar ba gsungs so// rnal 'byor ma yi bka 'drin gyis// zla ba brgyad pa la

208a8(rgyud): ni bkod nas ni// thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// de kho na nyid lus skyo ba// phyogs yul dus dang rnam par grol// steng dang 'og ni rnam par spangs// se
208b1(rgyud): 'o shAr dar bangs// ngag gi dras yangs su spangs// rlud dang mtsha ma dang bral zhing// rtan pa spyod sum rnams dang pral// gnyis pa kun pa rnam par grol// mchog tu rtag c-ing zhi ba'o/ khru / dka'

208b3(rgyud): bal sogs de bzhin bsgrub// bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog/ bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni// phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro// 
208b4(rgyud): bi ke le khong chung ba// thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung // sngags kyi thog la de nyid mchog/ thig le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas// slar yang rlung gi thig le yang // thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro// sngags drang
208b5(rgyud): bdag nyid car// nal 'byor pa yi yang dag shes// gle ba nyi ma me yin// gsum zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyed do// lal nA dang ras rA// ab d+hu TI zhes bya'i ming // sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang // decing

209a3(rgyud): gzhan yang de nyid nyon// de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni// yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs// snying po yang ni bshad par bya// de ni nam skye
209a4(rgyud): / bod nyon cig/ de ni ji ltab ba rten pa shad// oM ne sku yi rdo rje yis// snying po dun yang dag pashed // yaM ge sa dang yi ge su// yi ge ma zhes bya ba gsum// AH chos 'khor padam la// rlung gi 'khor lo la ni khyab/

209a6(rgyud): rnams kun gyi don kyi gnas// sngags rnams thams cad rabs byed// sngags rnams kun gyi phar byed cing // ngag gi 'khor lo rabs dbyed// dngo u la gsum gyi ni gze// 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed/

210a1(rgyud): mig pa dang gzug/ rkang ba nas ni ma go mtha ba// gas ma tshan mdon pasdus pa// han du sems can dang// bshang grogs pa'i dbus na gnas// m-i ga u ni khya byed drug/

210a3(rgyud): me khams kyi ming can no// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjel// slong po gsum du ra'i tu bshad// la gan rdo rjes tham sbyar nas// slar yang thams cad mkhyen la bus// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang // gnas kyi
210a4(rgyud): / dbyeb 'tshal lags na// 'od rnams dbus na bdag po gang // ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// gsang ba'i mchog tu gsungs pa
210a5(rgyud): ben sbas pa'i don ni khyod 'dri ba// rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs pa// rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// thugs kyis bon bdag po ste// kun kye nang na nam rtog med// gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni// sgra
210a6(rgyud): dang de bzhin 'phrog pa dang // rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis me// lus kun la ni khyab par byed// sna yi bu galas ni rgyu// lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo'i lam// gang gi stobs
210a7(rgyud): ldab par byed// gsum pa rnal 'byor pa yis tshogs// ram rtog med par ma b+hang che// rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na// skyes pa de nyid rtags pa'o// rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang // yang dag

210b4(rgyud): yang ji lur thob par byed// de la rigs pa run brjod// thog mar rnal 'byor pa chen po// zla ba rang gis ni zhi gnas bsgom// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyang ba pas// bri ba'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang // dab ma//

210b6(rgyud): 'dama'ang krung ba ltas 'gro// de nas gsang po'i pad ma la so// kha skyong ba ni debs kyang // rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// dri las rnam par bcas nas 'gro// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// klu gsung

211b7(rgyud): // rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes// slong nyid gcig pa rgya la cig pu// rdzas moms kyi dbye ba dang // ring dang zung ba'i rnam pa yis// lha mo de gzugs rdo rjes//  rol gzung ba'i rang bachen
211b8(rgyud): nam khar nga sim ldan grub la rol mo// de bzhin nga gan med da /  bsgo dang spang sogs ma gan/ slab rdo rje shes bya// gsung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog/ rnam par shes pas dpar byed/ dri ba
212a1(rgyud): dri ba rang dang // byung nam mdzod rje 'de shes kyi kha ngab ra dmangag yo gyu chog ldan mo// khan naska sa sogs kyi sel ma ma shes
212a2(rgyud): kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o// mig sogs dbang po la brten pa// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni rim pa rje zhin kun byang chub sems dpa' ba rgyad du shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid
212a3(rgyud): che// mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs// gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par// rang gi dob spro bar byed// sgra yirna pa pa thams cad nas// bye brag sos ci rigs par// sgra yirnam par shes pa ni// phyag na
212a4(rgyud): rjer yang dag bshad// dri yi bye brag la spyod pa// so sor ji ltar rigs par ni// sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// nam mkha' snying po rnam par shes// ro yi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rim bzhin
212a5(rgyud): ste yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shes// reg bya'i bye brag la spyod pa// bye brag mo so'i go rim bzhin// reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid mi// slob pa rnam par sel bar shes
212a6(rgyud): yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rim bzhin// yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// 'jam dpal zhes bya'i ming can no// rgyus pa kun la yang dag sbyor// dbya ba so so'i go rim ba
212a7(rgyud): bag chags yul gyi bdag nyid can// byams pa ru ni rnam par shes// rtsa rnams so so'i mtshan nyid can// bde 'a kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ dngos pa kun gyi rang bzhon can// 'di ni kun tu bzang por
212a8(rgyud): bshad// de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog/ yang dag de nyid blan med// mig sogs dbang po'i rnas shas re// gzug la sogs mthong ba'i rab bzhin no// rjeng dpung babar rgya gong // zlog zhes
212b1(rgyud): ni thams cad kyi// shes pa 'acu yi mtshan nyid ni// khyab pa rnams su yongs su shes// gshin rje mthar byed shes mngar byed// pad ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba// 
212b2(rgyud): dbyig sngon dang ni stobs po che// gnod mdzes gtsug gtor 'khor lo skur// de ltar de rnams gnas dbyebs// ye shes gsum gyis yongs su gsal// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// yang dag de kho na nyid rten/ 
212b3(rgyud): gang gis de nyid chog bzhin// bla ma chu dpalas shes bya// sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa// skye med rad med mi gsal dang // 'byung ba med cing sgri pa med// gnyis
212b4(rgyud): med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang // bdebo chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ sAm dang brtus dang mtha' med dang // mgo med yongs su dbye ba yis// maM dang hUM phaT swA hA'i mtha'// sprul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// 
212b5(rgyud): rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs// brgyas pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no// oM la sogs pa gabs med pa/ mthar med ces bya'i ming can ro// sA yi mthar chen gyi meng ga// mgo mdo nas ni bshad pa yin// thams
212b6(rgyud): cad yod la oM med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni// sngags kyi de nyed blan med// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// 'di'i rgya chen don shes bya// ye shes de nyid rna pa
212b7(rgyud): 'byor mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par grangs// dbang ba thams cad mnyam par sbyar// dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus// ngag gi rnam chog kun spangs pa// snang ba thams cad rnam sungs pa// 
212b8(rgyud): 'ang 'a byin brlab pa'i rang bzhin can// kun la khyab pa rmang du byung // rang reg pa yi rna la 'byor mchog/ skad cig bzhi'i mtshan nyid ni// cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang // rnal 'byor phyis pas me shes shing // 
213a1(rgyud): kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa// don dpar shod tsa ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pas dpe ba dang // sngags kyi de nyid rab tu gas pa// a ni de nyid mtha' theg par// yang dag rim pa rnam par rnam/ 
213a2(rgyud): theg le le ge al bi ma// a ni mtha' yi hatsam la'o// ha yang li ge hUMla'o// yi ge U ni hi la'o// ye ga hi yang al thim// le ge a ni theg la tsam// thig le yang ni sprul bi ma// sma lang sgra ca ran
213a3(rgyud): tsham mchog ni nam mkhal ba'o// de yang 'od gsal ba la bim// 'od gsal go 'phang gsal ba ni// shin du rnam dag chos dbyings te// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ rab tu sad cing rag tu 'char
213a4(rgyud): ngag gi spyod pa rnams dang bral// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gni// 'byung ba ldan yang dag sten// rnam shes brgyad kyi tshogs dben pa// phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni// rlung
213a5(rgyud): cus shes pa bcu bsdus pa// de ltar mtshan nyid kun bsdus pa'o// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pagasub// dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan// skal pa bzang
213a6(rgyud): kun 'phrul ba// rdorji ni rdo rje sems// rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang // he du kaM dang dus 'khor lo// dang po'i sangs rgyas thub pa che// kun du babang po 'jam dpal dang // sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid cam/ 
213a7(rgyud): tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor ni// rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med// ye shes de nyid gsal ba ni// rtog pa med cing gnas pa med// chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do// bskyed pa
213a8(rgyud): gas pa'i mtshan nyid dang // skra yi rtse bo brgyad stong 'dra// shin tu gsal zhing 'od gas lag/ lung dang rigs pa'i dbye ba yis// bla ma 'chang ba las ni shes// dgrar de nyid gsum de mchog/ nyal nas btu
213b1(rgyud): rim pa rtse/ yang bsanas pam chag/ bzhi par mtsham ni skad cig mchog/ nal 'byor chen po tsu dpal rdo blang ba'i mdzin par rtams pa las batshan nyid gsum gyi dmachig gtan la dpa' ba la
213b2(rgyud): sam pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon// sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni// gsang bsnying ka gdong sdang meng // gsub po rgyud las gsal ba ni// 'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor pa yis
213b3(rgyud): ma pa'i ma// shin tu chags pa'i dbang song ba'i// sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis// rtsa yi 'khor los de par byed// bde ba chen po kun nas ste// khams gsum ro gcig gyur na re/ 
213b4(rgyud): gug dbang chog bzhin du bya// byang chub sems ni 'de ba che// lhan skyes skad cig mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje rje mor gzung bar bya// de nyid bde ba chen po ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// kun rtog thams cad rnam par/ 
213b5(rgyud): sa// gsang ba'i sna nar rjes theg le// yang dag gzung ba'i bdag nyid can// chags chan sems ni gcig pu yis// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// pada'adab bcu drug rtsa bzhi pa// rtsa yi 'khor lo
213b6(rgyud): ma bsnyen 'char/ dale le bsnar ne bshang // gsang ba byed pa thams cad ster// steng ka'i bad ma 'dab ma brgyang // de yang lte bsngar ni brjod// zhes sdang nyid kyis mas ne bas pa// gsang sngags 'bar ba'i tshe
213b7(rgyud): zhes sems// yang dag sa par byed pa'i // / ngag ge rtog pa kun spangs pa// rmang byung chen po ye shes mchog/ rtag tu sngags ni nAd 'byung // rnam tog med pa'i ba ba che// bsam gtan la spong bde ba'i mcho/ 
213b8(rgyud): rang thob pasa' rgyal sung b+hang du bar byas nas// na pa'i nyid dru gcig me// zlab nyi ma me dang ga ba/ lan gsub gyi ni dbye mas khyab// gdong gi sngani zhes byar ba yang / rgyu rnams gnas kyi
214a1(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang // de la gnas shes na// cig mi gta mug gis gnon 'is// sam gtan gti mug mchog las rgyal// dpa pa da rnam par spangs/  shAs rdzo
214a2(rgyud): nyidagasal// khon nyid 'dren mchog/ dpe 'od par cig pa tsam// gdong gi sna mang dag brtan// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gte mug rgya mtsholas ni rgyal// de nyid mtshig sems
214a3(rgyud): 9// ming can du ni yang dag ba shad // sangs rgyas kun gyi dmachog ni// ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis ni// gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms pa// kun mkhyen rtogs pa'i
214a4(rgyud): nyid ni// sangs rgyas lnga la rigs gnasam/ sA rtse bug las byung zhing // rlung lnga snying du yang dag rgyu// lus la rtag tu spyod par 'gyur// kun rdzob lnga ni d+hA pa ye// snod las ni rnam par byung // g.yon dang g.yas dang
214a5(rgyud): gnyis ka dang // ngal bar chu dang rnam pa bzhi// g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin to// kha dog dmar po bzang po 'di// pad ma mgon po rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung
214a6(rgyud): 'a'ajag/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zheng chu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba me/ 
214a7(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje mgon po ts+tsha pa'o// khams gsum las ni yang dag byung // rten dang brten par bzung ba ni// rnam par snang mdzadu rang bzhin te// 'chi ba'i mthar mi 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil la
214a8(rgyud): ne pa da de// mnyam par bamag pas da bsgos/ sngags bas pa bkris kyi ni// nyin ma can d+han rlom pa med// de ltar du mi me// bdog lnga par da bar bsgrug/  nye
214b1(rgyud): chog gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'od zer tshogs na dra ma med// de yis zhe sogs bya ba ni// rim kyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpang dadram don pa

214b3(rgyud): sgoms pa na// rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid dam ni// yang na rnal 'byor so sor bsgom// de la the tshom kun gcod gtso// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// yun rings chags chen dbang song bas// srid pa gtu
214b4(rgyud): / stob pa rnams// de dag grol ba'i don du ni// rdzas kyi thig la gsungs pa yin// zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba// mi gang mi srun pa la lus// de rnams byung du gromadon du// sngags kyi thil lar gsungs pa yin/

214b6(rgyud): gsum// khasam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// tshe 'di nyid la grub don du// sgrib pa thams cad dag pa'i phyir// rtse gcig pa yi sems kye ni// ye shes gzhub gnas nyams dga' ba// me tog 'bras bu chu yis brgyan/ 
214b7(rgyud): bos dben pa'i re yi cer// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las snga'i rtse mo gsum gtan la phab pa'i le
214b8(rgyud): shu rtsa bzhi ba'o// / de nas yang dag 'a shad kyi'i nyon// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyod ni// lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog thams cad bdag nyid rgyag tu bzhugs// ches rnams thams cad snang bar byed/ 
215a1(rgyud): nyid stong pa nyid du 'dong // de sa ye shes bdeb che// 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa// gang phyir ab tu tIr zhugs// yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dod// chos rnams rnam rtog snang ba mched// kun rtog
215a2(rgyud): thams cad gcod par byed// nam rtag drung gang bsog// dan stong ba nyid du bshad// gtsob chen po me bsgrad pa 'i// 'jig pa bams ni nyid de// de na rtag tu bzhugs pa'is// srog gi ye shes ming car
215a3(rgyud): med drag po chen po le// zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can// de la ye shes bde ba che// byang chub sems kyis gang ba nyid// de nyid bde chen po 'phang gnas// ye shes yang dag byang chub sems// de la sogs pa ming gi spras
215a4(rgyud): brjod byagacig gru bdeb che// dngos pa gcig dang ldan pa nyid// slong nyid ye shes shes ni brjod// 'de ba can zhes del bshad// bde ba dag pa'i thob ma na nyid// gang de 'de bar gnas pa ni// de na bde ba can zhes 'arjod
215a5(rgyud): dpag med pa'i zhi ba thams na// 'des san gyi zhe sa mchog/ byang chub sems ni me pa ga med// de las byung zhing skye ba'i 'od// de phyir 'od dpas med du shes// 'des kun gyi gan la mchog/ stong nyid do dbyings

215b1(rgyud): sa nyi kyi gnas// wa nag ga sa ma lha rnams kun gyi labrang mchog/ longs srung chos dang sgrub pa dang // 'ad chen ma pon rten 'khor lo yang ni gang ba shang ba// rim pa ji bzhin ma lus pa/

215b4(rgyud): 'di dang ni// chos kyi dbyings dang mig pa rangs dang // rna ba sda nga sred ni// lus kyi rnam shes chos dang na// kun gzhi nyon mangs can gyi med // ded dang rtson 'grus dran te 'dzim// shes ci dbang po'i dbye ba yig/ 
215b5(rgyud): stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni// dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs// shes rab stobs ni bla na med// je bzhin gnas su yang dag shes// lus kyi lha rugasal ba yin// sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yi//

217a8(rgyud): / ma la// pad ma zhags pa rin po che// 'chang dang 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad// pad ma dgar pa 'dra ba'i 'ong // skye 'or rnam par snang mdzad 'chang // rang gi ming dang legags pa med// 'di ga sngags
217b1(rgyud): nyid ga gas// skyug gas /  [рд╜]/  med// gtugan la sa lus ma gnas/ 'dod 'a lngal ngas
217b2(rgyud): bcod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes// rdo rje bud ma'i bde bas thos// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phreng mchog mnyes nas slal yang gso par byed// de ma zhi so nas bya ba rnams/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la po chem med/ 
217b3(rgyud): bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang // sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni// dgos meng mchog tu cung bad ri// bla ma'i lung las yang dag skyes// de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni// 'bad pas dngos grub kyis mnyes bya/ 
217b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo ma na sa skye la ru g+ho nya shu bdun pa'o// de dag gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid mi
217b5(rgyud): rnams kyis ni rnal 'byor mchog/ dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas// mdun gnas pa yi yul rnams las// yid la byed pas der mi 'gro// sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa// de tshe dbang po rab tu gsal/ 
217b6(rgyud): de yis de ni rab tu sang // de rnams rtsa la rim bzhin gnas// rab sad de yis sang byas nas// lha mo rang yang 'khor lo bas// de yis 'char ba'i rim par gsungs// nub pa yang ni bshad par bya// yul
217b7(rgyud): rnams kyang ni dngos bral med// yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas// bag chags kyang ni sad mi sad// rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur zhing // lha rnams yang dag sang bar ni// de yi phyir ni mi 'gyur te// snying gi/ 
217b8(rgyud): dbus nas bde ba'i dngos// sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'od// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang // de ni 'od zer bcu gnyis te// 'od 'phel 'od zer gzi brjid ma// gsal ba 'bar ba 'ong 'bar ma// 
218a1(rgyud): mig la sogs pa la brtan nas// phyi rol gzugs sogs 'dzin pa'o// mun sa la 'od ma snang ba'o// gsal yang sngags pa 'od nyim gsas// phyi ma gzugs sogs rnam par// drug par dag
218a2(rgyud): log tu 'dod// lha mo rnams ni gang 'cha ba nga// ya shes nyi ma 'char ba yin// de yang yang dag rub ba ni// di rang ma chol tu rtsub pa'o// 2 ra chub pa rnams chung ga// go bang mchog tu shes par bya// rdul 'gyur/ 
218a3(rgyud): na po legs par sad// sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brangs nas/ bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyung
218a4(rgyud): da la do phreng mngon par rtogs pa las 'char nga chub pa kyi rje nyi shu brgyad pa'o// de nas gan pas shi kyi chom// gar ba skyes pa'i mtshan nyid de// gang gis yang dag shes pa yi ga
218a5(rgyud): sems dpa' go 'phang mchog/ da ni rtsali 'khor lor// slar yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis// 'khor lo pa ni 'i dbang dag spyor// cha rnams brgya nga gnyis lhag pa// mtshams kyi rtsa yi rib pa yang // rtsa ni bcu drug pa/ 
218a6(rgyud): yang brten// bzhi dang ba ne yis rtag tu kyab// de nam sa dpa' ba'i rim pa'o// chu mas khong du chud ba can// bad ma'i sA la mag bu'i// de nas de mes kyab byas shing // bde ba chen po bon par byed// 'khor mo ma mam
218a7(rgyud): dbye ba yin/ cha bzhi pa ye le ge // shin tu phra ba'i cha dag tu// khyab btang kyi tshul du gnas// rim pa ba ni mi dbye ba las// reb pa bcu dag dbye bas 'thob// 'phreng ba'i bdag nyid zad zung ba'o// rog ces pa
218a8(rgyud): ko bang bathob// rim mes sos nyams myang las// sna tshags chu le spang ba las// rem gyis cha mtsho cha bzhin du// sor ba bzhi yi 'khar la'i dus// dga' ba ba'i ni de la brjod// rnal 'brar brgya kong
218b1(rgyud): las// go 'phang mchog ni thob par gru/ rdzal 'byor chen por rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dpa' bskyedatshan nyid kyi ba 'u sa nyi shu dgu pa ra// / de na sa gzhan yang yang dag nyid// 
218b2(rgyud): rdo rjeldadran pa'i lus kyis ne// rtag tu rtsa rnams kyi rgyun// de 'on nyid ngas bshad bya// stong phrag nye shu na bzhin// tsa ni rtag tu chad byung ba// byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes// bad pa thams cad rab tu 'phel/ [ред]
218b3(rgyud): rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ne// khrag 'bab par ni shes par bya// nyi mang 'o ba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu chad du byung ba \u0f7f// snying phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// rlung chu bar ni shes par bya//  mtsho chen por
218b4(rgyud): da las ni// lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod/ prim dang long ba spyod padag po nyid// grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjod// re re'ang 'khor lo spong spong ngo // them pa longs spyod bdag 'dodapa// 
218b5(rgyud): yang ni bsdus pa lag// gnas rnams kye ni grangs su 'gyur// gla ba yang bsdus nas 'grob na// gsul po brgyad brgyad dbye ba'ang me// nyin dang mtshan ma'i dbye ba dang // thun chod skad cig sbyor ba yil/ cha rnams
218b6(rgyud): nas gong du ni// nang du 'gro bar shes par bya// g.yon pa byang chub zlab 'bab// g.yas pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab// dbus ni drung chub las ni// mi sang byed par shes par bya// la la nA dang ras nA// ang t+yu t+te zhes
218b7(rgyud): meng // de rnams smra ba'i sbyor ba yis// rje'i ma khyes rnan ba rgyang brgyad// gsum pa nyi shun pa zhe' gro// thim dang longs spyad ba dag pa'i phyir// rim gyis grangs ni bdud cu gnyis// srang yang de so sbyong b.las// 
218b8(rgyud): nga sa spong stong dbye ba'ig rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba me/ stong phrag bdun nu rtsa gnyis 'o// sa tso bo gsum pa spang yang ne// sbyor bas mchog pa nyid duragro// dang polab ninapa 'byor pas// phrab de ni shes par
219a1(rgyud): dka'/ 'asam gyis mi khyab mchog tu mi// cig len da bar bla shan pade bkun gyi gzhig sa dag/ srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang // dus kyi cani dam par
219a2(rgyud): bshad// rogacig go 'phang bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor pa yi rgyud las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las ca 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid kyig cha shes bya ba'i 'a
219a3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bya shang gis nyon// mams ched mi ngan nyid/ rnams sdom pa 'chang ba mi/ gang shes shes na arbA ni/ mchog tu ga sa nyams myong ga/ su ma ma shes gas/ 
219a4(rgyud): bar byed// lha yi sngags su yang dag sbyor// lha yi rnal 'byor do na nges pa// de nyid gsum spyor drim me // de gsu cig car bdag nyid sdom// 'jig rten gsum du khyab cing gra/ lus kun la ni yang dag ba rten
219a5(rgyud): be shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// gang phyed dam tshig sems dpa' ba de// rnal 'byor mchol tu shes par bya// khyab pa'i di nyid ra dbyung ba/ mchog rab mchog dang dra ba dang // rang byung me shes mi bdag// byangasems
219a6(rgyud): du rtsa gnyis 'bal// rgya ni thams cad ma chog tu rgyas// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas// ma sun bdag nyid zab ne// de le lus ca gsum ste// gtso bo yang ni yang dag pa shad // zla ba nyim ma nu ba// 'thung ba
219a7(rgyud): khams cad la ni khyab// ji khur shing mazung ba cig/ sa la btad par gnas pa ljong bus sa ga'ad 'phreng na/ sogs papas nikun nas kyag da na skyes nu sazhos ldan pa la// bung gamams la legs chags pa//

219b1(rgyud): dang chogs chad nyid na rab gsus// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun no// gsum phyed mtshig mtshan nyid dang // sto cing pa shar do rje// dpa gsu' de nyid mtshan nyid // chu dang 'bras bu nya 'khor ni// dam
219b2(rgyud): gsum gyi mtshan nyid do// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni// gsum phyi khams ni bsdus pa'o// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzu ras med khams// 'jig rten gsung po'i mtshan nyid do// rtsa ba gsub dang
219b3(rgyud): 'bras bu gcig/ rim pa nin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro// da ni stsal pa gsum dugasil// skugasung thugs kyi rang bzhid kyis// gang tshe de la de sbyor ga/ de ni gzas rin mtshan nyid do//  rung bang skyong ban/ 
219b4(rgyud): da'adzinam tshan nyid do// gang byer srog gi bla bcom// de tse 'che ba'i mtshan nyid sar// tsa le gce ba nang mas ni// gagrub po ngas pa sa na bya// rgyas par rnal 'byor brgyad pas// rnal 'byor ba'is gas

219b6(rgyud): gas ni bcal pa na// ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes// bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yang // rang gi ba gzugs gzhan mthong// don ni shes par mi shes zhipa/ khwa tsam gcig phu rmongs pa'o// ku ka nir
219b7(rgyud): shes bzug nas me// bag chags dang du rnam par sbyor// bag chags kyis de rnam shes bzung // bag chags dang 'dres rim pa las// napag pag chags bsgos pa yis// de rnams rnam tshan dus su ni// mangs kyi

220a1(rgyud): gzhon rlu shid // skad kyig gcigs yang dag 'gro// thog mar 'pheba'i dus bu ne// ta 'i rnam pa lba bub gyur// 'pho ba gnyis par dus su ni/ khwar yang khrag dang 'dres pa ma// stang dang na

222b1(rgyud): /  ga par bya ba dam chags chog/ ma da gang lan dmag pa'am// banapa nyid du sha bar gas/ pa yajas 'gra shas/ khwam chu ba ga 'amangasarnapa nang rgyu

222b3(rgyud): dbang po yang dag sbyor// rtsa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur// shar nas sngon bzhin song nas ni// skyed pa'i rim pa bla na med// dam chog skye 'di yi phyar// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim// de las skye dang rga dang
222b4(rgyud): dag/ 'chi zhing slar yang ldag par 'gyur// yul rnams dngos po meng pa yis// spangs pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir// de nyid 'di la spyod pa'i phyir// dngos su yul rnams dngos med phyir// dbang po rnams ni skye ba ming//

222b7(rgyud): dri phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u sa sum cus bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// spyod drug go 'phang mtshan nyid ni// ji ma dzis pa bzhin sbyor// 
222b8(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yan lag ten// rnam pa drug pa de las phyed// de bzhin brgyad brgyad de las lhag/ brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni// de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal// zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu// stong de sa
223a1(rgyud): gal bar la gnas// phyad pa ma yan lu snga'adra' tha cang dpal mad ta de/ zla dra
223a2(rgyud): yul min// me yi 'khor lo stong nying khyab// dbas na'i ga la lta bu 'i thur dur du'ab 'dod / pa byung kun la khyab pa dang // bad ba yang dag 'phel bar byed// dbyang pa dang gsal byad rnam par spangs la
223a3(rgyud): dgasupa nim lus pa// gcig tu byas na skyed par byed// me shig nA ga 'phang can// dam pa thams cad rnam par smras// sbrul gyi lce lta dag po ba dang tshangs pa la sags phams dang // 'jigs pa ma yin na
223a4(rgyud): / yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin// 'byung po'i tshogs nin pa par drangs// khrangs bral bad ma daskye ba med// ste bsgru pa'i 'khor mar gnas/ chos kyi 'khor ro'i dbus gnas pa// rnaHma drim dang bral ba/ 
223a5(rgyud): gas pa med pa dang / byarab byed dang gnas med pa/ dpe med garas pa med pa dang / srog da rtsol 'arnam par sbas// khwa ying bang phyag la shes mchog/ des phralang drang par dgal/ longs spong 'khor lo yo
223a6(rgyud): dag 'pher ba sa dpa 'i rnam pa mchog/ mchog tu khong du chu gur ga/ rnam pa kun gyis yang dag zhugs/ rten ci 'brel 'thung ba zhin gyi// yang gi mi'i smos pa sa ma/  ga
223a7(rgyud): klan len na gnas// thog ma ma ma lhag par gnas// mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs// ne ba mi 'jigs brjod du med// rang bzhin nyams myong nga ngo 'o// bde ched po'i
223a8(rgyud): kha sa/ skam 'dud pa las ni thog// de ltar me shes bye zag // rang gi der ma shes dubya// steng nga 'og tu yangasas spyo thal 'khyor pas chi sa grags/ la 'byong chen po'i nyung
223b1(rgyud): rtogs pa las ma bar so drug sgom pa sa su brgyad pa la// de nas bcom lda rdzas gsungs// dus kyimatshan cad sdom pa ma// rnam 'byar gang gis rnam par shes// grangs kyi la 'byer blan med// u
223b2(rgyud): tshod zhes ni bshad// bsam dang bsam bral rang dngos ni// dus bzang dang ni dus ngan dang // rnam pa gnyis la yang dag gnas// sde yi bu galas byung nas// byi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char// nang du sdud par dus babang
223b3(rgyud): gsungs// 'byung ba yang ni dus ngan 'dod// dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog/ dus pa'ang mchog sder rang nyid ni// rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang // gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po// cod pa'i dus ni ngan ba ste// de

223b5(rgyud): /  ni yongs su grags// ldang ba yang ni dus ngan te// de ltar dus kyi mtshan nyid do// dus ni khams rnams thams cad de// mnyam pa ro gcig go 'phang mchog/ ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te// dus ni gcig ni brjod
223b6(rgyud): pa yin// dngos dang dngos med spros bral ba// mni pa'i skad cig mtshan nyid de/ brjod ba rjod byed las grol ba// dus gcig ces ni brjod pa yin// chags dang chags bral des grol ba// bde ba chen po go 'phang

224a1(rgyud): zu mchog tu 'gro// phyag tu chen po yang dag bstan// gas dun na nabasha// rnam gyi gyis 'as ma shes shing // ban pa'adab sas byab nga // zhal na btu dpa'adas pa rnams

245b4(rgyud): 'od// zlus zhing 'jam la mdzes pa dang // sper pa ring ba de shes bya// 'od dpag med kyi rigs mas byung // de las pad ma'i phyag rgya bstan// durus sbal phyag rgyal na yin ro// chu badra meg dkun ring ba dang // 'dog ser
245b5(rgyud): yid 'phrog pa// 'di yi dpral bar ri mo gas ma// ji srid skra mtshams par du gnas// ga bul du 'che ba rnams kyi ni// gta mo dag la ni rab tu nyan// 'di 'dra'i nyan pa ma mthong nas// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya
245b6(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa dang // de ni gar byed rab tu stan// g.yon pa yongs su bskor nas ni// rgyas rgya'i lan ne bstan par bya// sna tshogs pa li gos la dkar// rin chen 'byung ldan rigs pas byung // kha ngo/

246a1(rgyud): bdu ge ga rgyal na yin no// rnam par sdang mdzad migs pas byung // mig pa rje ma sdug pa dang // phan la gsun sa pa grus kyas// spobasang mi ma da/ log pa ni

246a7(rgyud): brjod// tuM shI raM ni khu tshur shes// me ka ma traM gcig tu brjod// tsan dram ni khrag tu bshad // gnaM bshad par yongs su grags// g+ha naM sha chen du ni bshad// ni dzaM d+ha dur ru brjod// b+hA sa naM ni chu ru bshad// bak+She na
246a8(rgyud): rab tu bshad// u baM bzang po zhes ni brjod// ho na tshim pa zhes ni grags// man ltogs pa ru de brjod// g+hi haM lam du bshad pa dang // byor pani pha rol dpung // ka ma la ni kyis shig brjod// nag ra~M de bdang

246b3(rgyud): ma ru bshad// sa mun tra ni rgyal por brjod// mi re ma li ring du brjod// b+ha ra ha dang zhes ni bshad// bi m+b+ha phag ces brjod par bya// pa laM sha na nya zhes brjod// di na mar skyes su ni bshad// naka r+b+ha sbyin bsreg
