251a1(rgyud): // nas nAg pad+mar bsgrub par bya// bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// na maHsa mnatashA la nA ka tsi d+ha badz+rA NAM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha la/ ma hA Ni ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ a se mus la pa
251a2(rgyud): shu bA sha ha stA ya/ oM a mr-i ti kuNi ra la// ga ge bA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha bad+d+ha/ stan han/ da had ha/ gardza ga dza/ snron+da Ta/ bi swa N+Da la bi s+phoT ya/ sarba bikrAn bi nA ya kAn/ 
251a3(rgyud): ma hA ga Na pi ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT swA hA// sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can ni// bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yin// zhi ba'i las ni bshad bya ba// gzhan gyis mi thub ming dang ma/ 
251a4(rgyud): khro bo gsum pa bzlas nas mi/ ma dang sprul sogs zhi bar byed// lag pa gnyis la nyi ma gnyis// de la hUM gnyis bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis// thabs la
251a5(rgyud): la bzhugs nas ni// bsgrub bya'i snying la de gnyis kyis// 'byung po bsreg par bsam par bya// me dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i// 'di yi sngags ni bshad par bya// na maHsa man ta kA ya
251a6(rgyud): wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM oM pa rA dwai ti rI dza~M hU~M phaT/ che ge mo byung ba'i gdon las grol bar mdzod cig/ d+hIHdugasel ba'i sngags kyis me// bzhi pa bshad kyis de nyon cig/ khro bo tam zin pas
251a7(rgyud): pas ni// yang dag me mtshungs pa yi mchog/ bai sgrub bya sems dpa' sum brtseg bsgom// snying gar zla gnas ye shes sems// de yi 'od zer gyis rab gang // bsgrur bya'i lus la mchog tu bsam// 
251a8(rgyud): rab tu 'bar ba de yis drug/ de nas lag g.yas bsam pa re// rla ba haM gis rnam par brgyan// kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod// de ltar sgrub pa po la bya// hUM b+he I d+ha dgod// las rnams kud de
251b1(rgyud): 'grub par byed//  bya'am nas brtsams te// rkang pa'i mtha' le bar du bsgom// mu rkun rgud mi 'chang pa ni// dug ni 'og/ btang rim pa'i sa// 'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas bya ste// rta mgrin
251b2(rgyud): dun mngon par brjod// na mangs man ta kA ya wA kats+tshi d+ha badz+ra NAM/ i hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la bai rul/ sa tsag pag+hA ta ka ta ka dz+wa la ta bI s+phu la ga/ any+dza sa hAta/ ka saras payang dang ba
251b3(rgyud): g+hA ta na/ tsata ba su d+ha ta la ne shA sa mA ru ta id k+Shi ba tad+ha de Ne d+ha ra/ Shi Sha ni aT+Ta hA sa a pa ra ma ta wa la bar kra ma A d+ya ga Na b+he te/ bud d+ha budad+ha/ sa \u0f88\u0f90gas pa/ da myed da/ a be sha ya/ 8
251b4(rgyud): tu ya pra te ha to b+ha ba/ badz+rad TI ki tsi rA la si a du/ gra hi daM Shas rbaH/ dun dun/ mA ba mAH/ marda ma bung d+ha d+harma dang / thad da dam sa pA a nu dz+nyAn kar ma ru s+yAH// cheg po 'dug
251b5(rgyud): sogs pa spel bar mdzod cig hUM zhes bya ba dang sngags stsol lo// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rdzas 'brangs te// lhag ma rgyas par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rdzogs
251b6(rgyud): pa las khro bo'i bzlas pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub brgyad kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ 
251b7(rgyud): ngas rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ dngos grub la sogs mtshan nyid ri// sa stong phyag na rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang // byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang // yi ge gisum dang
251b8(rgyud): rnam par spel// mig dang na pa yed dang lus// rtsa yi 'khor lo byin gyis brlag// mtsha lus mo de dang 'dra// mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed// 'i'i yi ni dbang bas bas// blo ldan po
252a1(rgyud): 'ang bya'o// com ldan du bson ga zhags pan kyi// bdag pa lan 'di ska bus// bcom ldan ba zhi ga shegs ca na kyi bral thung yag/ tso 'di ni ston sang
252a2(rgyud): par// ji ltar sprob mda' ma gyur// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs yid bde la sogs// ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir// de ni yang dag bshad du gsol// de bzhin
252a3(rgyud): gshegs kun bdag pa ni// de rnams zhu bar mkhyen nas su// ye shes sgron mang rnga grags// ting 'dzim ni sdang rigs 'gyung // gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni// sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan
252a4(rgyud): bas// de nas yang dag byung ba ni// badz+ra rAg ces bya ba'i sngags// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur// mi bskyod rgya chen thabs
252a5(rgyud): kyis sbyor// zhal gsum gnag dang dkar dang dmar// bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin// rdo rje gsum 'der de bzhin gshegs// bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs
252a6(rgyud): bdag po// dam tshig 'byung rdo rje zhes byar// ting nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod// de nas dzI na dIka ces pa'i// snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung // de nas gsungs pa
252a7(rgyud): tsam gyis kyang // gti tsug rigs byung la bsdus pa// reg bcas sdus pa sgru /  'a rdza yang da de bzhin gshegs// dka dang gnag dang dmang bcas pA'o// zhal gyis mdun
252a8(rgyud): du bzhugs par gyur// de nas rin chen byung ba yi// dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs rnam bde gshegs kur// bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir// yid bzhin no
252b1(rgyud): can rigs// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag pa 'di// de nas rat+na d+h+r-i ka tsas bya// snying po dpal ldan de tshe thung // danas byung ba tsam gyis ni// rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// 
252b2(rgyud): dang dgang dang gnag pa yi// zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi// lho phyogs logs su bzhugs par gyur// de yang byang du gzigs gyur te// mnyam nyid ye shes
252b3(rgyud): ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dag po de// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag/ 'dod chags chen po'i las byung ba// rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// 'dod chags
252b4(rgyud): A ro ldeg ces bya snying po// rdo rje gsum la de nab phyung // de nas byung ba tsam gyis ni// de 'og bcom ldan gtso bo ni// rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// 'jig rten/ 
252b5(rgyud): dbang po 'od dang mtshungs// dmar dang dkar dang gnag pa'i zhal// dpal ldan rigs chen po yi bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi// nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// de napa
252b6(rgyud): bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod dam chog ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag kyang // rdo rje de la sgoms bzhugs nas// sring po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o// dam tshig rnams ni dkrug pa'i rim/ 
252b7(rgyud): d+h+r-ig ces pa// rdo rje gsum zhes bya las byung // de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni// don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi// de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das// sku gsung thugs kyi
252b8(rgyud): sa pa'i skyes bur gyur// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi// byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// zhe sdang gnyisas/ rigs dang ni// de bzhin
253a1(rgyud): mthong bya lu ma// snang ba ma tshan 'chadu gyur// nam snang ba mchad pa'o// mamams na snang ba thob pa'o// ra sna mamamatshams da
253a2(rgyud): nyin ma min// yun tog rlu ni spong bar byed// de ri ga dacig mngon kyang chub// mtshan thaMd skad cig mang ni brjod// kham rgya rang bag mir 'byung ba'am// dngas ma 'drang babang gas
253a3(rgyud): 2ma/ mtha' min 'byung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung ba'am// do na thams cad spong ba'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// gang du 'gro ba dang ni'ong med cing // zad med 'phel med dngos dang po med min// ngas
253a4(rgyud): gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min// gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba men// gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin// bsod/ 
253a5(rgyud): nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// skad ceg gcig la mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog/ rdo rje rtse mo byang sems ni/ 
253a6(rgyud): dzed pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid// de yis de nyid kyang sems ni// rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas// rigs pas steng du byed pa ni// rgas pa med par the tshom med// hUM hoHrim bzhin shes pa ni// 'dzinapa
253a7(rgyud): steng du rnam par sA Ta// sa ba shad pa yi bdud rtsi la// 'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod// 'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed// lcags kyi gser 'gyur byas nas ni// dza rje phyag rgya dngos grub che// bang du jug
253a8(rgyud): gyur// bsed pa'i rim pa'i sor ba dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang // gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur ba// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ ga pa
253b1(rgyud): na// gang du dngos pa gcag 'gyur ba// byang du 'jug ces dal bshad// kun rdzob dang nadon dang dag/ rtag pa gnyis dang rnam par bral// gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par
253b2(rgyud): sha// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni// rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod// sems la dmigs pa 'thob par 'gyur// bdag la byin pa dbas rim pas kyang // dngos
253b3(rgyud): thub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur// snong ba la sogs dbye ba shes// mngon par byang chub rim pa thob// brang 'jug rim pa la gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'grupa/ 
253b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis the tshom med// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher// bung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog med par zhugs nas ni// thob pa 'di la the ri ma med// lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur/ 
253b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis yang dag brtan// zur bzhi pa la mdun rgyab dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so// steng 'og blo yi dbye ba yis// sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// sna rtse pa ni yi dbyibs kyis mi// nga
253b6(rgyud): zhi ni brjod par bya// dra ba chubar yang dag pashad// rgyas par gyur pa baphyed// ma ni zlab phyed pa dang // bum pa 'o bar yang dag shes nga brla dpung la ga nga ni// ka ba brgyad du yang dag pa shang // mig gi rnam shes
253b7(rgyud): me long sogs// sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang // sna mi rnam shes me tog phreng // rin chen pha gu l+le rnam shes// lus kyi rnam shes rapa 'phan dang // yid kyi rnam shes ri dgas so// mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang / na/ 
253b8(rgyud): kun nas rdo rnams// sA ni bdan du ni bshad// spyi ni dril bu ru ni gsungs// rdal ba la sogs rnam dag pa// lus kyi tshogs shes bya bar bshad// yid ni dbus kyi pad mar gsungs// nam tog/ rlung ri yang dag btem la
254a1(rgyud): shes ldan ma dag pa// bai zla lngar na yang dag brjod// phung po ldaninam dag la// rnam dag bdog ldan dbye// de dag gzhal yas khang du bsgom// dang basbyar bar shes pa dbya// mngon par byang chu
254a2(rgyud): rnam pa lnga// rigs kyi dbye ba ra ngango'o// de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjod// dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid de// gzugs kyi phung po mdor bsdus na// gzugs
254a3(rgyud): po rnams dang ni// mig gi rnam shes sa snying po// phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rje ru bshad// byams pa rtsa rgyus dbus na bzhugs// de bzhin tho ba'i rgyal po gnyis// shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni// me long
254a4(rgyud): shes su ni bshad// rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs dang sgo// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod// tshor ba chu 'i khams dang ni// phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang // rnab phyag na rdo rje ru bshad
254a5(rgyud): rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid// de yi rdo rje phyi rom 'gyur// sA yi ye shes mkha' snying pa/  khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes// mnyam nyid rin chen 'byung ba dang // dngos dang dngos med sogs 'du shes// 
254a6(rgyud): da mtshan nyid can// 'du shes phung po ma khams dang // phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang // lce yin pa shes 'jig rten mgon/ de shen tshwa ba'i rgyal pogashes// don mo sor nog/ ye shes// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las thug
254a7(rgyud): dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyis// bag chags 'du byed mtshan nyid ni// 'du shes phung po drung gi khams// phye rob ro la rdo rje dang // lus kyi rnam shes sleb rnam sel// kun pa'ang tshigs kyi mtshams dbus bcug
254a8(rgyud): den lo ba'i rgyal po gnyis// byabanan tan grub ye shes// don yod grub pa'i rigs las srung // dgro po kun gyi rang bzhin ni// ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes padod// rnam par shes pa rnam ga pa'i khams/ yid cenas
254b1(rgyud): 'a do // da da gra rgyal pa gnyis// ga tu rnam dag 'byangs ma bsrung pa rigs las la// mdzon pa byang chub rnamapa la// zha pa las khang na 'a dag 'bugs// dgang khams kyang bya
254b2(rgyud): bzhi pa shang /  gyis mtsham sa sring / rnam snang bdag tad po/ u gan da shA pa'i steg/ med mo myo khams su shes// rid can 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi mas kyi ted du shes pa kya// 
254b3(rgyud): dang paklas pa shadang snyid// ma la khams zhes bya bar brjod// 'od dpag med kyi rang banan dang / rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya/ rgyas pa ga dang rtsibs logs nyid // rlung ni don yod su la'o// mthus dang gres pa
254b4(rgyud): // de ni nam mkha'i khams su grags/ mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin dang // snying ni rnam shes lnga zhes bya// de re la'ang so sor ma/ rnam pa lngani slob shes// de bzhin gamigs pa'i phung po lnga// rang gi bdag nyid
254b5(rgyud): da/ shaHb+h+yas pa dan kham chad// glad pa dang ni glang rgyam dang / rus parkang dang ske ba dang / mkhal ma snyed dang lto ba dang // slob mcho sa gcan dang mi kha shang ba po ba longag dang // nag nga chum gnag dang de/ 
254b6(rgyud): wag dang mchis pa bdakan dang // ngangab snabs sgra dag spya nga// na mo dang grags pa dang // lag pa rkang mig yan lags gas// mchogs ma dpung pa zhes ni ba 'o// de dag rim par zhes par bya// kAzhal ya
254b7(rgyud): kya ni rnam dag pas// de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni// mdor ba sdus na ni bshad pa bya// pA l+le ni mgo bor shes// spyi gsun dz+wa lan tar dang // rnab g.yas par e n+yan dang // skye bo'i rgyab ni a rbur// 
254b8(rgyud): kodabu che bag por// ra mi shwa ri sl-id ma'i dbus// mig gnyis de li ko Ta dang // mal le ni dpung ba'i/ rang can kyang gnyis// ku lu rum gnyis su grags/ 
255a1(rgyud): / kos pa di lte bar shes// tris su ni sA yi rtsa// Shabi pa dpag pid+ya ka/ mthun pa par ba kar ni brjod// snying na kany+dzar shes par bya// he ma la ya mams
255a2(rgyud): mtshan ma gr-i ha de ba dang // pre ta bu ri bshad pa'i lam// brla gnyis su war+t+ta dA pa// sau rat+na ni byin pa gnyis// rkang pa'i bo la ni san d+ha'i yul// sor mo rnams la nA ga ra// mtheb mo
255a3(rgyud): nim rung shes// ku lu ta ni rkang pa'i mthil// de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang // sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid// debyed pa ldan shes par bya// tham dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// 'jug pa la sogs
255a4(rgyud): / brag gis// rims kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyer// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad ba// rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ sreg gi rlung ni snying gar gnas// mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes// 'doms
255a5(rgyud): gnas pa'i thung sel ni// rin chen 'byung ldan bye brag skyes// snod du rgyu ba lkog mthar gnas// 'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no// me dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas// don yod grub pa'i
255a6(rgyud): ro// khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas// rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs// dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni// srog dang rtsol ba rgyun 'di dang // dus kun du ni rgyu ba ni// srog ces bya
255a7(rgyud): len par bshad// srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang // de bzhin du ni khu ba sogs// 'og 'dren 'de ni thur sel rlung // rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya// dgod dang za dang ldag pa dang // kun tu 'thung
255a8(rgyud): ra'ajib pa dang // gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas pa// mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod// gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang // b.ra' dang myang ba la sogs pa// shes nas lhan cig 'byor pa dag/ 
255b1(rgyud): las su shes par bya// khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin 'gro dang ldog bsags// chag kun tu ni khyab pa'i phyir// bya khyed ces ni bya bar bshad// rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ 
255b2(rgyud): den sa de yi 'jigs par brjod// snga ma bzhin du btang chu sogs// phan tshun du ni gnod par byed// gtan na gzhan la 'che ba na// stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gcig ni gcig la thim par 'gro
255b3(rgyud): ji ltar rlung gzas bzung la// rlung rnams rim gyes nyams 'gyur ba// snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong // rang gi bdag nyid la thim par// btang rung slar yang 'gro bar byed// ji ltar mes bsregs dngos med dang / 
255b4(rgyud): / tumed par ni thim par 'gro// slar yang srog gi rlung shar ba// las kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa// de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang // slar lang 'jig rten gsum du gnas// de las las dang de las skyes// de las chags
255b5(rgyud): migs pag chags dang // de las srang yang 'tsho dang ste// de ltar la kho lo bskong ba la// sngon bzhin rdo rje ba rnam la sogs// rim gyis de yi kyibar 'gyur// de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// de nyid mig ldan
255b6(rgyud): thur ma yis// thams cad 'khrul ba'i long ba 'asal// yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong // de nas yang 'di phyag byas te// mchi bcas mig gis bcom ldan pal// lan gsum du ni skor byas nas// rdo rje 'chang la
255b7(rgyud): yang dag bstod// e ma'o dun 'gro kun dbang phyu// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa brnyes// e ma 'odamachog de nyid gsum// mchog tu chad byung ston par mdzad// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol/ 
255b8(rgyud): zos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// 'dod 'dams kyis mgos pa// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phung po rnams dang 'ams rnams dang // skye mched rnams la mi rten cing // sred dang mya ngan 'das las
256a1(rgyud): grol// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar nam mkha' gnas med kyi kra/ spros pa med chem yos pa med// mkha nang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag
256a2(rgyud): 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi su// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum 'di rnam par g.yos// bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni// 'jig rten gsum
256a3(rgyud): nas lha las rgyal// khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gtso bo yis// 'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur// sa yi chen gang na 'di// rdo rje phreng ba mngon brjod pa'i// rnal 'byor
256a4(rgyud): chen po'i dam tshig brgyad// dus kun du ni spyod 'gyur zhing // rgyud du de nyid dang nyid kyis// khro bo bcu yis de las ni// rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la// bsrung ba'i don du yul 'khor rang // rang rang
256a5(rgyud): / phre ba'i sngags kyis ni// de rnams la ni gtor ma dbul// sems cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun du// nyin dang mtshan du
256a6(rgyud): bzhugs par 'gyur/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
256a7(rgyud): dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// khrugs dmas 'i snyed pa ma cheng snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug laka
256a8(rgyud): da ra thes khan po nga du the na dang / ska sgyur gyi'o rlob canas pad kyi klu bcan po sas dge slo shis yod kyig pa ldanapa pagyur ce bus te gtan labab pa/ stag cun 'bum dang bskrun pa'i bu dag phrul// 
256b1(rgyud): bar dad du/ na d+he b+ha ka raNanA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ dgos pa lung bkran nas bya ba chud/ bcong ldan 'das dpas dang sems dpa' sa phyag la// de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos// shin tu
256b2(rgyud): gsal ba'i dus gcig na// gsang gtsad rje bcom ldan 'das// dam chig mchog ni rdo rje gsum// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// yon tan thun tshogs pas ma mi khyab// yod bdag nyi ga las 'dam ga
256b3(rgyud): nas med pa la gnas shes bya// nam mkha' rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir// kun mkhyen ye shes rnam bsgom pa// 'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la// thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yin// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang // rnam
256b4(rgyud): par shes dang ming dang gzugs// skye mched drug dang reg pa dang // tshong ba dang ni sred pa dang // nyer len srid pa skye ba dang // rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin// nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang // nga bo snyam rgyal mngon
256b5(rgyud): zhan yang nga rgyal las nga rgyal// cung radang rgyal log par bcas// 'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de rnams brjod mi lang ba grangs// brjod kyis
256b6(rgyud): / lang nyid du gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
256b7(rgyud): kyang // nam ma pa'i khams kun gang bar snang // de nas dpal ldan nam snang mdzad// sku gzung thugs kyi rdo rnga can// 'khor gyi dkyil 'kho la gzigs nas// de nyid gsum skyes srung mdzad do// 
256b8(rgyud): ngas la khyab 'jug lha chen dang // 'dod dang rig byed de bzhin zung // tshangs lha de bzhin gra ba ste// phung po la sogs grabs dang mnyam// sgra sgrogs de bzhin dga' byed dang // skyeb song skem byed thun
257a1(rgyud): // dang // mA yon pa ni dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs kun gcig ga nyid// nga rje byung ba gsal pa li// gsang sngags gsungs pa ba nyid// thu chen byang chub sa ma
257a2(rgyud): du/ mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad// rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i/ phra morna la 'byor gsum pa yin// dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa// bsrung ba'i
257a3(rgyud): bslab bzhi rnam bzhi dang // spyod pa 'der ni lnga pa ste// drug pa rang pangs rgyas nyid kyi// ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro// bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad// gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bo sa mang
257a4(rgyud): phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgya dpe bstan// dam tshika bzhi po dgu pa yin// rnam pa bcur bye yang dag tog/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin// bcu gcig yid du byung ba na// phyag rgya gcig
257a5(rgyud): par bshad dkyil 'khor// bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid smra// nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad// de bzhin rig pa spyod thub pa// mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa// bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang / 
257a6(rgyud): / phre sngags bla ma ston par mdzad// phyogs dang bya ba seng nyid gyur pa// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bla med pa'o// swa grogs dum dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dral tshon ldan pa'o// slob ma dbang
257a7(rgyud): bskur te bla dag/ chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur ba// sna tshogs chog gi don gyi bad// sna tshogs ming can ming gcig pu// de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// so sor sdud pa rab tu bstan// gcigs
257a8(rgyud): / ma las grol ba// yang dag mthong nas yongs su bsgom// yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag/ rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya// de nis ma skyes sbyor ba la// thub pa rnam par sA
257b1(rgyud): na 'grel pan pa/ bzugasas pa'// ting 'dzin 'ag ston par mdzad// 'dod pa'i yan lag 'artse ba'i tsho gas// gnyis pasams / 'ad dachags cha tshul zhes bya ba'i// ting
257b2(rgyud): dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi// rang gi sku la zhugs par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' sems su dadal ni stor bar gyur// de nas de bzhin ga
257b3(rgyud): dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de bzhin gshegs bdag mnyes bya'i phyir// de rnams zhugs nas gur gyur pa// srog dang byed rgyo mthar sel dang // mnyam gnas khyab byed ces bya
257b4(rgyud): klu dang ru sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba// 'di dag tu ni nyid su mdzad// bud med gzugs su slar sprul te// rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du// de sru'i sku las byung bar gyur// de nyid
257b5(rgyud): bram ni mnyam stor las// rang gi gsang sngags dag bsgom// yan lag kun las ngas grol zhing // shin tu phra ba nyid du phyir// dbu dgos ming las byung ba ni// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste// 
257b6(rgyud): dngo bo nyid yin pos// rang nyid kyang ni mi shes so// 'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la// de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs// bcom ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa// chos kyi mchog ni bstan du
257b7(rgyud): gsol// khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams// dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pas// yid bzhin rdor bu lta bur mdzes// gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na// 'jig
257b8(rgyud): med cing // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang // 'jig rten shin tu 'das de bzhin// gang 'di ni bo nyid kyis chos// ni gnas shin tu mngon 'gro ba// byang chub sems dpas thos na yang // 
258a1(rgyud): de bzhimanyed ba pa byung // de nas sa snang la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' thams dpa' che// mgon po rnam sna can pa la// dang ga gis ni zhus kyang pa// ga
258a2(rgyud): shes bla med kyang chub ni// ma 'ong ba skye bos thos 'gyur ba'i// gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba// rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du bsol// lan gnyis gsol kyang mgon po ni// migs
258a3(rgyud): bar ni rnam par bzhugs// rdo rje can gyi de shes nas// de nas slar yang bus par gyur// gang 'di zhi kan pa la sogs pa'i// rnal 'byor rab mo bla med pa// de ni 'di ltar sngags pas sngags/ 
258a4(rgyud): 'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bas gsungs// bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor 'ba' shig pa nyid dang // lung ni yang dag gang yin pa// de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs// zhus pa'i don ni
258a5(rgyud): mkhyen nas ni// bcom ldan du rje can gyis gsungs// gsang sngags tshul ni mchog gyur 'di// gsang ga khyod la bstan par bya// 'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che// gsang sngags kun
258a6(rgyud): sngags ster ba'o// der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cig/ sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag/ lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni// gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar// rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa// dkyil
258a7(rgyud): 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin// bcu bdun zhes no bshad pa 'di'i// gsungs pa'i don dem shes pas// sngags pas lasang sngags sbyor po dag/ de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur// don 'di rtogs
258a8(rgyud): par gyur nas mi// sna tshogs don ni ston padang// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// gsang sngags rig pa mchog rnam pa byed// bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar// yi ke ya ne steng du gnas// 
258b1(rgyud): ma nas bya gnas bya la// sngags pas sems cad dan rnamapa bya// yag a gnyam par / las skyem nyid du 'gyur// steng 'ag phyags pa rnam pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ 
258b2(rgyud): gang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni// bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos nyid// bdag gis zhes rtog mde 'gyur ba// thogs med rtog pa 'di gnas so// ston pa po dang bstan dang gnag/ pra ba tsam ci
258b3(rgyud): med// kun rdzob dus gsum sor gcig pa// sngags pa rnams kyi zos de 'gyur// shin tu grang za med bskal pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa// sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig sa/ 
258b4(rgyud): da cig la rdzogs byang chub thob// kun mkhyen kun rig zugs chud pa// gsang sngags ston pa'i chos can de// de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes// mi rtaka nam
258b5(rgyud): mkha' ji bzhin te// gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra// sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni// 'dod pa kun la nye bar sbyor// thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yi/ 
258b6(rgyud): bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas// kun rika de ni de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyar gyur pa// de ni kwa yi rdo rjer gyur// 'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'thung // mi byed kasung gi de
258b7(rgyud): ra// nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang // bsam mi khyab par spro bdag nyid// de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la// thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag byung // sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ 
258b8(rgyud): mkha' yongs su brtags pa ste// de yang de ru kun gnas pas// bud med chos gcig pu yi gzugs// sangs rgyas kun gyis kang brten pa// sa gyur de ni bcu gsum pa// de na
259a1(rgyud): zang ma sa ba shad do// debs chos de b+ha ga yin// bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad// dam tshig chen po gcig tu gyur// dngos med chos nyid gcig pu dra// 'dun da
259a2(rgyud): mnyam par 'gyur// dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni// ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang // sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' nyed dag dang // gzugs dang sra dang dri dang ro// reg dang de bzhin
259a3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings// 'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can cu// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// de ltar brjod mi lang zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur rnams// sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi/ 
259a4(rgyud): la phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs// me bskyod rnam snang mngadzad rin chen// dpag med tshe dang gdon cig/ 
259a5(rgyud): de dag nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i// rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs// dper na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i khams ni yongs
259a6(rgyud): khebs pa// de rnams deng ni yang dag snang // de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu sbyar// gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro dang // sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyi// byang chub
259a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems chen dang // don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'di rnams sku yi yan lag grags// zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las byung // ma skyes pa tig pu gzigs pa
259a8(rgyud): de// 'dod mags chen po'i tshul du gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs// de ni nyid kyi skul bcug/ 
259b1(rgyud): gshegs pa gud// de de dam par snang yang \u0f7f// 'di nad gnyis par bya 'phyar// rked gra zung ma nyud ma dzang // de nas mgan ba bas ma lus las// bud med gzugasas
259b2(rgyud): // de na sangs kyis spyan 'dra dang // sel kI 'dri myong ba dang // gos dgang po 'dra'i gzugs dang me// spris ma'i gzugs su yang dag gnas// ska le bo'i gzugs can dang // dris
259b3(rgyud): thugs dang ni// de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs// reg ge ngo bo'i gzugs can dang // la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams bzhugs// de nas tshul gsum don
259b4(rgyud): cig dang // mi kha spyod pa yang bstan phyir dang // 'jig rten rgyang pan gdul don du// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo // gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor// rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog/ dam
259b5(rgyud): ga chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// de ni me baspyod yang dag bri// zung bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbyor gzhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid// dri ma med par byin brlabs pa// kun nas shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs// 
259b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab// 'bar ba mang pos rnam par 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs ba kun gyi gnas// de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin
259b7(rgyud): shegs kun bdag po 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su spangs// rnam par bzhag ste bzhugs par 'akur// mi bskyod ren chen dpag med dang // don grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/ 
259b8(rgyud): rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i// thugs la rnam par zhugs par gyur// de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems// dngos med pa ri gcig par ni/ 
260a1(rgyud): // mkha' 'dra dro rje las byung gzigs// shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi gcig pu// da ni grib ma ltar thugs chung // dorje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas// 'gro don mnyam dang mi mnyam mdzad// 
260a2(rgyud): de ltar mtshams gnas nyi ma yis// 'gro ba gnyid logs dpar byed// de bzhin de pazhin gshegs pa kun// byang chub sems kyis sa dbar byed// sku gsung thugs ni rdo dag cig/ de rnams
260a3(rgyud): bar bzhed pa yis// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis// rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur// rig pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni// sngags kyi byin brlabs bla na med// de ni zhal gsum pa lta
260a4(rgyud): zur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs// den pa mgon po bcom ldan gyi// thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste// byang chub sems ni rab bskor la// lan gsum ched du brjod pa ma
260a5(rgyud): sam mi khyab cing gnas med gang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo byang chub sems gcig las// spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin// de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang // de 'og gsang
260a6(rgyud): bdag pos ni// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la// ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus// phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos// 'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams// rten 'brel las skyes yi
260a7(rgyud): par ni// khyed chos ston par mdzad pas khams// sman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni// zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan// 'di dag di ltar bde ga shegs dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags
260a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chend// lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur// gang zhig phyi dus skye bo yis// 'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje car// 'od chen ldan pa
260b1(rgyud): sa pa// pa sa rgya ma // gang zhig sung kyi ma dris pa/ migs sa lags sa sems dpa' che// gas par bdag pa rjod pags so// sus dong nga lta nga khyong su
260b2(rgyud): yongs du can me rnams mi// 'jig rten kyang ban ma chag gzhal 'gyur// log par lta ba la gnas te// cadaka' bar yang spyod par byed// la la klu dang shir la dga'// dgong dang sgeg la mchog tu
260b3(rgyud): spang ba la dga' zhing // de bzhin la khrig pa la dgar 'gyur// rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang / de bzhin gte mug la bgaga'o// la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhen// shes pa gzhan dag 'dod par
260b4(rgyud): 'gyur// nya dang gdang de bzhin chang // bshang gci khub khra rnams ni// skyes bu glen pa pa byed cing // med par smra ba chos su sngogs// ma dang sring mo la sogs pa// bgrod min la ni 'gro ba dang // pha dang ma yang
260b5(rgyud): gsod pa dang // de bzhin grog chags gzhan rnams gsad// 'ardzun gyi tshig nyid sla ba dang // kya bang du yang chub dang // gzhan ze chung ba'i zad 'gro zhing // spa ba gzhan yang byung par 'gyur/ 
260b6(rgyud): dam chos spong ba dang // de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste// sna tshogs sdig pa byas nas kyang // sngags pa dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur// gzer nad dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sna tshogs nad de leb
260b7(rgyud): pa// 'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas// zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur// 'dor bar byed pa rmongs pade// mi bzad sdig pa byas pa dang // log par lta la mchog gzhol rnams// ngan songs sus du
260b8(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin// gang sheg yang dag thob pa nyid// 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i bdag po ma'am
261a1(rgyud): rnams kyis// rdul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur nas// don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang // de yang nga rgyal dag tu ltung // de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang // shes rab nyid kyang shin du rig/ 
261a2(rgyud): dga' dang ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyid ces// mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'// sgyu dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan// mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba// phan tun dag ni yun la
261a3(rgyud): 'byin// gseng sngags smra ba la brten nas// gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur// de rnams bdud gyi phyin pa rlabs kyis// gal te dngos grub phra thob na// des ni mngon parang rgyal bas/ 
261a4(rgyud): mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur// tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang // khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod 'gyur// rang las 'bras las byung ba yi// phan pa la ni gnod pa med// de rnams dge dang mi da
261a5(rgyud): rnams// bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer// mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi// slob dpon smod cing bsnyen bkur med// skad cig gcig gis ldang byed cing // de la skad cig gis
261a6(rgyud): rjes chags// khyi dang phag dang khwa rnams kyi// spyod pa dag ni ston par byed// de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar// mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur// gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par/ 
261a7(rgyud): dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur// gsang ba srung bar mi byed par// thams cad du ni ston par byed// 'jig rten la ni dmang byas nas// gzhan dag la yang dab gsal byed// bdag nyid
261a8(rgyud): rtsab med par ni// dam tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur// sla bcas spor ldan gyis bskul bas// rang la rang gi klags ched med// de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi// 
261b1(rgyud): 'gyur// nyes bzung bad rnam kyi byer// ya na spyod ma du byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rab sbyor dman pa yi// sngags parnams na 'gyu la 'thur// byang la ba rab bstan
261b2(rgyud): dpe sbyor la gcig tu mkhas// rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas// lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod// sngogs dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams 'tsho ba sgrub par 'gyur// gang
261b3(rgyud): 'gyur bar// dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed// de rnams yang dag srud byed pa'o// gsang ba dgongs pas bshad po yin// dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams// 'di yis thams cad dgu/ 
261b4(rgyud): par bya// rang gi rjes rig mi shes na// de rnams zhi 'ang ka la 'gyur// de nas rjes su gzung don du// tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// gcig tu
261b5(rgyud): dus par yur dam su// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sprin// yang dag 'byung bas legs mchod de// phyag 'tshal nas ni 'des/ dag sol// de bzhir
261b6(rgyud): / de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa// 'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'o// nyams dga' rdo rje'i snying po 'di// de snyed bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan
261b7(rgyud): gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// gang yang 'di ltar gsal 'debs pa// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs ni legs// 'di ni de na
261b8(rgyud): dbyed yin na// byang chub sems gzhan gyi spros shes// de bzhin gshegs de rnams la gsungs// ched chad byung / the tshom thams cad
262a1(rgyud): mdzad pa'i// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// bdag pa la ni 'di skad zhus// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs car gyi/ khom tan gyi phul phyung yang // rgatsotso 'di ni ston sa dang
262a2(rgyud): pad// ji ltar slob mnga' ma gyur// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs yid badril sogs// ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir// de ni yang dkabashad du gsol// de bzhin
262a3(rgyud): gshegs kun bdag pa ni// dri rnapas thu bar mkhyen nas su// ye shes sgron mngarda grags// ting 'dzim ni lnga rigs 'byung // gtsol ma mi bskyod snyi ba ni// sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan
262a4(rgyud): pas// de nas yang dag byung ba ni// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces bya ba'i sngags// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur// mi bskyod rgya chen thabs
262a5(rgyud): kyis spyor// sasu gsum gnas dang dkar dang dmapa// bdag nyid chen pa dgal yin// rdordzogasapa 'ded de bzhin gshegs// bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshugs
262a6(rgyud): bdag go// dam tshig 'byung rdo rje zhes byar// ting nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod// de nas de ni dIka ces pa'i// snying po de bzhin yang dag byung // de nas gsu ngas pa
262a7(rgyud): du 'thugs pa gyur// de ma cim byung // dpal zhes bya ba'i ting lenas// snyoms pa zugs nas gshegs par// 'didi yid pa dang byung ba'i phyir// yid pazhi / 
262b1(rgyud): bu rin chen rigs// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// de nas rat+na rAka ces bya// snying po dpal ldan de tshe byung // de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni// rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// 
262b2(rgyud): dang dgang dang gnag pa yi// zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni// rdo rje gsum kyi bdag po yi// lho phyogs logs su bzhugs par gyur// de yang byang du gzigs gyur te// mnyam nyid ye she
262b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'dag po de// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag/ 'dod chags chen po'i las byung ba// rdo rje zhes ni bya bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// 'dod chags// 
262b4(rgyud): regs las byung // A ro ldeg ces bya snying go// rdo rje gsum la de das phyung // de nas bya

262b6(rgyud): / bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag nyung // rdo rje de la snyoms bzhugs nas// snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o// dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i riH//

263a1(rgyud): / yid bzhin rin chen dang // 'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pa'o// de nas khyab bdag darje 'dzin// 'dod chags dam tshig 'byung ba yi/ tang
263a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa snyoms thugs te// rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// dam pa dag ni byung bar gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig pu// yum zhes bya ba yang
263a3(rgyud): dag bshad// de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po// gang phyi lha mo btsud mo mchog u dang gsung thugs las byung ga/ dwe Shar nyi zhes byar grags// rig pa skyes bu zhes bya ba'o// de ni bud de
263a4(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin ma// zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis ni// me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas rjes mnyes rdo rje grags// sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

274b8(rgyud): grang byed ces sa pa ba kyad//  chos nag/ yangs pazang sa 'ad ni yin pa gsungs// tid 'brel bag ma ya yin te/ 5 sa/ 
275a1(rgyud): // go// dngos pa mang ba rigs yin te// kun mkhyen ye shes dbus nyid do// chos dpyid nyid kyi bud med ni// shes rab 'di 'dus mnyes par bya// nang nam yin phyi ma yin// 
275a2(rgyud): gang ma yin gzhan nas min// gnas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur// de bas sA ma kIr bshad do// de yi rdo na nyid gcig pa// byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do// nam mkha' dang nI
275a3(rgyud): gcig tu mtshungs// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su pa gyur// de bas yul du rnam brtags pa// bslu ba dag ni bshad pa yin// ye shes dbang po stong pa gci// rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin// 
275a4(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag/ rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags pa// de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste// dngos med pa ni dbul ba yi// de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// byang
275a5(rgyud): nimanyes par 'gyur// gang yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa// de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid// mi byed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa// sang pa nyid du bkal legs dang // shin du tshad ldan mdzes
275a6(rgyud): pa yi// thig gis mkhas pas thig gdab bo// blo ldan dkyil 'khor brtag bya kA/ bruni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la// dngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya// 
275a7(rgyud): / de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// dgongs pas dang po bshad pa ste// de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'di na 'jig rten pa rnams rtog/ gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas// de ni gzungs
275a8(rgyud): dzin pa dag/ yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs// dam pa 'jig rten shin du 'das// 'khor ba dang ni cig shes spangs// len pa ma yin gtong
275b1(rgyud): bamed// ma sa ma yin gnas ma yan// blo ldan bungad du 'di shes pa// rnal 'byor thams cad ngan pa mchog/ zugs kyi dkyil la tsha la la 'dan// dam pa' rnal 'phyang ba nas bshad// 8/ 
275b2(rgyud): sung yi 'ong kra/ klang cig yid ni bzod gyur na// de rnams shes pa skabs dag ni// de sung gnas pa da ltar byed// gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las// de las thugs kyi kyis 'khor ci// 
275b3(rgyud): ste bzhi pa nyid yin no// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ de rje gsung gtso 'gro ba'i tha// srar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la// sngags spyod don bye nyid zhus// sngags kyi btul du
275b4(rgyud): dpa ka cika/ khyad par du ni bzung bslab pa// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung // spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshika/ gsananas/ 
275b5(rgyud): 'gro'i 'dod gcigs// gsungs pa'i don can bka' stsal to// me tog do gas yang dag byung // zhe sngang la 'jug satshan nyid yin// dngos med la gnas gte mug ste// 'dod chags 'ad
275b6(rgyud): chags las byung ba// 'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin// theg pa mchog ni tha med pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug se// 'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad// dngos grub de ni 'di bsku
275b7(rgyud): po// rigs ngan myur bar shes par bya// smig mkhan dag ni ngal ba yin// mtshams med byed pa gnyeg ste// gsod pa dor gnyer sems pa po// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// theg pa mtsho
275b8(rgyud): de 'grub par 'gyur// sems can sdig chen byas pa dang // gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po// gang yang slo dpon spyod pa yis// bslab kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'di nyid dang
276a1(rgyud): 6/ du no// na sdang lag na gnas pas gnas// gang gis phung sogs dngos med par// niganas las byung sems kyis byas// de ni srog gcad byed pa ste// theg pa mchog la gnas// 
276a2(rgyud): ba yin// nad dang de bzhin phyi rol dag/ rten 'byung gnyis su ston pa ni// de ni brdzun smra dka' ba ste// gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang // de ni dzaH
276a3(rgyud): su shes bya ste// de 'phrog dang tshul gang yin pa// gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod// gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa// de bzhin nyid la rtogs sbyor ba// sems can de de 'dod la dga'// 
276a4(rgyud): bsgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur// de yi stong nyid gti mug la// yul ni bshad pa zhes grags ste// dbang po gci ba zhes bya la// de dag zhi ba za ba yin// theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir// 
276a5(rgyud): dka' bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// de dag che brdzun 'dod pa dang // ba shwa ga ci zas su byed pa po// shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab// chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu// gnyis med de bzhin nyid sto
276a6(rgyud): dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa// longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin// de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod// rang lharnal 'byor ldan pa yi// gsang sngags las kyis mnyes par bya// 'ashang
276a7(rgyud): zas su byed pa yi// sbrul sku'i gzugs can bu mod// sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya// ma dang sring mo thu mon// 'di 'dran la 'byor pas mnyes bya// theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la/ 
276a8(rgyud): dngos grub rgya chen des thob po// ji ltar mi tog nam mkha' ni// kun du khyab par gnas gyur ba// 'di ni sdom pa zhes ba shad de// ting 'dzin pas ma khyab ces bya ba// de nyid 'jig rte par
276b1(rgyud): / nga bo// rtog par dga' ba'i ming can no// sangs rgyas yum gyi ye shes la// 'dod spyo dgos par mi 'gyur te// rnam par mi rtag sbyor gcag gis// myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur// de na
276b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsung ni// sgrib kun sal ba la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches// thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur// 'di na bdag pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhi gshegs
276b3(rgyud): kun gyi bden/ tshal srad du tshe gdon pa/ de bzhin gshegs lakhor nang du gsung // 'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang // gti muka brag ba rmongs bcas dang // zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'i// rigs kyi dngos

276b5(rgyud): mas can kun pa phan dgyes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa// 'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa// sems can kun 'dzin gcig pu pa// chu Sha
276b6(rgyud): ga dang bral ba po// sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin// bdag po me yi gzugs can te// thams cad za ba nye bar sbyor// de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu// bcom

276b8(rgyud): 'di yin zhing // sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyi// byang chub spyod 'di mchog 'di yin// de nas brjod mi la shes pa// brjod mi lang pa nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas shing rdul grangs mnyam ste/ 
277a1(rgyud): / sgrib pa thams cad sal la soms// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun napa 'jigs she khrag kyar nas// 'khor gyi dkyil mabar dathams cad// gcig tu
277a2(rgyud): nyid gyur to// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung // gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba ru// gamigs nas ma rtsol 'di skad gsol// mgon po sgrib kun
277a3(rgyud): sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar// 'di nams paspang bar mdzad du gsol/ kha mi g.yo ba ni gsang ba ste// zhi ba gcig pu bde bar

277b8(rgyud): dam tshig gsu kyi rdo rje mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi// spyod pa'i lel lnga ba yi// / denas dpal chen mi bstod pa// sdug sung thugs kyi gas rab can/ 
278a1(rgyud): 'dzad pa snyoms zhugs nas// thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'o// gsang sngags 'di na gsungs pa yin// oM nas bya ba dang bar pon// sarba ta thA ga ta ga nyis/ 
278a2(rgyud): tsit+ta gsum par yongs su brtag/ badz+ra lnga pa yi gong mar ldan// swab+hA bAt+ma kaHlA pa// a haM dus kyi ming can phyir// sgra drug gsum pa'i ming can no// de nas dpal ldan rnam snga
278a3(rgyud): mdzad// rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// skra ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung // oM shes kyi 'tshangs par bshad// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// kA ya tshis

280a1(rgyud): // nas su// gsang ba 'di nyid rnam par bsgom// yul dang dbang po sems dpa' ma// bshang gcizas su byed pa pa// byas dade 'dra das grungan// 22'a ba ba tog zad ba rga

280b1(rgyud): shi du 'das// chos kyi bdud rtsid na pas 'jung // dgangs pas sngags kying nyid du// gang nig gsum du gsungs pa 'di// dze/ dza lhor 'jog rten sogs// mgon gsol bar bshad du
280b2(rgyud): sol// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis// grags ldan lag no rje la// bu khyed lags sa cher legs te// bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya// rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags dang // de

280b7(rgyud): rgyas byang chub dam pa yin// de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa// gsang ba yang dag su
280b8(rgyud): / de rnams cing bar byed par 'gyug/ de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste// dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab pa'i// le'u drug pa ni ye dpang bshad// de nas rdo rje gsum gsang
281a1(rgyud): / dam ga che ming byed gcig/ ting 'dzidugs sngags spyod pa'i mchog/ mngon rdzogs byang chub 'digasungs bad/ dag dam cheg la nu bo gang // 'dod pa thams cad ces da nam
281a2(rgyud): da yas sangs myod ldan pa 'i / kyi da pa nyid // si ga stor sa/  sa de tsha pa / ni khye cho 'brang ba/ 'a na 'as pa
281a3(rgyud): dka' thub myur ba de yin la// sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod// mi zad pa ni gnyis ga ste// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang // gzugs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod// de dag bsgoms pa'i
281a4(rgyud): sbyor pa yis// sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grug// tha dadami ge slongs mo yin// de 'don pa neb pa ste// gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de// de dag spongs mo za bar 'dod// dka' thung dag ni mi bya zhing // sdos
281a5(rgyud): pa me bzad nyid kyid min// 'dod gsum de nyid pos spyod cing // sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas// rdo rje gsum dbye bde gnas na// sngags rig byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// gzhan du dus min
281a6(rgyud): / 'chi ba dang // shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang // mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs
281a7(rgyud): rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mas bsten// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zheng // byang chub la rob phyin chags bya// de ltab
281a8(rgyud): thugs la gas pa shes nas// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// snga chags rnam par sdang mdzad de// skal rnam gsum shes byas nas// lhan pa
281b1(rgyud): dul bar bya// 'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dril rnam gsum shes byas nas// b+han pas la ni dbul bar bya// de ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ 
281b2(rgyud): sa chos na 'dzin pa'i gtso// rol rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid don yod de grags// sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// reg pa rnam gsum shes bya
281b3(rgyud): nas// rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod ma long gzugs can no// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol deng ga gnyis ga rjes su mi dmigs pa// gzugs la sogs gsum
281b4(rgyud): / ded yin te// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// gzugs sgra rol sogs pa la// sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa 'di// snying po sangs rgyas kun bskyed de// mkhas pas gzu
281b5(rgyud): la sogs pa// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// de bzhin rigs su bsgom pa ni// bsgom pas der ni bsgom par bya// nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bshad// sangs rgyas rjes dran
281b6(rgyud): rabs kyang // chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom// rdo rje gsum bsgom rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje rjes dran bsgom pa'o// rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang // chos dang longs spyod sprul skur byung // regs
281b7(rgyud): rjes dran sbyor gyur pa// de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o// de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig/ rdo rje sa sum nyid med chos nyid// lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste// de bsgom byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// bzhi po
281b8(rgyud): ni nge bzhi// ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs// de nyid mo yi grangs yin te// bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag/ sangs rgyas sud dkyis bskyed pa yi// bung med lo grangs bcu drug pa// gzugs
282a1(rgyud): / bzang bya dang mchod pa ni// dben pa zhes bya ba rnam par bya// byin gyis brlabs pas yid 'ong ba// khyad par gsum shes bya ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che// smya
282a2(rgyud): sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// dang por sbyong ba 'di bsgoms na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang
282a3(rgyud): de bzhin mo// phaT kyang der ni bsgom par bya// de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid// ci rigs par ni rnam par spro// 'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i// rdo rje pad ma 'di mchog ste// gas
282a4(rgyud): dang snying ga sna rtse ru// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya// 'bar bcas bla 'od bzhin dkar bar// shes rab de ni rtag tu bsgom// gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur pas// de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o// 
282a5(rgyud): gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bas// bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor bar rig/ sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// nyams dka' sangs rgyas
282a6(rgyud): kun gyis bstan// b+ha ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming // rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung // rdo rje de dag nyid du sbyor// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste// b+ha ga ling ga yin par bsgrags// gzhug pa 'aci
282a7(rgyud): med sbyor ba ste// sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom pa'o// de las blo ldan gyis spro ba// ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas// mnyam pa med pas khyad par du// sangs rgyas sprin rnams deng spro'o// 
282a8(rgyud): chos rjeb dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas// rdo rje bdam yang dag sbyar// b+ha ga'i ling bar btag pa'o// de nas 'a spu'i bu ga las// 'bad pa chos kyi sprin rnams swa/ 
282b1(rgyud): kyar rdzogs byed pa'o// 'du sa kyi bdag pa yin// darjerjes su dra dang bsgom// dngos med gci bu la sbyang ba/ sang la rdza rab sngar 'gyur// b+ha ga'i yang gnas padadang // da
282b2(rgyud): gnas// rdo rje sprin rnams kun du spro// rdo rje byang chub sems bsgom nyid// myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// rigs rdzas dran pa'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas stong nyid rdo tra las// de bzhin
282b3(rgyud): la 'byor pas spros na// rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// kro ba~M rjes drin spyad pa la'ang // stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i// khro ba'i ba spu'i bu ga nas// khro bo'i sprin rnams spo bar bya// de
282b4(rgyud): dang rje 'dzin// khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la// rjes dran sbyor ba'i dgongs pa ni// thub pa cha la slar zhus pa// thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa// b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// 'jig rten
282b5(rgyud): sbyar 'di las// sangs rgyas la sogs spro kur ba// tshul 'di ma 'ongs skye bo la// phyi dus kun rmongs bskyed pa ste// bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni// ci phyir gsungs shes de na pa
282b6(rgyud): grobs nam mkha' mtshan pa can// ter 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing // de na pa shin du rmongs dbye bas// ji bzhin par ni rtog par byed// mgon khyod bdab chen po ste// sangs rgyas
282b7(rgyud): gcig pu// sku med sred gsum bdag nyid can// dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan// de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi// yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum// dgongs pa bya ba dri med pa
282b8(rgyud): sa can bdud ci 'byung // khyod 'dir blag khyab 'jug ste// seng ga drag pa'i ma can nyid// gyong na sa bor tshangs la btag/ khyod na tan 'byung 'grub 'byung // dus gsung 'as
283a1(rgyud): / 'byor tshe// dus dang ces su gyur pa nyid// shes dang shes bya rnas par grol// debs myed na 'gro ba'i tha// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa las// de la sogs pa mchig gas na nas// dam
283a2(rgyud): rjes su dran sgom pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad// rang gi rdo rje pad mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las// rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'
283a3(rgyud): bsgom// dkyil 'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid// dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las// rang gi tshangs pa rtag drangs te// rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'khor bya// sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // 
283a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi phung po lnga// sangs rgyas de nyid sogs brtag pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig/ gsung rdas dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga// rdo rje ches gsung phun sum tshogs// de yi gsung
283a5(rgyud): ci'adra bar 'gyur// bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin// thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ 
283a6(rgyud): sems can rjes dran sbyor ba gang // sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid// spyod pa la mtshungs ji bzhin du// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa// de sbyor dran pa bsgom pa ni/ 
283a7(rgyud): rje sngags kyi sku gang yin// gsung dang sku ni rnam sgom pa// de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid// rtag tu gsub 'das gyur pa yi// sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba// bdag kyang de dang
283a8(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur// dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis me// debs tshangs pa shing du za// dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas thog bzhin du rung // de bzhin gshegs mchog me di/ 
283b1(rgyud): dngos med ces byugs dpa ste// blo dang dungs 'dags pan// das chu can mchog 'thob par 'gyur// shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyu ga// rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do// pha ma phyin pa sa
283b2(rgyud): / grags pa// yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o// thams cad rang nyid dri ma med// ma skyes pa dang zad pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o// ma skyes rjes sus+ho/ 
283b3(rgyud): bkang // der mini yang 'arjod min zhing // ma skyes ming ni gcig pu pa// dran pa de ni yin par bshad// ji ltar nas mkha' 'od gsal ba// mtsham ma med cing 'thur ba med// rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drang // 
283b4(rgyud): / gyur cing // gnyis med gnyis mu yod min zhing // yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang // zhe sdang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i ming // sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing // de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya// 
283b5(rgyud): rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te// bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// brten pa'i sems ni thob pa las// rang gi khu bas mchod par bya// dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang // de ni dag par bshad// 
283b6(rgyud): pa yin// de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro// 'di yis lus la mchod pa dang // khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs// chos 'dzin
283b7(rgyud): pa yi sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs ni yang dag grub// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa// de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur// de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid// 
283b8(rgyud): rab zhin mo rab tu brtag/ mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang // gsung gi dbang bskur ba nyid gsal// dgangs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa// mkha' la gnas pa'i
284a1(rgyud): / nyi ma bzhin// do ni ci dkar spyod par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste// sngags spyod pa yi mchog gyur pa/ le bu bdun pa rab tu bsdu
284a2(rgyud): // de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs// dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po// de bzhed she ba tham ba cad kyi// bla ma do rje gsum gyi bdag/ mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po// dbang phyug dbang phyu
284a3(rgyud): dam pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la// bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btab// nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dbang thub pa che// theg pa chen po rnam snang ba// kun tu bzang po
284a4(rgyud): zhugs bzang // dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog/ rigs mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung // rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ 
284a5(rgyud): zhesang rtse// gti mug chen po blo gas che// theg pa gsum por rab spyod cing // rdo rje byeg pa ston pa po// nam mkha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog/ ye shes rgya mtsho bla ma che// rdo rje gsum po
284a6(rgyud): chags med pa// rgyal gnas mchod pa bshad du gsog// rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog/ thar lam gcig pu ston pa bo// sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag/ mi mchog ma chod pa bshad du
284a7(rgyud): gsol// dngos po kun cig shin du dka/ byang chub sems ni rgya batsho che// chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba// rten 'brel ye shes las thung ba// rdo rje gsupa gcig rnam dag don/ 
284a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad// bdag med chos ni shin du dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'phyar che// thams cad dbang bsku
284b1(rgyud): dang ga// kun da ngan ci mchog 'dzin pa// na chung mag yongs btsal nas // gzugs dang na m-ir rnams kyis brgyang// lo grangs nyi shul lon ga//  das ma las gnas btag/ rnam 'ar da
284b2(rgyud): nam gtsang ba yi// sa phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid// zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas yid 'ong // bshang gci chu yis byug nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o// rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o// de bzhin
284b3(rgyud): gshegs pa mchod pa yi// phung po zhes bya sna tshogs skyes// rdo rje gsum po mi phyed khams// rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// kun mkhyer ye shes lang cho ste// len pa me gas pa la sbyor la// de nyid
284b4(rgyud): yin par brtag/ 'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed rgya// 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa// gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa// mtha' phyes bzhin du brtag pa yin// gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin te// 
284b5(rgyud): rnam par dben pa dngos med pa// sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin// zhi ba sna tshogs des byung ba// zhi ba'i gnas ni byur la sogs// bshang gci yul dang dbang por
284b6(rgyud): grags// na ni shes rab la sogs drug/ 'di dag gis gang thugs kur ba// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa// dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid do// mchod
284b7(rgyud): yan lag gnyis pa yi// bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad// 'jig rten shin du 'das spyi'o// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying ga ru// rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang // rke dpags pa 'jig
284b8(rgyud): rgyal bras rnams pa pasod pa de// rigs lnga po bya ba yid// rnams sa byas gangs par// ma se s+hog// dag nyid rgya bye ga
285a1(rgyud): // btul zhugs can gyis snying gar bsgom// rgyud sbyor bar gyur ba ni// mA ma sde ni yongs su la tan/ nadzarda rdzal su 'dod pas// bsdu ba dbang rab tu bya// don chen dang bzhan
285a2(rgyud): mchod rten ni// 'od zer snga tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// ye nas rgyam tshe dus gsu pa// gnas de dri ni bsam byal/ blo lda ba spu'i bu ka las// ngi m+b+hi ji ltar spro bar bya// rnal 'byor napa
285a3(rgyud): mchog gzhol bas// mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya// gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod// rnam lngagacig la rnal 'byor ma// me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni// de yang me gsal zhi la gnas// skye
285a4(rgyud): par ud pal nyid gyur pa// rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o// 'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang // de bzhin ldang ba'i ming can no// de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// de na
285a5(rgyud): ldan gyis dbul ba// lha rnams kyi yang dngos med ni// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las// me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni// rdo rje can gyi thub chen du
285a6(rgyud): dang drung dang dbang chen dang // chu ru yongs su brtag pa yin// re re'ang dang po sbyong zhes bya// me tog de lnga gsum du bshad// bya rgod me tog pa pa dang // bung ba sha ba zhes rer zhing // pe tog
285a7(rgyud): 'di yi dgongs pa ni// ma 'ongs skye blo mi shes so// ma rtogs pas na de rnams kyi// dngos grub cing du gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar bdag ni skal men zhes// smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid spyod/ 
285a8(rgyud): dbadag nyid spyad pas na// sangs rgyas thams cad spyad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad spyad smar pas// maM las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro// gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min/ 
285b1(rgyud): med gnyis ga yon// chags papas kyang ma yin te//  mas 'gre ba dka la klad// de ban bzhin gshegs sangs/ na gsang sngags 'di nyid las// gas sngags
285b2(rgyud): par dka' ba'i rgyus// des ni bdag dang de dag smod// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// dgengs pa de ni bshad du gsol/ rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na// mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur// de na
285b3(rgyud): bcom ldan snga chags pas// gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa// nyen dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// me tog doran ni bshad par bya// pad ma ud pal nyin mor bshad// dzA ti mtshan ma yin zhe
285b4(rgyud): bshad// lnga yi bdag nyid gsu ba dang gcig/ gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur// de yi thabs ni nyin mer bshad// mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye 'a
285b5(rgyud): 'jug tu 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur// de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang // dgongs pas yongs su brtags pa yin// de ni sangs tas snying por 'gyur// de bas lha chags kyis de ming // rnal 'byor
285b6(rgyud): dang sngags pa rnams// dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson bya// dgongs pa byen brlab chu lis ni// de rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig drung de bcur grags pa// de ni da pa u pal mi
285b7(rgyud): nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum// dzA ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod// kaN+De ka dang pa le ka/ yug ti kar bI ra re// go rim bzhin du sbyin sogs te// sa la sogs par 'dir sbyar ro// dngos med ko 'pha
285b8(rgyud): bkod pas// lha rnams kyi ni spyir sbyor bas// gcig tu sangs rgyas gan mnyes pa'o// mchod pa cher por 'gyur la// lnga pa'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhas/ sa ban dag reg
286a1(rgyud): / de nyid gsus sbyor 'khar lo no// dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro// dang ni mkhas pas rtag par ni// sa ga par bya// 'angs la ba darje dang / 
286a2(rgyud): de bzhin u pal rtag tu bsgom// dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa// dpag tshad brgya khyod de nyid gsum// byams pa la sogs gru bzhir gyur// mdzes pa phung pos brgyan pa yin// glu bzhi
286a3(rgyud): dade rigs su gyur// zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can// mchod rten ye shes sems rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni// shes rab can gyi
286a4(rgyud): gnas sgom mo// mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod nams// de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal// rin chen ye shes spro bdag nyid// gos ni bsru ba zhes bya'o// mchod pa mchog rnams ded
286a5(rgyud): kis// byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya// shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las// lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya// sbyor gcig de las yang dag byung // rin chen 'byung gnas
286a6(rgyud): yin// dga' mgu yang dag ldan pa yi// dngos grub shin du grub pa'i phyir// nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya// rin chen thams cad dbul bar bya// chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las
286a7(rgyud): da'adun gyi nor de ni// des bkang ba ye zhing 'di ni// shes rab thabs gcig las byung ba'i// dngas grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir// zhing de nyid re dbul bar ni// nam mkha' mtha' yas
286a8(rgyud): 'o// sbyin pa'i pharol phyin 'dir 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus sa de// phyag rgya'i bdag po mnyam gzhog ste// 'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la// reg par yang dag
286b1(rgyud): nga gdas pad 'a gad pa'ad dpa 'arnam// bdag nyid dngan ga shegs pa 'asra// l+r-il dang dbang 'asu ba bya ga/ dngas pa ga la na
286b2(rgyud): dal po zhes bya ba'i// bshang gci ji la ji lta bar// de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod// skal bzang zhing ni mdzes pa li// bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang // gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'byung
286b3(rgyud): 'byor pa de zin brlabs pa// byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig phra// rang gi lus kyi rang du gzhug/ sngar stsogs de sa rjes par// byed kyis brlabs pa'i gnas bkod do// mig bzang dag pa'i bya
286b4(rgyud): rab byung khu babrang nas mchod// gang zhig da ltar rtogs pa de// blangs pa de rjeng chang bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang // spyan la sogs par rab brtags pa// de ni 'jugs gas
286b5(rgyud): yang // da ni ku ba za bar 'gyur// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi/ gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ rin chen du
286b6(rgyud): 'thung gnas mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni rje bzhin nyid du'ang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsung gi gsang
286b7(rgyud): 6 ka ci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i// le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad// // de nas de bzhin gshegs ma reg ka// thams cad mi 'gyur me 'dra/ sangs rgyas dbang bskur
286b8(rgyud): so// gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin// rnga rdzogs pa nyid longs song sa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas cig// gsang pa nyams ni dga' 'a
287a1(rgyud): / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil la khor bsgrub par bya// de khre gcig rdo rjes // bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom// 'od 'bram ba
287a2(rgyud): ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag byung // bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mang brlag/ rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa de// thugs
287a3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan// bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje gsung ba 'di lta bu// rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// de ni sbyar
287a4(rgyud): bar mi bskyod pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rin chen de nyid ni// zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu// gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig
287a5(rgyud): dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi// mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// 'di ltar dngos med mchog gyur pa// khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ 'jig rten 'dang 'gal tshig gis// mgon khyod ci phyi
287a6(rgyud): ston par mdzad// gang nig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa// ji ltar rdza phye mar brlag/ de ni phyer brlags byung ba
287a7(rgyud): las// ji ltar yang dag sems 'thub 'gyur// chos sku gcig pu las byung las// lhag pa zhes bya gyur ba su// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// phye bar brlags par ji ltar nus/ 
287a8(rgyud): byed ba rlag byed pas dngos med pas// bye ba nyid kyang khyad par du// sangs rgyas sngags dod ral 'byor pa// nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la// de 'dra bar ni khyer brlag par// snga rba pa ka shad
287b1(rgyud): / mas can byan sems cad 'dan// sa sa rgyab sangs rgyas par brtags pas// 'di ga nyis byed par medad nas/ pha 'ongs rgya ba smra' bar gyur// sangs kyis gcag bu bathar rjud pa
287b2(rgyud): med pas ngasas meg// gang ga kyis gsungs byanas/ tu spro bar byed par 'gyur// theg pa pang bsgrubs na 'tsho hU~Mg/ dgongs pa'i thub pababang pomachon/

287b4(rgyud): par gyur pa dang // da ltar rjes su ston mdzad dang // mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol ba'o// mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje las// de nas ji ltar gnon par bgyi// de nyid/

287b6(rgyud): saso// de nas rdo rje 'dzid smra pa'i// byol pan pa'i tshigags na nas// de nas gtso 'o rje chang // khyab bdag 'i sa gsus pa// mags sa bu khyod ci legs te// kun du babang po byung
287b7(rgyud): gas so// sams gad pa dod de// khyod kyis sa // gas sa do // den sa pagad par bya// nga tsogs pa gas gyung ga/ mas rgya

288a1(rgyud): / bra rdo rje nyid// des bshig pa ni bsad pa ste// sa sa rgyas sems cad khyad par du// sran chanas kyi dbang ba yin ra bzhin nyid dug go// rnal 'byung ba yi log kyang
288a2(rgyud): 'gro ba rlung gi ming cad no// mi bskyod rdo rje'i spyod pa nyid// lag tu rdo rje bzhag nas ni// de re myur la sogs bya ba// klu yi rang bzhin snga tshogs nyid// lung sogs brtags pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ 
288a3(rgyud): skugasung thugs las yang dag byung // de yi yan lag phung por bshad// de ni phyer gyur bsad pa yin// 'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong // mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid// de bzhin skye ba dam pa yin// dngos
288a4(rgyud): grub chen po des thob 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan bde chen po// ye shes thar pa rab bsgrub pa// rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa// byang chub spyod pa rab bsgrubs pas// phyag na rdo rje 'od chen
288a5(rgyud): sang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la// bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sgrub pa'i dam tshig de nyid gsungs// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la// rnam par snar ma
288a6(rgyud): sgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par bsgom// rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya//

288b1(rgyud): de nas bdag po 'acor ldan 'das// 'dod chags thar bar rab 'jug pa// gas ba dag pa gnas mdag/ dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas 'ang //

289a4(rgyud): / grangs mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du// rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i// bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan thub pas de skad pa
289a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa// sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che// bsam pas dpal ldan gcig pu nyid// dpag tu med par gyur pa yin// de nas gang zhig dang tshig sogs// chos dbyings rje

292b6(rgyud): gsungs pa yi// mtshan nyid gsang 'di mi shes par// sngags dod de nyid mkhas pa yi// gzhan rnams la ni mi skar sgrogs// 'khrul pa cung zad tsam mthong ra// bzhad gang dag ni byed par 'gyur// 
292b7(rgyud): reg dadug dang mtshungs pa yi// mi de ge bar mi 'gyur ro// gang shig yid ni rid chen 'dra'i// 'gro la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams// 'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang // dngos grub mchog nothob par 'jur/ 
292b8(rgyud): dmas yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir// skad cig rjes gsung gru' dod du// sbyor bar dgongs pa'i bsapa pa can// bcom ldan 'di pa gang du gsol// de nas spyod pa bcom ldaran 'das// 'gro du
293a1(rgyud): b+hag da rje la// de ltar skyong ba yang dag sbyor// bsgom pa'i dngos po rtog byed / dbang po nyi ma thul pa nyis rba ga bzhig phya bcur gnas pa rnams// sras bcas sangs rgya
293a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyu ro// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i/ 'khrum pas skyes de yod pa 'di 'a stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las sangs rgyas sras dang bcas
293a3(rgyud): 'dod// sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de// bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor// zhing sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las// bri ba'i bde ba de nas brtsog/ bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing / 
293a4(rgyud): rang bzhin dri ma med byas la// da la dang myur dang gnas pa yi// sna tshogs de gcig dag la bzhugs// yid dpon rim la sogs pas kyang // sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas// de nas dbang po med
293a5(rgyud): ba// gang tshe zhi ba'i bde gcig pu// rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste// de yi chos ni lta ba po// de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung // gang phyi
293a6(rgyud): niblo byung ba// yi ge hUM gi gsang sngags lnga// de tshe snying las rab 'dar shing // dbang po thams cad brgyal bar gyur// gleng yang srang sogs yan lag ne// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams
293a7(rgyud): de// de nyid kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yi lus rab 'dar// nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni// phung po la sogs bshad pa gang // sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te/ 
293a8(rgyud): des ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur// de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te// de sngags bdag nyid dngos las byung / 
293b1(rgyud): tu shad pa yis// da nas 'asrid byung la/ skang gang dbus gnas pa/ \u0f7fla la na khya bsam pa'o// dal dbus nas na so// ga 'pha da 'a

293b3(rgyud): ra bsgo ma nas ni// lha rnams dag tu bskul bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// 'khor lo pad ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang // rol mo 'di dam pa
293b4(rgyud): sa kyu rnam bsgoms nas// snying ga ru ni bskul par 'gyur// rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag 'dur bar du byas nas ni// ye shes rdo rje car glegs pa// rdo rje gsum po yang dag bsgrub/ 
293b5(rgyud): sogs sangs rgyas kyang // deni dngos po med la pa// de nyid mchog sdi gas sngags kyis// sgyug yadam smin ma thong ba la// skrag pa me rnams 'di dag ste// gas sngags gnyis kyi sbyong
293b6(rgyud): song bas skrag ste mchog ser cing // 'di dag 'di nyid brtags pa yin// zhi ba gcig bu'i spyor ba las// sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas// yid la satha zhing dga' thung ba 'o// dngos

293b8(rgyud): 'gyur// zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las// 'di ni 'jig rter 'das pa la // de la bzlog pa 'jig tan pa'o// de nas bdag phrin ci'i med 'das// 'jig de dkas ma gtso ston pa 'o// 
294a1(rgyud): rkyen gsum mchog rdo rje gcos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsam to// ga zhig sngags kyi kyimathar ba sha rdo rje 'i shes gzugs// de ni dbang ma gnyis sbyor
294a2(rgyud): 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi mchog mchog bsgom pa'o// rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyong / rigs dbang phyug bdag kyang bsgom// gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa/ 
294a3(rgyud): dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba// de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'dasas tha thams cad dbang bkrung dbab ni// mi phyed rdo rjegasum grub pa/ 
294a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to// nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyong ba yis// phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa// chos kyi dkyibs la sogs pa'i ral// bud me de ni rgya cher 'gyur// rab tu
294a5(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di yis ni// 'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba'i// gsang sngags de nyid don gsang nyid// ni gas pas nye spyod// der de yid 'ong sangs rgyas rnamasas/ bye bgrangs med rdo rje 'dzin// sngags rig
294a6(rgyud): sa pa spro'o zhes// der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig ni// smyon pa 'dir de bla ma rjer// 'jig rten pa la 'dir bshad de// 'jig rten 'das pa
294a7(rgyud): pa'o// nam mkha' lta ba'i byang chub ni// 'di yis shin du thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho// rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thog/ dgangs pa lung baspyan gas
294b1(rgyud): gang migasams nadang gyur pa// gsang ba 'bod de yang dag bsrung // der rtag tu sogs par byed// de rjegasum gyi gsang bajam// de na ga shegs pa kun gyi yang // de nyid bskul bam
294b2(rgyud): byAb// le'u bcu pa yin par bshad// // de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog gcig/ nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog ces
294b3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzid la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yi// sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// le'u 'di ni bka' stsal to// sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes
294b4(rgyud): rtogs dang bre ba 'thob pa'i phyir// rdo rje phye shes dag gis kyang // tshangs pa la sogs yang dag bshad// ye shes skyeng po dam pa ste// rdo rje gsus sogs bshad gyur pa// sku yi rdo rje 'phob byed pa'o//

294b6(rgyud): med can gyi// skyes bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro// de bas re rerang gsum nyid de// rdo rje gsang sngags nyid du gyur// brjod med sa pon brgyad pa las// don na ma mkha' las brgyar 'gyur// brgya byed rlung
294b7(rgyud): gcig phul// de las nges par nyi shu lnga// skyes bu nyid du byung ba na// baphrin bcu zhes bya'i ming can dang // sku sgrogs gsol ba'i dga' byed 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa gcig nyid gyur// tshangs pa kyab 'dzin
294b8(rgyud): drag po ste// 'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad// 'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu// de rizhi ba dngos med nyid// de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung / longs spyod rdzogs spyad mapa la / de nas sngags gcig

298a8(rgyud): yo po rkyen dang phel ba'i me// phe la stani mchis ma lags// de bzhir phyag rgya med par de// gsang sngags dngos grub mi 'byung ngo // bad gsum kyi ni de nyid 'di// gang gi don du rab gsungs pa

298b3(rgyud): lha rnams kyi yang skyer las byung // 'gro 'a'i dod de rab bsdus pa// med bzhir dor bu lta bur 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang // yang da shin du 'jig rten 'das// mgon po 'jig rte
298b4(rgyud): sa kyi// ji ltar 'gro ba de phan 'gyur// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol// 'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod// gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub// lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu// 'dod
298b5(rgyud): pa 'ongs skye bo yis// gang zhig shes na yang dag par// nges par rnam tog med 'gyur ba// mi yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs// de nas bgon po bcom ldan 'das// dgongs pa'i gsang 'dam pa ste// phyag rgya'i
298b6(rgyud): nges pa 'jig rten pa'i// phyag rdo rje la gsungs so// nam rtogs sna tshogs lpags zhes bya// nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las// gsang sngags skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni mi mchog dag tu 'gyur/ 
298b7(rgyud): gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis// lcags ni gser du byed pa yin// de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis// pi ni bder gshegs byed pa yid// nges byas stor ba'i gsang sngags ni// zhi bde dngos grub su
298b8(rgyud): 'gyur// phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gcig pus// sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur ba yim/ dngos me yang dag ste// sngags kyi skyes bu 'brang ba ste// 'di phyog sa / 'gro ba'i don ni
299a1(rgyud): /  na rkun ga/ byung ba pos don gnas // garnas pa mas // ya da ma gru dam pa yi// deni sbyis du'i zlos pan
299a2(rgyud): phyag da na cin las// byung bas sogs sasum ldadag/ den kyag tu mi dpa shad//  rlabs ma // dab nga dub sha pa \u0f7f/ b+ha ni drug pa dang // na
299a3(rgyud): sa su sbyor ba rnams// sbyin drung ba dang gshegs su gsog// 'di dag phyag rgyu bang dag sur// sprul pa la ni mu la sogs// ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar// drung dri la sogs chos nas s+ya kun// stong gi
299a4(rgyud): rten 'brel las byung ba// mthong ning de bzhin sbyor ba las// chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur// 'di ni gsang sngags sbyor 'gyur med/ kyag rgyabang chos su 'di nyid yin// de ltan yang 'gro ba'i don
299a5(rgyud): yid bzhin no rgyas bur byed// 'od te rje 'dzin gang zhig/ sbyong ba gsum dang ldan pa'i me// na dag shegs ga sol// de bzhin du ri gnas gru pa'o//  tshig ni spya /
