299b1(rgyud): byang 'i nas pa'o// gas sngags med kying phyag rgya me // 'jog tan nan tag da/  mdun dun 'gyu // ded pa yod mam gcag las// nas 'gyur bas ni skad cag togs// nga chub tu
299b2(rgyud): ma yin la// de las gzhan du'ang rnyed pa 'gyur// gnyis ga las min gzhan las med// phud pa'i sprod ma mtshungs par 'gyur// sems cad bsam pa'i dbang gi sngag/ gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te// de ni sgrub dang
299b3(rgyud): bya dang // rnam par mi rtog brtags pa yi// sems can kun gyi longs spyod du// sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam par dben pa rab tu brtag/ gsal dang migasal
299b4(rgyud): dag ldan// klu dang 'bab chu la sogs yin// mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba// dur khrod la sogs pa yi ming // 'di ni sngags rigs mchog rnams kyi// bsam gtan bsdus las spyod pa'o// 'jig rten
299b5(rgyud): pa de nyid 'dir// 'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o// mi bskyod ye shes pa sogs pa// rdo rje rnam ma tha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgoms// rdo rje po
299b6(rgyud): shes rdo rje che// dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po nga'i mdzes pa// rtse lnga pa la de 'chin 'khor// rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis// mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin// mngon nam lnga yi ting
299b7(rgyud): la// gnas nas bla na med pa btag/ gtso bo ma stag mang po 'khrug/ rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje la ni rab dgod pas// rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur// nam mkha'i do dbus gdas pa
299b8(rgyud): lo dang 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgobs na// sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lus la rnam par sdang mang dganag/ 
300a1(rgyud): // gang ye ge mo bas mar// sngags la brjon shes bsgom par 'gyur/  'gog pad gyur pa'i sems// dam dag bdag nyid padag las smras// sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi// dbas
300a2(rgyud): ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// der ni mi bskyod rab tu bsgom/ hUM ni snying ga'i zla gnas par// bsam la sems ni de ru 'azhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil
300a3(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor// a ni snying ga'i thig ler gnas// bsam la rdo rje'i yang dag bzhag/ 'di ni dgongs pa'i mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes/ 
300a4(rgyud): 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung ba'o// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM// bsam
300a5(rgyud): na bskal pa gcig tu gnas// nam ma pa'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus dang ngags sems yi ge A// bas pa na bskal pa dag tu gnas// mkhar kyi
300a6(rgyud): dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par ni// lus dang ngag sems yi ge hUM// bsams na de ni bskal bar gnas// bcom ldan padag po rdo rje gsum// dam tshig rtogs pas de skadags
300a7(rgyud): su mtha' can gyi mi ge 'dri// sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// brjod du med cing med med la// shes dang shes bya rnam spangs pa'ang // kun rdzob la ni legs gnas nas// tshig gi sngags pa
300a8(rgyud): // rdo rje gsum kyi rdo rje can// rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyir cang ni// gang zhig klog gam sems kyang rung // rdo rje lo shes lta bur 'gyur// ji ltar gsang pa'i rgyal dbang po// dgongs pa sa
300b1(rgyud): zung sa// sangs kyis kun gyis de lung bsgo// khyod par dus byin gyis rlob// rligs sram dang ldan par ni// sras nas gang du 'jog kaur // do na songs rgyas thams cad kyi// rigs spos rgyal
300b2(rgyud): la 'gyur// khams gsum thams cad bcom nas ni// myur 'dade bzhin gshegs 'thung zhing // 'khor los snang ba'i bu bzhin du// byang chub byung du des 'thob po// 'ams gsum sru dang gas du thu
300b3(rgyud): sngags pa'i yan lag sbyar pa ri// sangs rgyas 'dus la brtan pa yis// de ni dngos po med par 'jobs// dngos pad ga cig tu rdzogs longs spyod// phung sogs yan lag don las byung // bdag shegs

300b8(rgyud): dngos med shin du dri med la// dam tshig gcig tu skur kyang re// gangar dang glu dang ril mo dang // dkod dang sngags pas rab mdzes pas// 'jig rter sangs rgyas gang mkham chis// rol po 'ding
301a1(rgyud): rab tu brnam// gzhon dus pad+mabams can no//  N+Di lta bu pa panan// gang som sams bya bya na// mung dund gyur//  yon tan rdza
301a2(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gan sa// snyun gyis grub pa'i sangs kyis 'gyur// sems can gang 'di ma thong ba dang // thos shing rigs par gyur pa ni// de'i su dus thar yi// me tog 'dra ba
301a3(rgyud): pa yin// sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di// gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes// gcig dang dus las grol ba// ten 'byung bsal bar byed pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog de// chos kyi de ni

301a5(rgyud): chos dbyings de ni gar min na// gtso bo dza ltar gar bgyid lags// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang ben gang // gsang mthon byos pas bskul ba lan// chos dbyangs de ni glu minan// gtso bo ji ltar

301b6(rgyud): / 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// de rnams gsang ba mi srung nang // sred pa yis rba sten par byed// bcom ldan 'das gsungs gsang ba ni// gsang mcho tshig gis sgrogs par byed// khyod bka' las 'das dman pa

301b8(rgyud): chu ba phen// gas skyes gzhan yang srung bar krur// mgon po de ni dang gnas shig/ nyams pa do khres dpanapa gnas mamagyur bar 'gyur/ tshigs ba s+ho las/ sa

302a3(rgyud): byed/ log pas mkhas pa'i ngargyal ni// byis pa byinas byed par 'gyur// ma yi dog pa'i ras 'di ri// sbyor bshar rnams kyi 'dom yin// den pas dang pas rjes 'jug pa// gtam dag kyang ni byed por

304b4(rgyud): spus de gyur// sprul pa bas ma mi khyab ces dben// srud pa por ni gang gyur la/ lang phul du spang ba'i ming //  rje la sogs la ga spyad/ mas can nam ni skyongs byed/  mchags sogs rjod de me/ de nyid kyi son por

304b6(rgyud): mas ni der 'jog ste// gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang // 'jig rten rnams la gsol bya dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed de// khyod kyi thal mo gnas pa yin// gang zhig sems
304b7(rgyud): canams rgyas byung // de bzhin gnyis med chom nyid nyan// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyong ba yis// thams cad sangs kyis rnams gnas so// sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do// mthong sa gsal byed thal mo yin/

305a1(rgyud): sa nga pa yin//  pa na yo da //  mi ma sa / mags pa gshin gagad rnams pa// na ga tsusas tshul ba sgom pa bya// don sa do smra

305a3(rgyud): ni dasum du 'gyur// byis pa rtog par bya ba'i phyir// de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur// 'phel byis pa'i chos rnams gang // rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnab 'byor pa// de yang shin du ldan sems can// sems can sogs la rnam pa

305a5(rgyud): sngags grub 'gyur ba/ rnam par mi tog cig shos nyid// ya yi bde sogs gnas byas te// sngags ni na nga bri bar bya// rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni// yi ge a bzhin sngon 'gro ba// so so gzhan pa'i bzhi pa ni/

321b1(rgyud): phalas skyes zhes pa gad pa yin// gong bu yang dag 'dus pa na// dadag tsam du bshad pa yin// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnams shes rnams// sangs rgyas dngos po lnga

321b3(rgyud): rje sems dpa' la zhus pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni// gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po// ngas rnams sbubs par bka' snyas 'tshal// de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang // dkyil 'khor rnams ni

321b5(rgyud): sgrubathabs ni// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// gzugs dang ska dang dridang ni// de bzhin rong rig la sogs// khams bco brgyad po dngag kyang // chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'o// de dag nyid las byung ban
321b6(rgyud): chub sems zhes shes par bya// byang chub sems las gong khri// zhang du las kyang med skyed do// yid las nas mkha' khams kyang ni// khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// dbang po phung po 'phru
321b7(rgyud): rnams// de ltar dbyengs su bsdus paste// bsdu ba ni bdun byas pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi ga ba yin// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sgrub pa yang dag spang bar bya// ji ltar ga la zhes dngos kyis/ 
321b8(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtag/ chos dbyings sprus pa pa shad nas su// rdzas brgyad lan la ga zhab pa bshad// re lu mig sman dngos grub dang // sa cho go la ka'i dngos klub dang// nam mkhar 'azhu dadang mig

341b8(rgyud): dpa' mnyes par 'gyur// sems can rnams kyang tsham zhing dga'// de bzhin rnal 'byor snying po yis// sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems// rang 'dreran nyan thos sku gzugs sogs// 
342a1(rgyud): rang nying dag pag sam sbyar bapa// phyag byas na nam sud 'gyur// kun tu rdo rje sems dpar yi// lus dag yid kya dkyil 'khor las// rang nyid bsam gtan
342a2(rgyud): sa ma sbyor pos// dbyer med bla yab ma bya'o// dkyil latsha dag kyang mi tha'o// zhugs pa mdage kyang mi klag go// mchod rtenas sa kyang yong mi bya// lhag pa'i phyag r+b+ha rnams kyang
342a3(rgyud): nyin re zhing ni dus bzhin// bu mo legs par goms pa las// gzur can dan khas blangs te// cho ga bzhin du sus 'khor mchod// ros mo'i thab pa na sna tshogs pa// de yi rgyud las rab
342a4(rgyud): bstan pas// bcu drug thig leng la sol sa// sngags kyi snying po ta gla par bya// bla mdas bathug parje ches// yang dag bstan pa la dmigs pa// byin ci log khur long sa 'dor te/ 
342a5(rgyud): bya// sgrub pos legs par shes gyur na// dngos grub cibasar 'gyur ba'o// nan mar ni tshes brgyad dang // yang na bcu bzhi gang yang rung // shing gcig du batha~Md ma mo'am// yang na mi
342a6(rgyud): meng grong bar du// sngon du sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can// phas sun 'khrul par byed par sgrug// mad mkhan ma dang sben can// gdol pa mo dang gar mkhan sog pa// mdun kyi sol lhag
342a7(rgyud): yong ba// byad dang mdang ldan ma meng ma// ma ni lum tu rgya gnyis pa sngag sa// yang na nyi su rtsa lnga'o// yang na chu nga dang 'or skyes// sbyangs nas shib ma sngags pa// yang dag blangs nyes 'ong
342b1(rgyud): gzhan yang sa zad to// sgra bzha dang mang bang ba las// dkar byedang ni spa dang// muganon ma mas 'grub bya// da dam can dan dkar ba mas// bsolas thags can dun / 
342b2(rgyud): yang dag brgyan te mdun bzhag nas// dkyil 'khor 'jig pa 'bri bya ste// ca sogs gsang sngags rab tu bkra// 'byung po'i gtor ma yang byin te// shan nag po mngangs dang ldan// myos byed bsregs
342b3(rgyud): b.ro yi nga// mtshan gcig thog thag smin sreg bya// de nas thor du dus su yang // khrag chen phyogs bzhir gtor byas nas// mar khu chen po rol bsdu// de nas rong langs gyur te// khro dang ldan
342b4(rgyud): mgar gyi// lags pa mo mo sa// de sdeb po blag saH// gas snor logs// brgya la la po bya smrab // ga na dam thag tu rjod/ 
342b5(rgyud): bsrung ba bsrung byas nas// bdag nyid mangs te de yi mgor// yungs par gyis ni brdeg par bya// de nas de ni 'bar gyur te// sgrub po yi mdun gnas ngas// bka' nod 'di skad smra bar
342b6(rgyud): byed// sems can me stong khyod ci 'dod// bdag la yang dgra bga' stsol cig/ ram gri mig sman sa rog gam// rkang mgyogasad bzhin bcud kyis len// me snang 'gugs pa la sa kang
342b7(rgyud): dag/ bdag gis gcig cig sbyar bar bya// den la sgrub 'i de yir kyang // gang 'dod smras nas cad te' bajug// de nas ro langs/ 'di nas// dul ba brdum zhed me 'bar ba// de nas sprul nag// 
342b8(rgyud): ru // bag pa nam 'byung bar byed// dede sgrub pa sa kham zang // byung stegs pa kyi mam zer gyur// de thog pa tshangs pa'i 'jig tan khams// steng du nges par 'grib // 
343a1(rgyud): bzhin kun tu 'gro bar byed// de bzhin rdzas kun gang la bstar// thams cad gsar 'gyur rtsa lta bu// da bzhin zab mgru bde bya na// ba po bzhin 'gyur
343a2(rgyud): te// dpe ba skyer sreg rab byas nas// dkyilal khor yang dag tshim par bya// de bam 'ang ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ den kun yang dag 'grub byed pa// las thams cad kyi mtsho'o ste// bcom
343a3(rgyud): ldan rdo rje sems dpa sa gzungs// dpapa rdorjesnying po rgyan kyi rgyud las ro langs chen ma le'u ste bcug sam pa'o// / de na yas mab po yi// dngos ka' gro'ad
343a4(rgyud): pas byung phyir// rgyud rnams kun las gsungab pa yi// slob dpon paskur ba'i cho ga bshad// slob dpon med par gyur na ni// dngas grub thob par me 'bya bas/ 
343a5(rgyud): ngas dang mtshan nyid ni// yid gcig bsdus la brtan par rjes// dam sdom g+ha ni sdod gcang la// slobang pon mtshan nyid yangs rdzogs pa pa/ b+hang ca dang po las 'jag par/ 
343a6(rgyud): dang chu yi slob dpon no// re bo 'dzin pa spel byed cing // de yi srab po zhing dag cing // ye shes sgyu ma'i snong ma byed// chen gyi dral dpa' chen pa'o// lhan cig 'an par ga gyur pa/ 
343a7(rgyud): sa dga' ga yang dag thob// thob pas yang dag rab mthar phyin// lhan meg/ byed pa'i slob da// ma 'gyur thams sa da sa /

343b1(rgyud): can// shin tu rgyun gyis 'chan pa// dang ldan sbyar ba la gams pa// gzugs bzang 'dod chags kyis myos byed// shin tu dul 'khyad par na// bskung bar gnas pra ya
343b2(rgyud): dgra blangs// dag dang bsgom pa la dbyung ba// rtag tu thams gum par// slob mas rnam 'di ltar blta// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'ching // de bzhin gshegs

344a3(rgyud): gnyer du dgum bde phyir// mdun du 'gro ba nyes mi 'gyur// debs tha' ma ni thams cad kyis// rdo rje 'dzin pa bla ma mchog/ rjes su mthun pas mnyes par bya// de mnyes sangs rgyas

348a2(rgyud): tu dag 'das bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la legs so ni ma gsol te/ legs so legs so pang byang \u0f7f// legs so legs so ye shes che// legs so leg pa sa bdeb rtse/

348a6(rgyud): chags dang / dU bajam sa/  dang / dpal la shes ldan pas brdzu pa/ dpal 'jam pa dul rgya'atshal lo// did /

348a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ro mnyam mtshig rdo rje nyid// me phyed ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni// sems dpa' chen po byams pa
348b1(rgyud): bo&ka/ rnam sa kyi nug shing gsal btab de// den su bcom ldan 'das thun pa ga pa dang sa pas byung dang // sam zhes 'gye ba ltar lags// de skad capa na gsal ba dang // bcom par/ 
348b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// snga gsung thugs nyid rdo rjes// bdag nyid rgya gyi ba ka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bla rnams legs nyan cig/ ye shes gsum ni rdo rje las// byang sems rdo rje de bzhin
348b3(rgyud): nyid// yang dag 'byung ba de yi phyir// ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin ni// de yi don ni 'di lta ste// ye shes gsum ni dag pa'i sems snang ba gsum gyi 'byung gnas rdo rje las mi phyed pa rlung rig tha ma dang du
348b4(rgyud): nas pa nyid de/ byang chub sems ni kun rdzob don dam dbyer med pa ste/ rdo rje de bzhin nyid ni gdong ma nas rgyun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid las yang dag par 'byung ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo dang / 
348b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'byung zhing 'jug la gnas pa de'i phyir na/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye shes rdo rje rlung sems dbyer med thogs pa med pas khyab cing
348b6(rgyud): dbang byed pa nyid do// deng zhin gshegs pa kun byed gings pa ni// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa nyid// mngon par byang chub nyid las rab 'byung ba// rlung ngeg dbyer med pa la sa dus kun
348b7(rgyud): // snang ba gsum du shar bya 'gag pa med// de nyid lhan cig skyes par rab rtogs bya// yang dag don ni babapa ste// rdo rje ngo bo yang dag bshad kyi don la ni/ gsang ba yang dag byang chub
348b8(rgyud): daco nyigs ga'ang bar 'gyur ra ga gi/ sbyo med ba dag 'a ma so khye ba mnyam nyi nga sas ma rtogs sa ded byang rgya rkyen las/ shes pa ma ga nyid ni// 'byung gnas thogs
349a1(rgyud): mtha' ma med// de las sman skyes ma reg pa// nye bar thob pa dngom med pa// bdag med thams cad snying po las// snang mdapal ba ma 'gag pas// rim pa ma ldan
349a2(rgyud): 'char ba yang // zab pa stong chen por 'byung ba'o// ma rig pa las chen snang ba// snang ba thob pa mi rtog pa// de las rang bzhin sems las byung // de las snang ba mched pa ste// shin tu
349a3(rgyud): gsal zhing stong pa che// sems las 'byung ba'i rgyan dag ni// rgyu dang mig yul dbang po dang // mtshungs pa'i de ma thag pa las// sems zhes bya bar 'byung ba ste// de ni snang ba'i don dang ni
349a4(rgyud): stong pa nyid du gsungs pa yin// sems ni don la gnas pa ste// sems byang bye brag rnam par ston// ma rig de nyid chos nyid de// chos nyid bdag nyid mi gnas pas// snang dang stong

354b1(rgyud): 'ang dag rig dang ma 'dras chos// stabs bcu ma 'jigs pa na dang 'thung ba meng// ma rgyan 'argyas pad tsun rgyab ma // oM ba brtan namo snang dang snying po ma oM// phung po khams dang su mchod
354b2(rgyud): ca ni// b+ha yi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dang du'o// yid don sna dang bsnyad du ma rnams// brtags pa med ste sna tshogs chen gyur las// rgyu 'bras rab byed snga mar snang ba kun// 'jig rted rig byed
354b3(rgyud): bton byed sgra ldan pa'o// 'dod chags chos kyi sbas pa zhes bya ba// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyar las// sna tshogs dga' ba dang po rjes chags dang // rnam par smin pa mchog tu bde ba nyid// 
354b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid bral ba skad cig lhan cig skyes// bde ba mi 'gyur ye shes phyag rgya che// rnam par nyid padaga' bral rjes la'o// nga nyid snying po bla med byang chub sems// bde stong dbyer med byang chub chen po'o// 
354b5(rgyud): kun du byang sems ye shes mes spangs pas// zag med bde bas lul sems rnam dag pa'o// 'jig rten kun du brtan pa sna tshogs pa// de rten 'byung ba 'dus pa'i ri rab dang // gzhal med khang sogs dngos po
354b6(rgyud): khrul las snang // brten pa 'gro brgyang 'ams gsum sems can kun// sgyu ma lta bur skye zhing 'gag par 'gyur// 'khor ba yul dang dbang ba rtog par byung // de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa
354b7(rgyud): pas// baT+wAMg byed yang dag kun rdzob lam bstan pas// dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa lal log das// rang bzhin bden don rtogs pas byang chub pa// 'od gsal ba yid nyid ni// shes pa spyi ye khyud
354b8(rgyud): sa// dalas sems dem bcom pa// gnas lugs phyogs sus spang bas// de yang rtog med chos nyid kye// snang ba gsum du mdod par grang // sral dang lus ca gnas skabs las/

355a2(rgyud): gan pa dogs pa snang ci A// dz+nyAn drung sems dbyer yo pas// dusags ma das mi na cigs/  badrung gis bskyed// rkyen pa tshan sa chos su snang // nan
355a3(rgyud): zag sa pas// de shes de nyid zil ba dang //  lagrub pa lam kyad par du// dge dang mi dge sa tshogs las// mau lhaganas sa gyur ba la// la mas nyon panges pag cag

355a5(rgyud): bu'i ngang las ni// nam mkha' lta bu'i tshe 'bru la byung // de nyid skye med rang bzhin las// 'gag pa med par gnas pa'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste// de nyid bdag med chos nyid las// smos
355a6(rgyud): med dang mo dang dngos med kyi// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gnas med pa'o// rgyar nig rib bzhin du gnas pa la// bkang byed go rib 'chol ba 'khong mo brtad// dam tshig kun lnga phyag rgya snang
355a7(rgyud): // kun dor 'byung lnga lha po rdo rje dbyings// bde chen rdo rje gsang ba phun sum tshogs// de nyid mi 'khrur 'byung gnas sem gyur gang // skad sa rgyan rdzogs bus pa gang bltar// bdud rtseg na

355b1(rgyud): bye brag la reg pa 'jug pas blang ba snang ba'o// byam pa 'phag par pa/ sbas pa'i don gang lag la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ kun rdzab 'don pas sbas pa na gang du snang bcung ma pus pa snang du

368a1(rgyud): rdzas nga nyis mi tog da marnam / spros tha na pa na s+ho// ye shes yongs sa pa sa medas// dam

368a3(rgyud): ge gnas dag pa// ro hang srog rtsol drang nges khyad par gsang // steng gar 'brulnga rtsa ba 'bru lnga lhung ba dge/ dgongs bshad dun lnga shes byed lam spyang pa'o// dgongs min A l-i gsung dbyangs/ 
368a4(rgyud): ldan lag gnas// de nyid ces rnams bdag med smra sgrogs pa// A le kA li d+hag lan mtshan beni// de bzhin ska las can sras blan med// de bzhini min sna bcug nas rdo rje dbyings// gas
368a5(rgyud): po bsdus pa bangs bshad nyid// thog pa par dang mtha' mar dge ba'i chos// bre med mi zad nam pa thams cad du// rab bye mngon bsgrub tog pa phrin las tshogs// grub sted gnas las je
368a6(rgyud): bzhin sgrar 'byung ston// phyir mi bzlog pa bral dang mtha' las 'das// khyad par brda las zab pa snying po'i don// rgyal ba'i spyod yul tha snyed las grol ba// ji bzhin ma yin smra zhes rnam par
368a7(rgyud): bsgrags// dus gzhan la dgongs pa ni drang ba'i don to// gang bag gzhan la dgongs pa ni drang ba'i don to// mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa ni nges pa'i don to// don gzhan la dgongs pa ni nges pa'i don to//

368b4(rgyud): oM pa~M ma yA ga yang ba nyid// rgyud sgri ba dang byibs sgra dang rgyas 'debs te// kun rdzob nga gzhan 'dag byin rnyeb pa las// rmel ma sna mam mtshan pa bar dro snang // sems gsung stong nyid mi shes smras panyis

369a2(rgyud): rdo rtse las sbyar// ngag ni rlung sngags gnyis med sbyong ba las// tsaswa~M shes sems nyid kyang ba gsam smras pa// bde ba'i lam gyis sbas pa dga' babani// ye shes chen pa ma pa rigs
369a3(rgyud): ye shes 'byung gnas nyid ni skad cig bzhi// mthar thug de khon nyid 'od gsal ba// de la brten pas lam myur bgrod pa ste// rang 'byung zhi gnas
369a4(rgyud): lhag mthong ngo mnyam pa// zung 'jug mi 'gyur byang chub sems dang// lam mthar phyin pa ldan grub ji ba nyid// brjod 'das rgya chen po yang de nyid do// maM baM lngas ni khyu tshogs lnga ldan

375a4(rgyud): rje sgrogasum nam dag pas// mi slob zung 'jug mngon du gyur// de nyid mthar phyin bu med pa'o// dpal ye shes rdo sun las bsdus nga las/ rab du byed pa nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas dpal
375a5(rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// bsam gtan gnyis kyis ye shes 'jug/ de yi khyad par bcas pa bstan// rig pa 'dzin pa lnga grub pa// rnal 'byor dngos grub thob
375a6(rgyud): bshad// 'bru ga sum bdud rtse ril bu yi// yon tan nub pa myur grub byed// rdo rje dgug pa'i phrin las dbang // ngan tshig sha lnga'i yon tan tshul// de las dngos grub dbang phyug 'thob/ 
375a7(rgyud): mngon sur 'bras bu phrin las 'brug/ de ni bsnyedan bsgrub lan mig pazhi// rdorje rnam bzhi lha ye sku// lus dben rdo rje bzlas pa dang // snang gsum sku lus 'od gsal ba// so sor bsdus
375a8(rgyud): sam gtan lam// srog rtsol 'dzin pa de bzhin nyid// rjes dran yan lag ting 'dzin spobs// bung 'jug rim pa bsta dang las// rigal kye cha la sa de nyid gnas// rtswa rkyen lam dang dus 'phra
375b1(rgyud): gang // mngon byar lha stangs spyod yul kun// rims kyis 'char dang rtsig ca ga// de nyid pod gal martogs bya// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas lam dang de// yang dor dngos grub 'byung lam dang // sgo
375b2(rgyud): brlab pa de rje li// sngon 'am phyi dus 'grub par gyur// bsam gtan gnas pa dbang po thabs// yul nyid shes rab ting nge 'dzin// dbyer mad sbyor ba gsang gnas te// dus gsum las 'ad rtog pa'o// 
375b3(rgyud): ma shes de ched gang la ba las// ma 'gags bul rjes mi 'gang zhed// mi g.yo nyon mongs pa sa dag pa// rnam par spyod pa bye brag gsal// rnam par mi rtog dmigs med pa// mi 'khrul lus
375b4(rgyud): ma pa med// tshor ba las 'das dga' ba nyid// 'phro ba med pas sems gnas pa'o// zug rngu'i rdul mang rnam 'che dag/ sgo gsub dang du ngul zhing ni// bde ba zag med chos nyid gnas// 
375b5(rgyud): 'dung bral med par gyur pas so// rab tu rdul ba rnam shes tshogs// dag gyur shes bya chos kyi khams// mad cing gzung yidzin rnam dag pas// stong nyid ye shes rtse gcig pa// rnam pa kun tu mi ldog
375b6(rgyud): pas// mtshan ma med pa byang chub pa'o// snang ba pol la stong pa nyid// mchod ba stod cher gyur ba ste// sna ma thams cad stong ba dag// ter po ba thams cad stong pa nyid// dag pa rang gas
375b7(rgyud): chog gyur pas// rogacig gyu ga gas 'byung dang // dkyus pazlog togs tshogs gi bste// sangs kyis kun dngos 'jig rten lam// de nyid mchog tu bstan pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa
375b8(rgyud): bdag ny-id la la// rkyen las 'byung ba la mgyur pa// rnam 'byo nas sa dang ma rtog sa/ 'da'i byed / sbyangasalag// gdas la phul pas na// phre panasum gyur/ 
376a1(rgyud): / kun dong gnang sdom las// mi 'byung brtan byed yon tan thob// lus gnas rtsa yi pho brang las// g.yas pa'i nyi ma rtsol ba ste// g.yon ba zlab srog bcing pa// 'byung 'dra
376a2(rgyud): na rnams na /  rgya na / na sa ga pa sbyid phyu// ma na pa k+She/  / pa// ga pa ldan
376a3(rgyud): gtan 'dzin// gsang ba'i sna rtse'i steng 'og tu// 'byung ba rkyen drung snang ba grogs// rdolnga bzlog las gnas par bya// ye shes sgron me snang bste// rnal 'byor gang zhig mngon gyur pas/ 
376a4(rgyud): sems rnam dag rtags 'tsha ring // yang na 'tsho tshal la 'thob 'gyur// de las rang bzhin dag pa'i cha// 'od gsal dpalas spro bsdu nyid// dbu ma'i kham nas 'jug par 'gyur// bde ba'i thig
376a5(rgyud): rlabs dang ni// ye shes me ni shes rab cha// gnyis med du tI'i nang zhugs pas// bdud rtsi mi 'pho gsang ma gnas// de nyid du ni srog brten cing // 'dzin pa ye shes lam gyur pa'o// de las
376a6(rgyud): mo 'bar byar zhing // las rlung gyen log lte bar byin// ho la sa bdud rtsi 'bar 'jug gyur// mgrin par dga' ba steng gar ne// mchog dga' stel kyad par cad// gsang bar mi ldog lha cig
376a7(rgyud): skyes// mcho tu mi 'gyur 'jo pa'o//  nyi ye shes rjes dran gcis// lus pa/ yid dang ye shes ni// phyog 'dide nyid mngon kyang ban// shes pa dag ninam dag pa// lte bar 'dod cha
376a8(rgyud): pad// snying gang gnyid me teg pa'o// mgrin par mi ma ma shes pa dag/ dpral bar mad 'i shes pa spangs// las rlung rtsa'i 'khor lo yi// thig leng gnas brten dang ni// brten pa
376b1(rgyud): sems mi 'gyur thob// las kyi thang po log gyur cing // mnyam pa den pal la grug/ gtsug tu tsu byung bus// 'phags kyad brtan pa na thob pas// yon tan dpag med mngon du
376b2(rgyud): 18// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang du spang // de nyid yon tan phrin las chog sa// tog me dang las rkun tu 'byung // skad cig mngon rdzogs zung 'jug pa// ting
376b3(rgyud): 'od/ nas brjod pa ste// gsang chen gnas 'thob mngon sangs rgyas// dpal ye shes rdo kun las bsdus pa / ra tu byed pa nyi shus bdun pa'o// / de nas ye shes kun mkhyen pa'i/ 
376b4(rgyud): gsang ba rab 'byam 'grub pa ste// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa sa/ khang dag sbyor ba'i don gyis ni// thigs med nus pa ldan gyur pa// bden pa gnyis pa shes don bstan pa'o// phrin las pa
376b5(rgyud): skyed pa las// grub tshul de nyid bstan pa'o// bzlas thabs bcu yis grub pa'i don// sngags rnams kun gyi de nyid kyis// lam rdzogs sa rnams mngon gyur pa sa// bdag byin brlab byar gyur
376b6(rgyud): pa'o// tshe 'de nyid dang bar dor ni// ye shes dngos grub thob par bshad// gong du 'pho ba'i don grub byed// bcu bdun lha yi 'khor lo las// grub pa rab gsal bde thob pa'o// mtshon
376b7(rgyud): 'bras bu mngon grub na// mtshon byed nus pa thogs med 'byung // gsal bya gsal byed tu 'bras dang // bskyed bya snyed byed chu 'bras so// ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu 'bras las// rgyus ni 'bras bu skyed
376b8(rgyud): dpam// 'bras bu rgya las 'byung bas na// san chud snyom pa'i rgyu 'gras so// ngo ba gcig par grub 'gyur te// rgyu 'bras rnam pa tha dad kyang // rigs mthud gnas nyid mtshungs 'bral ba sa/ 
377a1(rgyud): // grub sde gcig par grub pa'o// rgyu 'bras ma sus ted 'brel ta// de nyid nam mkha'i dzim nyid// stong nyid dngos po sna tshogs par// gnas kyang ngo mnyam 'gag pa med/ 
377a2(rgyud): rjes rnams snang ba ma lus la// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang las 'byung // ni phyogs dang ni sdang phyogs da// skye 'gag nyid dngos med pas// bden gnyis tha dang sbyar pa na/ 
377a3(rgyud): shes la ma ni don med 'gyur// gsal stong gnyis ni tha dad na// rtag ched mthar ni lung bar 'gyur// dngos po'i gnas lugs la brten nas// dngos med ye shes 'od gsal ba// 
377a4(rgyud): dang rgya che gnyis med pa// rgyu rkyen ma lus dag byed pas// bsam gtan ting 'dzin mthar thug ni// rdo rje lta bu'i ngom nyid// dngos po thams cad zlog byed pa// shing gi tshogs pa
377a5(rgyud): 'angang bas// bsregs te dngos med 'byung ba ltar// mthar ni thams cad stong nyid du// ye shes mes ni rnam par sbyangs// nam mkha' lta bu'i dbyings las ni// ye shes zi
377a6(rgyud): 'gag med 'byung // dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan lus kyi rnam shes dang // ye she
377a7(rgyud): 'phrul la sogs bstan// lha ma bzhi dang khro bo btu// sna tshogs phrin las dum mchog/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don du'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// phye nang dbyeng rim pa
377a8(rgyud): pa grub spogs pa'i cho ga ni// phur gdab de nyid bstan pa'i// 'dod pa'i khams na 'gro ba kun// ram tog rlung ger bar chud// bdag 'dzin mdud pas bsams pa la// 
377b1(rgyud): ye shes la ma rtogs pa// tha ma'i zham las shes par bya// pad+ma 'das brgyad bshad pa la// so bdun lags dmigs pa// bcu drug cha dang ldan pa'o// drod de snang ba rten bral sems/ 
377b2(rgyud): spangs thob yon tan 'byung ba'i gzhi// rtse mo mchod pa nus pa rnyed// 'jigs pa las grol brtan par 'gyur// bzod pa snang ba thob pa nyid// rtog pa kun las rnam par grol// chos mchog
377b3(rgyud): nyer tho ba nyid// ye shes de ma thag pa che// de la gnon rten 'brel phyogs cha 'char// rigs pa mngon kyar rtog pa 'dug/ de nyid 'khor 'das yon tan thob// gzung 'dzed cha 'das las dkur/ 
377b4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs par bya// dpal ye shes de 'akun las bsdus pa las ra du byed pa nyi shurtsa dgu pa'o// spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ye shes kyi grub pa ba don bstan pa'i byor/ 
377b5(rgyud): gnas dben pa yon tan kun dang ldan pa/ lus gnas sems kyi du bakhrod par tu sgrub pa nyid du b+ha ba ste/ dngos 'dzin rnam par dag pa nyid dkyis so// blo na can ni tog med pa'i zha la rol pa nyid do// da pa
377b6(rgyud): sal dag pa pa / sa d+hag ma shes kyi rang las ni 'da' ba bsgrub po'o// rigs gas ba y-i she la gas smras / rnam pas rgyas sna chub pa zhe bcu phrag gnyis ma nga/ 
378a1(rgyud): ngos /  yang na 'od ma pa'i segs pa ga she langs pa segs cad yo sa zung ba da // rgyun rnamasan tham pa dang rnam par sbed pa mams 'phags
378a2(rgyud): bar bsgom nges pa'o// kyi ldaldan na// dbazhin dkyil lakhyo/ dpral ba mgri pa dgas ga ste ba gsang bdang bcas par sangs rgyas kyi rgyu mdzad
378a3(rgyud): dang / sgra mdug phyag mtshan rgyan dang ldan pa/ ye shes las 'byung ba skad cig gis so// der rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gsang sngags kyi rnam par bsam pa'i 'khor lo can gyi gas ba mi shes kye ba
378a4(rgyud): pa ste/ bde stong gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen por ngog nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchod pa'i gnas/ chad med pas yang dag par mchod pa/ dmigs pa rnam par gyur pa'i nyams kyi ting nge 'dzin pa / 
378a5(rgyud): dpal ye shes rdo kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa sum su pa'o// de nyid la lagasang ba blan med pa'i bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs rtsed ldan zhes pa ste/ klu rdo rje se
378b1(rgyud): gzung rdo rdza lagag ya ga/ thugs rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de nyin kya mi byed pa kyi thob/ dang de / nags pa thamasas dadang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdun rna
378b2(rgyud): snang bar mdzad pa/ rdorje 'chang chen po/ sku'i 'od kyi snang ba las/ spro ba dang bsdu bar mdzad pa'i phyir yod par chen po rang chen po/ spo ba dang bsdung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rol pa ston
378b3(rgyud): pa'o// yang de nyid du rig ma'i rigs dag pas so// ye shes bsgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ bram ze mo la sogs pa ste/ rdo rje rigs kyi me sha can lta bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
378b4(rgyud): rigs la ni/ btso blag mkhan te dngos po thams cad ye shes su bsgyur bar byed pa'o// yang na bram ze zhes pa ste/ sdig pa'i dri mas mgos pa'o// rgyal rigs ni rin po che'i rigs la te/ ye shes 'bar
378b5(rgyud): ba'i che ba dang ldan pa'o// rje rigs ni pad+ma can la te/ chags pa med pa'o// rdo rje chos kyi rigs chags pa med pa pad+ma'i 'dam las thon pa lta bur bsgrub pa nyid do// yang na gar mkhan gyi rigs kyis kun tu
378b6(rgyud): sbyar bar byed pas/ 'di ni ye shes bde chen gsang ba ye shes myur du thob par byed pa nyid do// yang na pad+ma'i rigs kyi rig ma lnga bu 'am/ gtum pa ma rnam rtog cad nas gcod pa dag gam/ khyad par du rdo rje sems
378b7(rgyud): dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ snying ga'i gnas su spong ba dang snying rje na mi dad pa/ byang chub rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ reg ma ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ sems
378b8(rgyud): dpal mr-i t+pa pa la chu'i drims ma gos pa dang mtshungs pa/ bco brag ma khan thams cad la mashes du sbyar bar byed pa nyid de/ sang po rgyas kyi ye shes dang mtshungs pa dag ni/ brten bsgrub pa mnyam dzes ka
379a1(rgyud): su ma pas rab tu grub pa'i dbang phyug 'jeb pa'o// dpal la shes rdo kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu sa gcig pa 'o// yang nimaso pa pa ma
379a2(rgyud): 'byor bstan pa las ni/ dam pa gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni/ thabs rlung gi sbyor ba dang / shes rab rig stong nyid spros med lhan cig skyes pa rang 'byung ro mnyam bde ba chen po'i sbyar bas ye shes la
379a3(rgyud): gar gyi nyams kyi spyod pa thams cad 'od gsal ba'i rang las/ zung 'jug bde 'a chen por phrin las thams cad brtsam par bya ba'o// di na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems
379a4(rgyud): 'da' bar mi bya bas 'da' bar dka' ba skye phan yon ni sdu gsung thugs gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes dang ldan pa de ni skad cig de ma thag tu yang / dpal rdorje 'chang byang chub sems pa/ dang phrin
379a5(rgyud): thami dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyis cheg go// de rdza tsam nus pa rdo ni/ sgyu sas dag pa thabs mi byed pa/ nye ma ni sdang ba dang snang ba mched pa'i thalas nub pa snang ba thob pa las
379a6(rgyud): khyad par du rang bzhin gyi rtog pa thams cad/ rtsa ro brkyang gnyis rlung dang shes pa dbyer med du bsdus nas/ rtsa ngan ma ye shes kyi dang du/ spang blang med par nub pa chen po nyid de/ de nyid du na
379a7(rgyud): kha' rnam par dag pa lta bu'i bde stong dbyer med 'od gsal chen po rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngang du gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de las slob pa'i zung 'jug tu ldang bas/ skya reng shar bsta rnga ste/ ma
379a8(rgyud): ye shes dus gsum phyogs bcur khyab pa'i skad cig pa'i khyad pas la/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyed pa nyid du grang pa'o// khyad par sku lus rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i phyir
379b1(rgyud): ma pa/  can ma nang la ldan mtshom jim ldan na/ na mam bdun da ldan pas/ gnas rnams su phags pa no
379b2(rgyud): gas chen pa ca na gyis skas pa gyun pa / thugasas yin lan na 'dus bya 'i 'dod yang ga gru pa / dbang phyug na/  ga can me pa tu gabs nyid // 
379b3(rgyud): pa mtshan par 'dzin pa rnam pa cad rnam par 'dzin pa rnam par dag par/ sgyum mo gnas par bstan pa'i dod du/ de ni rjes kyi bdag ces med med pa'i byang chub sems las byung ba mchis med
379b4(rgyud): chen po// bIr mi ldog pa'i gnas thob pa/ dag pa'i sal gnas par 'gyur ba ne/ sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ snang ba gsum po rang bzhin dang bcas pa/ thams cad dag pas bad/ 
379b5(rgyud): kyis brdan pa'i rib son pas/ lum ciganas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par 'grod pas/ rten dang brten par byed kyis brlabs par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ rgyal po dpung ged ma tshig 'dzid ni/ thog
379b6(rgyud): byed pa'i ye shes kyis phrin las yon tan mi zad pa stob sa dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i dbang phragadapa pa brgyad la sogs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos spob la dbang bsgyur ba/ kun gyi mcho da med
379b7(rgyud): yon du ra ba'o// mngod par byang chub rnam gnyis las// phyi nang gnyis su dgos pa bshad// nang gi dus te mo 'phrul bstan// bdud pas num par rgyal ba ste// rdo rje no gsum so so nga// 
379b8(rgyud): gyi mngon chub//  rangs mi sra lung jug ste// phru ba ni cig tu 'dus pa so// skad cag ye shes ma grol ba'o// dpal ye shes dor kun las bsdus lal sa
380a1(rgyud): / gnyis pa'o// / de las mngon par byang chub ba 'deb chen po'i dasang phyug bstan pa'i bye// do napa 'byo pa sa rdo rje rgyab kyi byad pa sa ban pa/ rig ma mngon par 'du bya ba las/ 
380a2(rgyud): mkha' gsang byin rlabs dang ldan pas/ thabs dang thabs la la 'byung ba'i rdo rje chos 'byung pad+mang nub pas/ shes rab rtse 'bru rgyam par zla ba dang nyi ma ro mnyam par gyur pas/ snang ba dang snang
380a3(rgyud): mched pa dang snang ba thob pa dang / nye bar thob pa nub pa can gyi ye shes kyi bsgrub pa kun tu brtsam pa'o// 'od gsal ba'i ye shes thog ma dang mthar 'byung ba nyid kyis rang bzhin rnams
380a4(rgyud): kun 'da' du ma cid rnam par dag pa'o// skya rengs 'char ba'i cha ni mkha' snang dag pa'i ngang du ye shes 'jug pa dang bzlog par gyur pas/ stong pa bzhi las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchog ste
380a5(rgyud): kun tu byang chub sems 'phel ba las/ rkyen rig pa'i stobs kyi gas sen pa pas yan du mig le 'phel zhi pa las/ dga' ba'i rdu marnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig ma dang / 
380a6(rgyud): da dus su rnam par smin pa'i khyang par gyi dga' ba'i dus su rnam par nye ba nyid do// skad ceg sa ga rgyas las 'das pa'i sa des zag sa las/ lhan cig byis pa'i bzha' bu las ma tshan nyid tha
380a7(rgyud): cigs ma na nas/  so chemanyam tsho sa ngo ga'i / da rjes su dag pa tha dped pa'i
380a8(rgyud): rgyan rnams don gyi rgyan ye shes kyi che ba bsam mi khyab tu 'char la/ rnam
380b1(rgyud): nags so gros rjo tshogs kyib blang par kyang ma /  khrims da / byang chub la ba rje'i srin las/ phung go sasas dang bye ma ched
380b2(rgyud): tsho phral dpag tu myed pa skad bye gartson pa'i mar bar 'gyur ba'o//  che bcan pa zlan sum chod ni/ dab yongs na/ gangal bstsu / matog pa cos kyi su bye me mad na / 
380b3(rgyud): / sbyin pas thogs pa med pa sa bas rab tu rnas pa'o// da / dan na shegs pa'i zhi pa 'ams cad med pa'i snga chen pos kun tu byas pa sprob cu'i mdza
380b4(rgyud): ston pa'o// de las dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni/ thabs snying rje cher po bran med pa ni shes rab rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i spyong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med du gyur
380b5(rgyud): ba'o// sangs rgyas na ba mas cadas pa 'i thob rag chub ni ngan pa mi shes thags san pa'o// gar bani sems 'amams cad dang bral ba nanyis med chu 'dun che / 
380b6(rgyud): mngan du gyur pa sus bcu gsum pa'i dbang phyug dam pa'o// nye bar bsgrub la ga mal pa ste/ rdo can de dag pa'i sna mas la gnas pa ste/ oM slob pa'i zung 'dug la ma thams cad mthar byin lnga 'od/ 
380b7(rgyud): dus su 'du bcom ste/ byang chus sems pa brjid du bying 'dus 'thob ches thob papa le gas chen po sa pa'i gnas grub pa'o// khongs shin du rnam par dag pa'i grub pa/ ye shes rab mi 'a// 
381a1(rgyud): / ga/ gtsug ton chen po tu rdzogs pa 'ad nga rten pa ma shegs blad med 'ayob pa'o// byashang na ci 'ad cheg/ za ste dbyings kying 'bu mi shes ngomanyam
381a2(rgyud): pas dngos grub ma zad pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa/ rdorjesku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba byang chub chen po rab tu rtogs pa'i skad cig gcig rdo rje 'chang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon
381a3(rgyud): yang dag par gsungs pa phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa ste/ dgongs pa bshad pa'o// dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu so gsum pa'o// 
381a4(rgyud): chos thams cad ni snum dang mtshungs pa// snum lta bur spyod cing 'jug ba nyid/ sgyu ma de dag byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa la sa/ ma dag pa las rnam dag lha'i sku// lus dag yid dgasum
381a5(rgyud): phung po khams dang skye mched 'byung sogs rnams// shes pa gnyis la de nyid yongs su bsdus nas// gang zhig stong chen gnyid log gyur pa ste// rlung gi byed pas rmi
381a6(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// rmi lam yul las bye brag 'khrug par snang // kun tu rtog pa'i rgyu 'bras rmi lam rtog/ gang gis mtshan dang nyin du gnyid 'jug pas// gnyid log sad pa tha dad gyur pa min// 
381a7(rgyud): bsgribs pas rab tu ring gnyid log/ sngar byas 'bras bu ma smin las rnams kun// de nas rlung gis las rnams 'byung 'jug 'gyur// sngon las smin par gyur na rlung sems dag/ 'jig rten 'pho
381a8(rgyud): bganas gzhan dag du 'gro/ ji ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// de li sku la rkang dus sha khrag med// sems can don du khams la 'jug par mdzad// sprul pa sgyums 'dred
381b1(rgyud): madron du gyur bci yang med// de phyir rang sems stong nyid cho 'phrum yin// bla mar snang ba 'khrul pa las pazlog bya// cir snang med bdag rtogs par bya// sel ma de nyid rtog med rang gas la pa/ 
381b2(rgyud): chung ba 'i gnas la khams 'das snang ba gang // sas btsun tum su mes nod tshigs le// rlung gis yang ning gso byed mi brtan pa'o// nam mkha' la 'dus lus bde nyams pa rang ba// bdud mi
381b3(rgyud): sernas pa 'byung ba ste// gtses zhes sanyamag nyid// gzung chags byed nas rgyam skyed/ tshogs las kyis phrag dog 'a / sa gyu dmigs pas min
381b4(rgyud): por gyur ba sems nyid laso// chos nyid sems khrus khabs gsum snang bas// gzhan pa med ci drung bas khams gsum sdug/ skulas ma na rjes pa banyin thong // khams ga
381b5(rgyud): dag bdag nyid de bzhin nyid// rjes su rtogs pa 'bring gis chos rnams kun// sgyu ma rmilam lta bur 'char ba dang // rab kyi nam mkha' lta bur rtogs pa ni// 'od gsal ba la bsam gtan ting 'dzin
381b6(rgyud): e su rtogs pa shin tu ra'agyur pas// yid bzhin nor du lta bur rtogs pa nyid// drang 'jug mngon du byung ba'i don nyid de// ngo bo nyid las 'bad med gzhan don du// rtog med mig sa spun grub tu pa
382a1(rgyud): dpal ye shes do kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu so bzhi pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi// 'a
382a2(rgyud): 'byung ba bla med pa// gsang chen dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o// sku gsung thugs rdzi rdo rje yis// yab yu ma rol pa gsang ba yi// 'og yin gnas nas 'dir gshegs pa// byin rlabs ye shes dbab par bye
382a3(rgyud): de ni rdo rje chen po yi// dbang bskur ye shes gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor lus kyi gnas rnams su// spyi bo lte ba dpral ba dang // mgrin pa snying ga gsang bar ni// bder gshegs rdo rje chen po yi// las
382a4(rgyud): phyi rang gsang ba la// gnyis med rol pas dbang bskur ba// bde chen ye shes mi 'gyur ba'i// gsang chen dbang ni dri med pa'o// gsang ba rdo rje theg pa yi// sdom pa gsang ba rgyas gdab pa// rig
382a5(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa'i snying pon// yang dag sdom pa bstan pa'i// rlung sems 'gyur ldog dus gnad 'gyur ba nyid/ rlung sems gcig tu gnas sam tha dad 'gyur// gal te dang sems gcig tu su
382a6(rgyud): ldan na// thog mar sngon du gang yin pa// 'gro 'ong rim pa bzhin du byed 'gyur na// sngon du 'gro ba gang yin de rjes sa// 'brangs las gang gang byed pa gang de
382a7(rgyud): // ma sor byed na gcig pa'i khyad par nyams// gcig tu byed na snga phyi med par 'gyur// rlung 'gag nan rtog pa 'gag me 'gag/ gal te rtog pa gazlog par gyur pan// rlung gis las ni ltar byed par
382a8(rgyud): ra// 'byung badrung dang rang bzhin rtog pa dag/ mnyam du 'byung 'jug byed dam mi byed brtag/ sreg ste rlung dang rnam shes gang yin pa// phyi rol 'byung ba'i rlung ni 'gag pa na// sris can rnams kyi srog kyang lag
382b1(rgyud): ASh+Ta/  na na nasas/ ka na shan gru /  can/ na ga gsas ma pa/ ra
382b2(rgyud): par rtogs par bya// rlung sems 'gro srog gi gnas lugs bstan pa'o// rtag tu ma byin len pa ni// yon tan ye shes phrin las kun// dus med par ni nus pas blang // rnam rtog ltung byed ma lus pa// 
382b3(rgyud): shes pas rtsa ba bcad// chos rnams skye mchi la ma ltar// gsang ba bde chen grub pa la// rmang byung ba de chen 'dod chags nyid// shes pas rang bzhin med par sba// rdo rje 'dzin par gnas par spyad// bzlog
382b4(rgyud): ldan nyid ye shes che// log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// sdom pa thabs dang shes rab dag/ gnyis med phyag rgya chen por na// dus kun tu ni de nyid sdom// sdom pa thams cad kyi gsang ba cil gnon rdo rje shes
382b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin spyod pa'i brtul zhugs so// rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum 'dus nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor pa thim 'gyur// de gnyis sku gsung thugs rdo rje // rtog pa'i marlabs rab zhi pa// nyer dpyad me she
382b6(rgyud): byam dag pa las// yongs dag rnal 'byor spros bcas dang // spros med las 'das stong pa nyid// 'od gas la shin tu spros med las// phyag rgya chen po zung 'jug thob// dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las
382b7(rgyud): bsdus pa las rab tu byed pasu bcu so lnga pa la// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsang chen tshul mchog ste// rdo rje gsum las la khor lo 'byung // byang chub sangs rgyas gnas 'jug
382b8(rgyud): big gangan nyid pas mngon rtogs// bem ma rtso mo khyib rgyan gyur pa'o// rjod byedang mong byed dang // dpa' dang mngon gyur stobs da ni// chosadon bya par gyur pa'i phyir/ stobs ldan kyad pa
383a1(rgyud): sbyin no// zhan nags pad+hA swA / tan ldan sa na // don yod bye / da ma pa can me// don das skye sa gas /

383a3(rgyud): ma'o sangs rgyas ma lus pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni // 'od gas pa rang bzhin yongs su ga/ dri med nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin mo//  nas ngo'i nyid 'byung ba// khams gsum dag bya
383a4(rgyud): 'gro ba kun la bde 'byung ba'i// dge ba yongs su dag gyur byos/ dag pa'i lus ni rnam thar gyi// sgo gsum grub pa srung rje// dag ni dag pa chos kyi tshul// sa sor yang dag rig pa che// gsung gi dbying sa nam
383a5(rgyud): 'gyur// rnam shes dus gsum dus med du// ye shes byang chub chen por 'brang // dbyer med pa de chen mi gnas pa'o// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems pa
383a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur chud du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'khor gyi nadang / 
383a7(rgyud): tshig ngan pa gsung zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams thong / de skad ce
383a8(rgyud): nas/ 'jigs smag dngangs nas brgyal bar gyur to zhes pa dang / de dag la slar gsol zhes pa'i bar gyi dpal rdo 'chang gi bar gyis gsungs pa ni/ gzugs pa la lden por dgongs pa'i

383b4(rgyud): kyis ka' sum ga rnams ta'i smos/ smon sa / ga pang bse bum zhes /  dang gas dung thugs / bya chu mo shes mnas pa dang / da byo na/

383b6(rgyud): rnas pa nas/ rdorje'i mo ma pa mnas pas bsnyen pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ces pa nas/ skal pa med pa'i phyir gyi bar gyis gas ngo sngags dang theg pa'ong ba dartso pa kang

384a5(rgyud): rgyal so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gsang ba gsum gyi yig rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro nas the tsom bsal ba'o// sngags kyi sems dpa' mi byas// byas na byang chub rnyed par da 'ashes pa la/ med pa da
384a6(rgyud): ching bar 'gyur zhes pa/ gang zag gzhan la dgongs pa'o// mngor na phung po lnga'ams ni// sangs rgyas lngar de btu bsgrags nas pa la sogs pa dod gzhan la dgongs pa'o// chos thams cangs
384a7(rgyud): ngam zhes pa mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa'o// chos kyi mgrangs 'di gal bsod pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pas re/ dus gzhan la dgongs pa'o// dgongs pa nyid ni phyer mi ldog pa'i don la dgongs pa na
